radioText.cn: 先去看看榴弹塔的充能情况吧。
radioText.en: I should check the charging status of the Grenade Tower first.

radioText.cn: 先去采集制造工业爆炸物所需的酮化灌木吧。
radioText.en: I should gather some Aketine needed for producing Industrial Explosives.

radioText.cn: 先去看看损坏的中继器吧。
radioText.en: I should take a look at the damaged Relay Tower.

radioText.cn: 先使用精炼炉来生产晶体外壳吧。
radioText.en: I should try using the Refining Unit to produce Origocrusts.

radioText.cn: 先去完成晶体外壳的产线搭建吧。
radioText.en: I should set up an Origocrust production line.

radioText.cn: 先按模拟提示来进行操作吧。
radioText.en: I should follow the instructions of the simulation.

radioText.cn: 未确认访问请求，请获得访问权限后再试。
radioText.en: Access authorization cannot be verified. Please acquire access authorization before trying again.

radioText.cn: 先去使用电驱矿机开采紫晶矿吧。
radioText.en: I should use the Electric Mining Rigs to mine Amethyst Ore.

radioText.cn: 说起来，我来到谷地的这些天，吃喝都承蒙了工团食堂的不少照顾呢。
radioText.en: I've spent a few days at the Valley. The UWST canteen staff kindly made some meals for me.

radioText.cn: 可要说好吃么……嘿嘿，这时候就由不得挑口味啦，大家都在努力恢复之前的生活。
radioText.en: As for the taste... Hehe, picky isn't really on the menu in times like this! Everyone's doing their best to bring the good ol' days back.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你之后有回去过吗？
radioText.en: Endmin, have you been back there since the crisis...?

radioText.cn: 那里受灾情况很严重，不知道现在有没有改善……
radioText.en: The area was really devastated by the disaster. I wonder if things got better...

radioText.cn: 医务室的人都很好，只是伤员实在太多了，床位总是不够用，大家都一筹莫展。
radioText.en: Everyone in the medical bay is kind-hearted, but they have to handle way too many patients. There aren't enough beds, and people are running out of ideas.

radioText.cn: 最让人揪心的是医务室里的孩子们……他们明明不用承受这些事。
radioText.en: Seeing children in the medical bay also makes me really sad... None of them should suffer like this.

radioText.cn: 是不是感觉身体轻了许多？我们跳上去吧，不然就被他们追上啦！
radioText.en: You're feeling much lighter, right? Let's hop on or they'll really catch up with us.

radioText.cn: 管理员，体验过反重力的生活吗？
radioText.en: Endmin, ever tried living in low gravity?

radioText.cn: 哈哈，一下子不太适应吧？
radioText.en: Heehee. Takes getting used to, right?

radioText.cn: 管理员，在这里！
radioText.en: Endmin, over here!

radioText.cn: 这是……工团的保险柜？我们要找的过滤装置或许就在里面。
radioText.en: Is this ... a UWST safe? Perhaps the filter we're looking for is right inside.

radioText.cn: <@qu.key>卡莉</>这孩子想必是恢复得差不多了——都开始到处乱跑了！刚才还在的，这一眨眼又不知道跑哪儿去了。
radioText.en: Little <@qu.key>Carly</> must've bounced back — she's been running all over the place! She was just here, and now she's gone again.

radioText.cn: 她很喜欢玩捉迷藏。洁尔佩塔，你们能陪她玩一会儿吗？
radioText.en: Carly loves playing hide and seek. Gilberta, would you mind playing along and finding her for us?

radioText.cn: 没问题！
radioText.en: No problem!

radioText.cn: 这里有未干的水渍……闻起来甜甜的，是卡莉爱喝的橘子味儿。是她在这里打翻了饮料吧？管理员，我们扫描看看。
radioText.en: There's some liquid here. *Sniff, sniff*. Hmm. Smells like Carly's favorite orange juice. She probably spilled her drink. Let's try scanning the place, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 卡莉，找到你了，我赢啦！
radioText.en: Found you, Carly! I win!

radioText.cn: 我不要打针！我要玩相机！
radioText.en: I don't want needles! I wanna play with cameras!

radioText.cn: 厉害吧？这些阻碍可难不倒勇敢的信使。
radioText.en: Incredible, right? Nothing can stop a Messenger!

radioText.cn: 把自己想象成一只风筝，感受身体和大地之间那若即若离的联系。
radioText.en: Just imagine yourself as a kite, and feel the ephemeral link between your body and the land.

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿，这就是飞起来的诀窍哦。
radioText.en: Heheh. And that is the trick of flying.

radioText.cn: 来，看这里，耶——
radioText.en: Look at the camera, say cheese!
Cheese!

radioText.cn: 这里只剩下满目疮痍……真是令人痛心。
radioText.en: This entire place is now a ruin... It's so upsetting.

radioText.cn: 到处都是侵蚀，很危险。
radioText.en: Careful. There's Blight everywhere.

radioText.cn: 东西不在这里呢。
radioText.en: This isn't it. It's not here.

radioText.cn: 没有困难的工作，只有勇敢的信使！
radioText.en: For a courageous messenger, nothing's ever too heavy!

radioText.cn: 也许在别的地方？
radioText.en: No. Not this. Perhaps it's somewhere else.

radioText.cn: 一点小困难——一点小技巧！
radioText.en: Here's a spark of Arts to save the day!

radioText.cn: 信使无往不利！
radioText.en: Messengers always deliver!

radioText.cn: 当心那边！
radioText.en: Look out! Over there!

radioText.cn: 这是……什么人留下的吗？
radioText.en: What is this...? Did someone leave this behind?

radioText.cn: 上面的名字被人涂黑了……
radioText.en: The name part has been blacked out...

radioText.cn: 留下它的人看起来很迷茫……
radioText.en: Whoever left this here seems like a lost soul...

radioText.cn: 这份文件，罗普给的批注是“小美”。
radioText.en: Ropp wrote "MASIE" in the appendix of this document.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我发现了一些东西……
radioText.en: Endmin, I think I ... found something...

radioText.cn: 就在我们找到保险柜的地点附近。
radioText.en: It's near the place where we found the safe.

radioText.cn: 不知道洁尔佩塔去了哪里……先逛逛吧。
radioText.en: {F}Wonder where Gilberta went... I guess I'll just look around the place.{M}Wonder where Gilberta went... I guess I'll just look around the place.

radioText.cn: 唔，了解到了不少事情……
radioText.en: Hmm. We actually found out ... quite a bit...

radioText.cn: 收拾这些挡路的东西！
radioText.en: Take out whatever's blocking the way!

radioText.cn: 去四号谷地找她吧。
radioText.en: {F}Time to look for her in Valley IV.{M}Time to look for her in Valley IV.

radioText.cn: 怎么办？
radioText.en: Any thoughts?

radioText.cn: 先让这里安静下来。
radioText.en: We silence these buggerloids.

radioText.cn: 这是……哪里？
radioText.en: {F}What is this place...?{M}What is this place...?

radioText.cn: 那个人是……
radioText.en: {F}Someone's up ahead...{M}Someone's up ahead...

radioText.cn: 这边走。小心点儿。
radioText.en: Over here. Be careful.

radioText.cn: 记忆往往藏在深处。好好找找吧。
radioText.en: Memories often hide deep here. We'll have a good look around.

radioText.cn: 现在，好像还缺了些什么……
radioText.en: Hmm. It seems something is still missing...

radioText.cn: 战场……又是一片战场。
radioText.en: Tsk... Another battlefield.

radioText.cn: 总是在记忆的终点看到这样的景色……
radioText.en: I always see sights like this at the end of the memory lane...

radioText.cn: 看来有些记忆，不想被我找到。
radioText.en: Looks like a certain memory of mine is avoiding me.

radioText.cn: 但这次，我不会让它逃走。
radioText.en: However, I won't let it get away this time.

radioText.cn: 快，跟上我。
radioText.en: Come, let's get moving.

radioText.cn: 又是这些怪物……你可以先躲开。
radioText.en: Monsters again... You. Go hide somewhere.

radioText.cn: 是天使……
radioText.en: {F}They're Aggeloi...{M}They're Aggeloi...

radioText.cn: 这里……有她的踪迹？
radioText.en: {F}Traces... They might be hers.{M}Traces... They might be hers.

radioText.cn: 这是……
radioText.en: {F}What is this...?{M}What is this...?

actorName.cn: 红发少女的声音{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 停下来了？找不到吗？
radioText.en: You stopped. Couldn't find it anymore?

radioText.cn: 焚灭“邪魔”，处理灾情……都是她做的吗？
radioText.en: {F}Burning "demons", dealing with disasters... Did she do all this?{M}Burning "demons", dealing with disasters... Did she do all this?

radioText.cn: 她要去哪儿？
radioText.en: {F}Where is she going?{M}Where is she going?

radioText.cn: 她应该去世代摇篮了。
radioText.en: {F}She probably went to the Cradle of the Ages.{M}She probably went to the Cradle of the Ages.

radioText.cn: 得想办法追踪她的痕迹……
radioText.en: {F}I should scan these traces and track her down...{M}I should scan these traces and track her down...

actorName.cn: 红发少女的声音{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 黑耳黑耳快快逃，城门破了火光高。
radioText.en: Move those legs and run, black-ears. The city's lost and the fire burns near.

actorName.cn: 红发少女的声音{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 慢点！别太快！
radioText.en: Hey, slow down! Not so fast!

actorName.cn: 红发少女的声音{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 白耳白耳回家去，熔炉怀中好睡觉。
radioText.en: Time to go home, little white-ears. Curl up and doze in your furnace lair.

actorName.cn: 红发少女的声音{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 线索越来越少……
radioText.en: The trail is getting cold...

radioText.cn: 这是记忆之外的东西……
radioText.en: {F}This is something unrelated to the memories...{M}This is something unrelated to the memories...

radioText.cn: 刚刚走出了记忆的边界吗……
radioText.en: {F}Did I just leave the boundaries of the memory...?{M}Did I just leave the boundaries of the memory...?

actorName.cn: 红发少女的声音{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 小家伙，你要不要帮我找找，我的记忆在哪儿？
radioText.en: Hello, little fella. Wanna help look for my memories?

radioText.cn: 这只长耳兽……和她有关？
radioText.en: {F}This long-ear seems ... connected to her.{M}This long-ear seems ... connected to her.

actorName.cn: 红发少女的痕迹{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 接下来去哪儿呢……
radioText.en: Heh. Where should I go next...?

radioText.cn: 跟上去吧。
radioText.en: {F}I should follow.{M}I should follow.

radioText.cn: 那边有什么？
radioText.en: {F}What's over there?{M}What's over there?

actorName.cn: 红发少女的痕迹{莱万汀}

radioText.cn: 不能停下来。继续找吧。
radioText.en: Can't quit here. I should keep looking.

radioText.cn: 她往那边去了。
radioText.en: {F}She went over there.{M}She went over there.

radioText.cn: 收音机？
radioText.en: {F}A radio?{M}A radio?

radioText.cn: 是安德烈和詹娜……
radioText.en: {F}That's Andre and Jenner...{M}That's Andre and Jenner...

radioText.cn: 应该够了，回帝江号吧。
radioText.en: {F}This should be enough. Time to return to Dijiang.{M}This should be enough. Time to return to Dijiang.

radioText.cn: 目击者……应该都在枢纽区基地。
radioText.en: {F}Witnesses... They might be in the Hub.{M}Witnesses... They might be in the Hub.

radioText.cn: 希望能找到她……
radioText.en: {F}Hope I can find her...{M}Hope I can find her...

radioText.cn: 去看看吧。一定还有痕迹。
radioText.en: Go take a look. We should be able to find some traces.

radioText.cn: 是塔塔！
radioText.en: {F}That's Tata!{M}That's Tata!

radioText.cn: “塔塔”……还真是可爱的名字。
radioText.en: "Tata"...? Now that's a lovely name.

radioText.cn: 失忆之前的我……曾在这里种下一棵树。
radioText.en: {F}The old me before the amnesia ... planted a Great Oak here.{M}The old me before the amnesia ... planted a Great Oak here.

radioText.cn: 所以那是过去的你？
radioText.en: So that's the old you?

radioText.cn: 但也有可能……需要你再辨别。
radioText.en: But you probably should take a closer look.

radioText.cn: 先辨别清楚谁是真的！
radioText.en: You gotta first figure out which of them is real!

radioText.cn: 当心！幻影后面藏着敌人！
radioText.en: Careful! The real enemies are behind the illusions!

radioText.cn: 记忆……不用再挽留我了。
radioText.en: Memories ... I must bid you adieu now.

radioText.cn: 当心记忆的深渊……别溺毙了。
radioText.en: Tread carefully. Try not to drown in the depths of memories.

radioText.cn: 燃尽吧。
radioText.en: Let everything burn.

radioText.cn: 史尔特尔……还留下了什么……
radioText.en: What else did Surtr leave behind...?

radioText.cn: 向前冲，没多少时间可以浪费了。
radioText.en: Better start moving. We don't have much time to waste.

radioText.cn: 来和我一起玩吧！
radioText.en: Come play with me!

radioText.cn: 走了这么久，的确没有找到过多少称得上“快乐”的往事……
radioText.en: After all this walking, I hardly met anything that can be considered "happy"...

radioText.cn: 或许就在前面。
radioText.en: {F}*Gentle laugh* Maybe it's just at the next stop.{M}*Gentle laugh* Maybe it's just at the next stop.

radioText.cn: 可恶的家伙来了。
radioText.en: The annoying peeps are here.

radioText.cn: 她……不见了。
radioText.en: {F}She's ... gone.{M}She's ... gone.

radioText.cn: 还没找到莱万汀……
radioText.en: {F}I haven't found Laevatain yet...{M}I haven't found Laevatain yet...

radioText.cn: 你的脚步……
radioText.en: {F}Your condition...{M}Your condition...

radioText.cn: 有点沉……不，没问题。
radioText.en: My legs a little heavy ... but I'm okay.

radioText.cn: 还好有你，管理员。
radioText.en: It's nice having you around, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 因为我们是同行者。
radioText.en: {F}We're fellow companions, after all.{M}We're fellow companions, after all.

radioText.cn: 看来这里都是你在塔卫二的记忆。可惜和我无关。
radioText.en: These seem like your memories at Talos-II, but they've got nothing to do with me.

radioText.cn: 也许将来，你也可以在塔卫二留下点什么。
radioText.en: {F}Perhaps you can leave something on Talos-II as well.{M}Perhaps you can leave something on Talos-II as well.

actorName.cn: 终末地干员的幻影{c16-终末地干员的幻影B}
actorName.en: Illusion of an Endfielder {c16-Illusion of an Endfielder B}

radioText.cn: 管理员，欢迎回家！
radioText.en: Welcome home, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 莱万汀，你……
radioText.en: {F}Laevatain, are you...{M}Laevatain, are you...

radioText.cn: 她应该留下了痕迹……
radioText.en: {F}She should've left a trail somewhere...{M}She should've left a trail somewhere...

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 管你是什么巨兽的碎片，给我闭嘴。
radioText.en: Feranmut shard? I don't care. Just shut up.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 接下来我们还有很长一段时间要共处，尽管相信我的剑吧。
radioText.en: We still have a lot of time together ahead of us. Keep your faith in my sword.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 啊，受伤了。没想到我也会有因为分心被源石虫偷袭的一天。
radioText.en: Ah, I'm hurt. Ouch. My palm's scratched. Never thought there would be a day I got distracted enough to get ambushed by Originium Slugs.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 刚才战斗中的医疗干员……谢谢你们。
radioText.en: You guys really helped me out in that battle... Thanks, medics.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 海边度假……还特意准备了衣服？
radioText.en: A seaside holiday... And the beachwear's for me?

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 正好腾出空间来，带一些礼物回罗德岛。
radioText.en: Better make some space. I'm bringing souvenirs back to Rhodes Island.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 在罗德岛的记忆跟以前的那些完全不同，充满了真实感。
radioText.en: The memories since I came to Rhodes Island feel so different. They are more real.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 所以你的意思是，我也可以依靠你吗？
radioText.en: Are you trying to say I can rely on you, too?

actorName.cn: 神秘的幻影{c16-莱万汀的幻影}

radioText.cn: 她要休息了，让她安睡吧。
radioText.en: She wants to rest. Let her sleep.

actorName.cn: 难以辨认的声音{c16-萨卡兹A}

radioText.cn: 萨卡兹，无根之人，背负诅咒的族裔。
radioText.en: Sarkaz. A nation accursed. A people without roots.

actorName.cn: 难以辨认的声音{c16-萨卡兹A}

radioText.cn: 在这被源石扭曲的世界，我们命中注定一无所有。
radioText.en: We are fated to have nothing in a world twisted by Originium.

actorName.cn: 难以辨认的声音{c16-萨卡兹A}

radioText.cn: 鲜血与战火反复浸润的土地，将一次次被毁灭。
radioText.en: In the Land soaked by blood and war, we have been ordained to face one destruction after another.

actorName.cn: 难以辨认的声音{c16-萨卡兹A}

radioText.cn: 我们没有故乡，因为它已经重归荒芜。
radioText.en: We no longer have a home, for home has given way to barren desolation.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 你就在外面等着我，帮我守好洞口就行！
radioText.en: Meteorite, just wait for me outside and guard the entrance!

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 离过去的记忆越来越远了……倒也不是坏事。
radioText.en: My past memories seem to be drifting away... But this doesn't feel bad.

actorName.cn: 史尔特尔的声音{c16-史尔特尔}

radioText.cn: 我很乐意用新的记忆把脑海填满。
radioText.en: I'm more than happy to fill my head up with freshly made memories.

radioText.cn: 嗯？这是我失去的碎片……
radioText.en: Ah. This is a lost fragment of mine...

radioText.cn: 它能恢复我的力量。
radioText.en: It can restore my power.

actorName.cn: 忧心忡忡的男性{c16-萨卡兹B}

radioText.cn: 再哭，夜里就会有温迪戈过来把你吃掉。
radioText.en: Stop crying already. Otherwise a Wendigo will appear in the night and eat you up.

radioText.cn: 别吓唬她了。明天是她生日，但她从小到大还没有见过外面的天空呢。
radioText.en: Don't scare her like that. It's her birthday tomorrow. She hasn't seen the outside world before.

actorName.cn: 忧心忡忡的男性{c16-萨卡兹B}

radioText.cn: 等她成年，这里或许能重新见到太阳。
radioText.en: Once she gets older, the sun might shine over this place again.

actorName.cn: 忧心忡忡的男性{c16-萨卡兹B}

radioText.cn: 但现在……对不起，我的挚爱。
radioText.en: But now...? I'm sorry, my love.

radioText.cn: 内战爆发了，战火很快就会蔓延到这里。
radioText.en: Civil war has erupted, and the fighting's spreading here.

actorName.cn: 忧心忡忡的男性{c16-萨卡兹B}

radioText.cn: 我知道……他们开始清算了……连孩子都难以幸免……
radioText.en: I know... They're settling the old scores ... and the children might not be spared...

actorName.cn: 忧心忡忡的男性{c16-萨卡兹B}

radioText.cn: 这里还需要我来铸造兵器，但我们的孩子……
radioText.en: They need me to forge their weapons. But our child...

radioText.cn: 她还那么小！即便我们无法逃离这场灾难，也要为她……
radioText.en: She's so young! We might not be able to avoid this disaster, but for her sake...

actorName.cn: 紧张的呼叫者{c16-紧张的呼叫者}

radioText.cn: 如果有人能收到这段紧急呼叫，请在这个频道上回应。我们已经失去了和门<@nar.mark>那边</>……和泰拉的所有联系，主通道被外力切断了。
radioText.en: If you receive this emergency call, please respond on this frequency! We can't call <@nar.mark>beyond</> the Gate ... we've lost touch with Terra! The main channel has been severed!

actorName.cn: 紧张的呼叫者{c16-紧张的呼叫者}

radioText.cn: <@nar.mark>Σ</>区遭到的袭击比我们预想的严重，现在连中心控制室都失去了联络。那里可能已经……全毁了。
radioText.en: The attack on Sector <@nar.mark>Σ</> is far worse than we expected. Central Control has gone dark. The entire place is probably ... destroyed.

actorName.cn: 紧张的呼叫者{c16-紧张的呼叫者}

radioText.cn: 我们试图封锁通道，但是根本不起效果。那些<@nar.mark>东西</>……淹没了整个楼层。我们的人一个接一个地消失……
radioText.en: We tried to seal the passage, but nothing worked. Those <@nar.mark>things</> ... flooded the entire floor. Our people kept disappearing...

actorName.cn: 紧张的呼叫者{c16-紧张的呼叫者}

radioText.cn: 告诉其他人，比起<@nar.mark>我们</>真正的敌人，天使根本不值得恐惧。
radioText.en: Tell the others! <@nar.mark>Our</> real enemies are ... far more terrifying than the Aggeloi.

actorName.cn: 神秘的幻影{c16-莱万汀的幻影}

radioText.cn: 看来你还是做出了自己的选择。以为这样就能成为自己吗？
radioText.en: It seems you've made your choice. Do you really think that's enough to make you yourself?

actorName.cn: 神秘的幻影{c16-莱万汀的幻影}

radioText.cn: 你抛弃了过去，但过去的记忆不会抛弃你。
radioText.en: You abandoned the past, but these memories will never let you go.

radioText.cn: 那就试试看吧。我的“过去”。
radioText.en: Go ahead and try, my "past".

radioText.cn: 这是……
radioText.en: {F}This is...{M}This is...

radioText.cn: 背后的记忆已经无用了，别回头。
radioText.en: Don't look back. The memories behind are of no use.

radioText.cn: 一直往前冲，跳下去吧。
radioText.en: Keep running and jump.

radioText.cn: 打碎的镜子掉在地上，就会变成扎脚的玻璃碴。
radioText.en: When you drop a mirror, it breaks into shards that can cut.

radioText.cn: 虽然抛弃之前一直在找的东西有点可惜，但既然如此，就把它们烧成灰吧。
radioText.en: It's a shame to abandon what I'd been seeking. But if I have to, let's just burn them all to ashes.

actorName.cn: 悲伤的工人{c17m1-悲伤的工人}

radioText.cn: 您好。这些应该不是您的包裹……它们的主人已经……不会来取了。
radioText.en: Hi there. You won't find your package here... Their ... their owners probably won't be coming to pick them up.

actorName.cn: 忙碌的工人{c17m1-忙碌的工人}

radioText.cn: 这些是环塔商会和宏科院送来的支援物资。您去旁边找找吧。
radioText.en: These are relief supply donations from the TGCC and HAS. You should try looking at that pile over there.

radioText.cn: （这应该就是伊冯的包裹了。）
radioText.en: (This should be Yvonne's package.)

radioText.cn: 嗯哼？
radioText.en: Mmhmm?

radioText.cn: 这里这里……感觉不错！
radioText.en: Ooh, this place is great!

actorName.cn: 维持队伍秩序的工人{c17m1-维持队伍的工人}
actorName.en: Crew Mate Giving Orders {c17m1-Crew Mate Giving Orders}

radioText.cn: 各位工友，请到我面前排队——
radioText.en: Alright crew, form a line in front of me —

actorName.cn: 维持队伍秩序的工人{c17m1-维持队伍的工人}
actorName.en: Crew Mate Giving Orders {c17m1-Crew Mate Giving Orders}

radioText.cn: 扫码出库……哎呀！一个一个来！
radioText.en: Now scan to check them out of the depot... Tsk, one at a time!

radioText.cn: 嗯……这里？不行，不够宽敞。
radioText.en: Hmm...? Nope. This won't work. Not big enough.

radioText.cn: 不知道安德烈看到我，会做出什么反应！
radioText.en: I wonder how Andre will react when he sees me!

radioText.cn: 哈哈，每次伊冯来找我，我都提心吊胆的……
radioText.en: Haha. I get a little worried and jumpy whenever Yvonne swings by my place...

radioText.cn: 虽然从项目的角度上看，她其实算是我的下属。
radioText.en: Though technically, according to the project organization, she answers to me.

radioText.cn: 不过，那孩子的创造力绝对是顶尖的。
radioText.en: Nevertheless, the girl has the best and most creative mind I know.

radioText.cn: 找到一个了。
radioText.en: {F}Found one.{M}Found one.

radioText.cn: 这里也有一个“小驮兽”！
radioText.en: Found a baby burdenbeast here!

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿！管理员，来比一比谁找到的多，怎么样？
radioText.en: Heheh! Endmin, let's see who can catch more of them. How about that?

radioText.cn: 找到啦！伊冯又得一分！
radioText.en: Found one! Another point for Yvonne!

actorName.cn: 工团的男孩{c17m2-工团的男孩C}

radioText.cn: 被发现了……
radioText.en: Oh, I got found...

radioText.cn: 管理员，可别输给我哦！
radioText.en: Don't let me beat you, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 藏到哪里了呢……吼！欸……不在啊。
radioText.en: Where did you go...? Grrr! Aw, not here.

radioText.cn: 找到了！
radioText.en: {F}Haha! I got one!{M}Haha! I got one!

radioText.cn: 可恶！我不会输的！
radioText.en: Dang it! I refuse to lose!

radioText.cn: 这些裂缝，是震荡波造成的吧……
radioText.en: The shockwaves made these cracks, right...?

radioText.cn: 这场灾难把我们的家变得面目全非……
radioText.en: Yeah... The disaster really messed up our homes...

radioText.cn: 但我们一定能复原它。
radioText.en: Nevertheless, we shall rebuild.

radioText.cn: 就是这里的裂隙……把塔塔……
radioText.en: This rift... This is where Tata...

radioText.cn: 伊冯……你还好吗？
radioText.en: {F}Yvonne... Are you alright?{M}Yvonne... Are you alright?

radioText.cn: 嗯？我……我当然没事啦！管理员，我们走！
radioText.en: Hmm? Me... I'm a-okay, Endmin! Let's go!

actorName.cn: 悲痛的工人{c17m2-悲痛的工人}

radioText.cn: 他之前说过，想去武陵吃好吃的……
radioText.en: He ... he wanted to try Wuling food...

actorName.cn: 悲痛的工人{c17m2-悲痛的工人}

radioText.cn: 我明明可以带他去的……
radioText.en: I could have taken him there...

actorName.cn: 严肃的工人{c17m2-严肃的工人}

radioText.cn: 没有那么可怕。
radioText.en: It's not something to be scared of.

actorName.cn: 严肃的工人{c17m2-严肃的工人}

radioText.cn: 生命消散后会化作风，一切逝去的还会再相逢。
radioText.en: After passing away, life becomes a breeze of wind. We shall reunite with those who left us.

radioText.cn: 跟天才共事，总归是要付点代价的。起初我们都不太能得到她的信任。
radioText.en: You gotta pay the price when you're working with a genius. She trusted none of us in the beginning.

radioText.cn: 但只要大家目标一致，总有一天会走到一起，对吧？
radioText.en: But as long as we share the same goals, we'll eventually end up working as a real team, right?

radioText.cn: 我们决定在这里举行仪式……
radioText.en: We have decided to hold our ceremony here...

radioText.cn: 是希望有一天……新生的树苗能修补土地的伤疤。
radioText.en: We hope a day will come ... when the new sapling mends the scars suffered by these lands.

radioText.cn: 我相信……一定可以的。
radioText.en: It will surely come true.

radioText.cn: 有段时间没来这里啦。
radioText.en: I haven't been here in quite a while.

radioText.cn: 嗯哼！干脆也在这儿画点什么？
radioText.en: Mmm! Maybe we should draw something here as well.

radioText.cn: 但……嘿嘿，先去安德烈那里！找灵感比较重要！
radioText.en: But... Heheh. Let's head over to Andre's place first! Finding inspiration is the most important thing!

radioText.cn: 完蛋了……我的宝贝……全完了……
radioText.en: It's finished... My precious things... They're all done for...

radioText.cn: 又发现一个。
radioText.en: Found another.

radioText.cn: 要输了……不行，起码要得到最后的一分！
radioText.en: No way I'm losing... I gotta seize the final point!

radioText.cn: 再得一分！哼哼，压倒性的胜利！
radioText.en: Alright, one more point! Hmph. It will be a landslide victory!

radioText.cn: 不过比赛还没结束，我们把最后一个孩子找出来吧。
radioText.en: Oof, this game's turning into a real match. Let's find the last kid together.

radioText.cn: 管理员，不准跑，游戏还没结束呢！
radioText.en: No running away, Endmin! The game isn't over yet!

radioText.cn: 管理员，超域试验场在这边啦。
radioText.en: Endmin, the road to the Æther Test Site is over here.

radioText.cn: 这是整个集成工业研究所的关键设备，现在看您的了。管理员。
radioText.en: This is the key facility of the entire AIC Research Center. We're counting on you, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 看起来是没问题了，我们把它重启吧。
radioText.en: I think it looks good now. Let's restart it.

radioText.cn: 干得漂亮，管理员！
radioText.en: Beautifully done, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 神奇导航，我们往矿区的哪里走？
radioText.en: Okay, my Artsy Navigator. Which part of the mines are we heading to?

radioText.cn: 去我熟人在的地方。
radioText.en: {F}The part where we'll see some of my friends.{M}The part where we'll see some of my friends.

radioText.cn: 你熟人真多！不过我也有小暴鸰跟速冻仔，还有……
radioText.en: You really have friends everywhere! But I also have my Tweety-Bomb, Frost-e-Bytee, and...

radioText.cn: 咱们分头打听一下吧！
radioText.en: Let's split forces and ask around!

radioText.cn: 情况不对！速冻仔！准备战斗！
radioText.en: Something isn't right! Frost-e-Bytee! Prepare for battle!

radioText.cn: 都躲好了吗？裂兽——来——吃小孩咯！
radioText.en: Are you done hiding? Because the manglerbeasts — are — looking to feast!

radioText.cn: 都躲到哪里去了呢？哼哼，你们逃不掉的……！
radioText.en: Where are they hiding? Hmph. You can't run away...!

radioText.cn: 这里！嗯？没有……
radioText.en: Here! Huh, not a single soul...

radioText.cn: 好暗！管理员，来这边……我来开灯。
radioText.en: It's so dark! Endmin, over here... Let me turn on the lights.

radioText.cn: 伊冯说，要有光！
radioText.en: And Yvonne said: "Let there be light!"

radioText.cn: 抵达终点！好啦，我们去坐电梯吧！
radioText.en: We've crossed the finish line! Phewie. Time for an elevator ride!

radioText.cn: 管理员，你回来啦！战利品呢？
radioText.en: You're back! Got any phat lewt to share?

radioText.cn: 听到了吗？前面有敌人！
radioText.en: Do you hear that? There are enemies up ahead!

radioText.cn: 小暴鸰！做好准备。
radioText.en: Tweety-Bomb! Get ready.

radioText.cn: 又回到这里了……好怀念啊！
radioText.en: Finally back... I feel so nostalgic!

radioText.cn: 这些设计都是我刚来工团时做的。
radioText.en: I made all these designs when I arrived at the UWST.

radioText.cn: 几年前来着？有些硬件都老化了……
radioText.en: How long has it been? Some hardware's pretty worn...

radioText.cn: 又断掉了……那些天使在这里开派对，怎么没有经过我的批准？
radioText.en: Another road is out... How dare the Aggeloi party here without my permission?

radioText.cn: 这趟寻找灵感的旅程也快到终点了呢……
radioText.en: This inspiration-seeking journey is nearing its end...

radioText.cn: 这么大的天使是从哪儿来的！管理员，我和速冻仔也会帮你的，别掉链子啊！
radioText.en: This Aggelos is enormous — how?! Endmin! Frost-e and I will assist you! Let's do this together!

radioText.cn: 超载模式启动，准备看烟花吧！管理员，让这些石头脑袋见见世面！
radioText.en: Activate overdrive mode! It's time for fireworks, Endmin! Let's show these rocky heads what true combat is all about!

radioText.cn: 天使大冰雕！这些家伙没有攻击性的时候还挺可爱的嘛。
radioText.en: Ice sculptures of Aggeloi! Say, they actually look pretty cute when they're not trying to attack anyone.

radioText.cn: 趁现在，解决它们吧！
radioText.en: Now's our chance to take them out!

radioText.cn: 成功了？
radioText.en: {F}Did it work?{M}Did it work?

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿！去看看我的杰作吧。
radioText.en: Heheh! Let's check out what I pulled off.

radioText.cn: 来吧来吧，我们一起看看里面的情况！
radioText.en: Come on over! Let's take a look at the sitch inside!

radioText.cn: 管理员，你那里还好吗？要不要帮忙？
radioText.en: Endmin? You okay out there? Need some help?

radioText.cn: 稍微有点忙……
radioText.en: {F}Got quite a few things on my hands right now...{M}Got quite a few things on my hands right now...

radioText.cn: 坚持住哦！我的后背就靠你保护了。
radioText.en: Try to hang in there! I'm counting on you to cover my back!

radioText.cn: 路断了……管理员，我们绕一下，找找其他路。
radioText.en: The road is out... Endmin, I think we need to find a detour.

radioText.cn: 我来啦！
radioText.en: I'm here!

radioText.cn: 伊冯，这个……是塔塔的部件？
radioText.en: {F}Yvonne, is this ... a component for Tata?{M}Yvonne, is this ... a component for Tata?

radioText.cn: 是啊，没想到他们还留着……
radioText.en: Yeah. I never expected them to keep it here...

radioText.cn: 好了好了，我们快走吧。
radioText.en: Okie doke, let's get out of here.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们去地下，那边有个超级漂亮的冰淇淋店！
radioText.en: Endmin, let's go underground. We got a super bee-you-tee-full ice cream store there!

radioText.cn: 是开玩笑的啦。你就当是……陪我散散步吧！
radioText.en: Hah. I was just joking with you. Treat this as ... a nice walk with me!

radioText.cn: 管理员，怎么放起音乐啦？有段时间没听过这首曲子了……
radioText.en: Why are we playing music, Endmin? Hmm. Now I haven't heard this song in quite a while...

radioText.cn: 有了音乐，破解效率好像变高了。干得漂亮！
radioText.en: The music just spiked my hacking efficiency. Nicely done!

radioText.cn: 这些金属外壳看上去跟速冻仔的尺寸差不多。
radioText.en: {F}These metallic chassis share similar dimensions to Frost-e-Bytee.{M}These metallic chassis share similar dimensions to Frost-e-Bytee.

radioText.cn: 是伊冯给你准备的吗？她果然很在意你们。
radioText.en: {F}Yvonne prepped these for you? Turns out she really cares.{M}Yvonne prepped these for you? Turns out she really cares.

radioText.cn: 现在怎么样？是不是好多了？
radioText.en: What do you think? Much better, right?

radioText.cn: 慢慢地、慢慢地……好，行得通！
radioText.en: Slowly, slowly... Great. It's working!

radioText.cn: 搭好了！管理员，我们走。
radioText.en: The road is complete! Endmin, it's time to go.

radioText.cn: 小家伙们，再飞一次！
radioText.en: Alright, lil' ones. Time to fly again!

radioText.cn: 看，这里可以过去。管理员害怕的话，可以拉着我的手哦。
radioText.en: Look. I think we can get across from here. Feel free to hold my hand if you're scared.

radioText.cn: 最后一个啦！
radioText.en: Last one!

radioText.cn: 好，我们顺利过来啦。欸，那个是……
radioText.en: Fantastic. We made it across. Huh. What is that...?

radioText.cn: 嘘！小声点……
radioText.en: Shhh! Keep it down...

radioText.cn: 呼……这趟打扫还挺累人的。
radioText.en: Hoo... This cleanup work is pretty exhausting.

radioText.cn: 小心前进吧，从刚刚那扇门过去。
radioText.en: Let's go through that door, carefully.

radioText.cn: 嘿，主动送上门的！
radioText.en: Heh. Someone is cruising for a bruising!

radioText.cn: 出发吧！跟着货物走。
radioText.en: Alrighty! Let's just follow the goods!

radioText.cn: 周围干净了，趁现在！
radioText.en: Patrol cleared! Now!

radioText.cn: 这里……还是老样子。
radioText.en: This place... It still looks the same.

radioText.cn: 正好，有只落单的！
radioText.en: Aha. A lone little pest!

radioText.cn: 就像这样，高台上的天使脱离了守卫，小暴鸰就可以炸掉它！
radioText.en: Just like that. Once the perched Aggelos has no one left to guard it, my Tweety-Bomb can blast it apart!

radioText.cn: 掩体可以用来躲避炮击，管理员，加油哦！
radioText.en: Hide behind cover to shield yourself against bombardment. Keep it up, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 管理员，注意脚下，可别掉下去！
radioText.en: Watch your step, Endmin. Try not to fall off!

radioText.cn: 就剩一只了。
radioText.en: One more left.

radioText.cn: 好耶，收工！
radioText.en: Awesome! Job done!

radioText.cn: 离目的地越来越近啦。加油加油！
radioText.en: We're getting closer to our destination. At the double!
WHEEEE —

radioText.cn: 顺利通过！我们继续前进吧！
radioText.en: Success! Time to press on!

radioText.cn: 呜哇……管理员，千万别掉下去喔！
radioText.en: Wo-woah... Watch your step, Endmin! Don't fall off!

radioText.cn: （速冻仔好像发现了什么，去看看吧。）
radioText.en: (Looks like Frost-e-Bytee found something, go check it out.)

radioText.cn: 哦！原来生产线上的货物，看到的世界是这样的……
radioText.en: Oooooh! So this is how things on a production line see the world...

radioText.cn: 就是那座电梯，靠它就能离开这个房间。
radioText.en: That's the elevator. We can use it to leave this room.

radioText.cn: 我们可以……噢！就在那儿！先从生产线终点出去！
radioText.en: We can... Oh! That's it! Over there! We can head out via the production line output port!

radioText.cn: 追踪器响了……难道就在附近？
radioText.en: {F}The tracker is beeping... Is he nearby?{M}The tracker is beeping... Is he nearby?

radioText.cn: ……黑夜、目标、逃跑、落脚地、火焰。我推测了一下，大概是这个顺序。
radioText.en: ...Night, target, escape, foot-rest, and fire. That's my guess for the sequence.

radioText.cn: 看来这种级别的谜题，对你来说不算什么。
radioText.en: A puzzle of this caliber seems too easy for someone like you.

radioText.cn: 不愧是你……管理员。
radioText.en: Very impressive ... Endministrator.

radioText.cn: 继续前进吧，距离最深处应该还有段路。
radioText.en: Let's keep moving. There's still quite a way to the deepest part of this camp.

radioText.cn: 如果你要找的叛徒就是乔万尼本人……
radioText.en: {F}If the traitor you're looking for is Giovanni himself...{M}If the traitor you're looking for is Giovanni himself...

radioText.cn: 那么，我会问清楚他的想法，并且……以狼群的方式解决他。
radioText.en: Then he owes me an explanation, and ... I'll take care of him the Pack way.

radioText.cn: 即使他迫不得已？
radioText.en: {F}What if he had no choice?{M}What if he had no choice?

radioText.cn: 任何一匹狼都需为自己的选择付出代价。
radioText.en: Every Lupo must pay the price of their choice.

radioText.cn: 这就是我、洛茜，还有乔万尼和托马索，最早受到的教育。
radioText.en: That's how Rossi, Giovanni, Tommaso, and I were taught ... in our very first lessons.

radioText.cn: ……终点近在眼前。
radioText.en: ...The end is near.

radioText.cn: 管理员，准备好了的话，就从那边的电梯上去吧。
radioText.en: If you're ready, Endmin, we can take that elevator over there to head up.

radioText.cn: 管理员。
radioText.en: Endmin.

radioText.cn: 等下大概会有场恶战……别离我太远。
radioText.en: Expect a hard fight ... and stay close to me.

radioText.cn: 乔万尼，当初那颗子弹其实是你帮我挡了吧？那个不会用铳的武器商人……最后并没射偏。
radioText.en: Giovanni, you blocked that bullet for me back then, right? That weapon dealer didn't even know how to use his guns... But his shot found its mark.

radioText.cn: ……那都是多少年前的事了，突然提这个干嘛？我都快忘了。
radioText.en: ...That was years ago, Catello. Why are you talking about that? I almost forgot about it.

radioText.cn: 是吗？但我还记得，就像你忘不了那个下水道一样。
radioText.en: Why? Well, I remember it well, just like how you couldn't forget about those sewers.

radioText.cn: 对对！就是那儿……具体怎么下去，也和我说说呗……
radioText.en: Yeah! That's exactly where I'm talking about... So, got any idea on how to get down there? Share 'em with a brother, man...

radioText.cn: 追踪器又有反应了……看来方向没错。
radioText.en: {F}The tracker is reacting again... This seems to be the right direction.{M}The tracker is reacting again... This seems to be the right direction.

radioText.cn: 这几个碾骨的人身上都留有狼群独有的施术痕迹，应该是那个叛徒做的……
radioText.en: These Bonekrushers bear marks left by the unique Arts of the Pack. Maybe the traitor did it...

radioText.cn: 管理员，追踪这个痕迹，或许能找到新的线索。
radioText.en: Endmin, we can follow these marks. It might help us find new clues.

radioText.cn: 管理员，有埋伏。
radioText.en: Endmin, we're ambushed.

radioText.cn: （似乎是无关的东西……）
radioText.en: (Doesn't seem like anything relevant...)

radioText.cn: （好像走错方向了……）
radioText.en: (Might be the wrong way...)

radioText.cn: 你是不是经常独自行动？
radioText.en: {F}You often act alone, right?{M}You often act alone, right?

radioText.cn: ……偶尔。
radioText.en: ...Sometimes.

radioText.cn: 只需我一个人能解决的问题，没必要再麻烦其他人。
radioText.en: If I can handle it alone, no one else needs to get their hands dirty.

radioText.cn: 难怪洛茜放不下心……
radioText.en: No wonder Rossi's worried...

radioText.cn: 卡特洛，我们也好几年没见了吧？你不会已经收了獠牙，在哪儿过起安生日子了吧？哈哈！
radioText.en: Catello, it's been years, eh? You retired those claws and fangs yet? Settling down nice and easy, huh? Hah!

radioText.cn: 对了？洛茜小妹怎么样啦？上回见她，她才这么高呢！
radioText.en: Oh yeah, how's baby Rossi doing? She was only this tall when I last saw her!

radioText.cn: 她很好，就是……没怎么长个。
radioText.en: She's good. And ... she didn't get any bigger.

radioText.cn: 哈哈哈哈哈！这话可别让洛茜小妹知道了，不然她又要揪你耳朵咯！
radioText.en: Yooooo, don't let Rossi catch wind of that, or she'll be yanking your ears again for sure!

radioText.cn: 或许是那个研究员留下的……
radioText.en: This probably belonged to that scientist...

radioText.cn: 但愿，他还能回去做他的研究。
radioText.en: Hope he can still return to his project.

radioText.cn: 有敌袭！
radioText.en: ENEMY ATTACK!

radioText.cn: 别放走他们！
radioText.en: Get 'em! SPARE NO ONE!

radioText.cn: 给我拦住！
radioText.en: STOP THEM!

radioText.cn: 这样下去可不是办法！
radioText.en: The fight isn't working out for us!

radioText.cn: 卡特洛，管理员，我去试试把那个火墙关了。
radioText.en: Catello, Endmin! I'll try my best to shut off that flaming barrier.

radioText.cn: ……我们会掩护你。
radioText.en: ...We'll cover you.

radioText.cn: 卡特洛！你们再坚持下！这火墙有点麻烦……我、我马上就能关掉了！
radioText.en: Catello! Hang in there! This flaming barrier's a real thorn ... b-but I'll shut it down quickly!

radioText.cn: 碾骨的这些家伙还真是会挑地方……
radioText.en: These Bonekrushers sure know where to pick their turf...

radioText.cn: 比这更差的营地我们也不是没待过。
radioText.en: We've had it rougher before.

radioText.cn: 哈哈，那倒是……我这辈子都忘不了，那个困了我俩三天的下水道……
radioText.en: Haha. That's true... I'll never forget, you and me, trapped in that sewer for three whole days...

radioText.cn: 走慢点吧，管理员……这里看起来，非常适合伏击。
radioText.en: Let's slow down a little, Endmin... This place is perfect for an ambush.

radioText.cn: 有一些巡逻的痕迹……看来，离他们的主要活动区域不远了。
radioText.en: Signs of patrols... Looks like we're not too far from their main base.

radioText.cn: 这地方还真是大得过头……
radioText.en: This place is way too big...

radioText.cn: 大有大的好处，不至于多了几个人就被他们发现。
radioText.en: A bigger place has its perks. It makes a group like ours less obvious.

radioText.cn: 管理员，前面恐怕会有敌人，小心点。
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin. There may be enemies up ahead.

radioText.cn: 咦，说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Huh, where were we again?

radioText.cn: 唔，刚才说什么来着？
radioText.en: Uh, what were we talking about just now?

radioText.cn: 继续之前的话题吧。
radioText.en: Let's get back to where we left off.

radioText.cn: 说到一半，那后来呢？
radioText.en: So, what happened next? I wanna hear the rest.

radioText.cn: 啊，继续继续！
radioText.en: Okay, go on then!

radioText.cn: 你刚才说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Where did you leave off?

radioText.cn: 回到刚才的话题……
radioText.en: Let's go back to our last topic...

radioText.cn: 我们接着说吧。
radioText.en: Let's pick up where we left off.

radioText.cn: 是谁话说到一半？我忘了……
radioText.en: Who was talking? Sorry, I lost track...

radioText.cn: 等等，说回正题。
radioText.en: Okay, back to our main topic.

radioText.cn: 你刚才说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Where did you leave off?

radioText.cn: 回到刚才的话题……
radioText.en: Let's go back to our last topic...

radioText.cn: 我们接着说吧。
radioText.en: Let's pick up where we left off.

radioText.cn: 是谁话说到一半？我忘了……
radioText.en: Who was talking? Sorry, I lost track...

radioText.cn: 等等，说回正题。
radioText.en: Okay, back to our main topic.

radioText.cn: 先把刚才的话题说完吧。
radioText.en: Going back to our previous topic...

radioText.cn: 好了，请继续说吧。
radioText.en: Alright. Go on, I'm listening.

radioText.cn: 回到先前说的。
radioText.en: Let's go back to where we left off.

radioText.cn: 我们继续。
radioText.en: Let's continue.

radioText.cn: 刚刚似乎还没说完？
radioText.en: Perhaps we should return to the discussion.

radioText.cn: 我们刚刚在聊……
radioText.en: So, back to what we were talking about...

radioText.cn: 那我继续咯。
radioText.en: I'll get back to where we left off.

radioText.cn: 回到正题。
radioText.en: We shall return to the topic at hand.

radioText.cn: 之前说的是这个话题。
radioText.en: Going back to the topic discussed.

radioText.cn: 话、话说回来！
radioText.en: Perhaps ... we should rewind to where we left off?

radioText.cn: 继续之前的讨论吧。
radioText.en: Shall we get back to our topic?

radioText.cn: 刚才不是还在说——
radioText.en: Were we talking about —

radioText.cn: 先回到上个话题吧。
radioText.en: Let's rewind a bit to the previous topic.

radioText.cn: 欸，说回这儿……
radioText.en: Hold on, let me go back to that...

radioText.cn: 回到刚才那儿……
radioText.en: Back to what I was saying...

radioText.cn: 抱歉，刚才说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Sorry, where was I?

radioText.cn: 回归正题吧。
radioText.en: Let's get back to the topic.

radioText.cn: ……我们说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Now where were we...

radioText.cn: 啊，还没说完呢。
radioText.en: Ah, I'm not done yet.

radioText.cn: 欸，刚刚我说啥来着？
radioText.en: So ... what was I talking about back then?

radioText.cn: 嗯……刚刚说到……
radioText.en: And yeah ... we were saying...?

radioText.cn: 扯远了！
radioText.en: Back to the topic!

radioText.cn: 咱们唠到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Now, where were we?

radioText.cn: 对了，我们讲到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Okay. Where were we again?

radioText.cn: 刚才还没说完。
radioText.en: So, to complete our discussion...

radioText.cn: 刚才说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Where did we leave off?

radioText.cn: 说回正题……
radioText.en: Now, back to the topic...

radioText.cn: 刚才说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Okay, where did we leave off?

radioText.cn: 说回正题……
radioText.en: Now, back to the topic...

radioText.cn: 说回来。
radioText.en: Back to the matter at hand.

radioText.cn: 上一个话题。
radioText.en: So, returning to our path of words.

radioText.cn: 刚刚我们说到了这里……
radioText.en: Want to continue where we left off?

radioText.cn: 我们继续。
radioText.en: Let's pick up where we left off.

radioText.cn: 继续。
radioText.en: Go on.

radioText.cn: 别跑题。
radioText.en: Don't go off-topic.

radioText.cn: 我……我们接着说吧？
radioText.en: Can we ... get back to the last topic?

radioText.cn: 呀，刚才说到哪儿了？
radioText.en: Um, what were we talking about again?

radioText.cn: 等等，被打岔了！
radioText.en: Hold on, I got interrupted!

radioText.cn: 刚说到哪儿？
radioText.en: Where were we just now?

radioText.cn: 先把之前的事说完吧。
radioText.en: So, to continue from the previous topic...

radioText.cn: 继续刚才的话题。
radioText.en: Getting back to where we left off.

radioText.cn: 回到刚才的话题。
radioText.en: Getting back to the previous topic.

radioText.cn: 话说回来。
radioText.en: Back to where we left off.

radioText.cn: 说回前言。
radioText.en: Allow me to resume.

radioText.cn: 先前才说到……
radioText.en: To continue from earlier...

radioText.cn: 莫让这话题消散……
radioText.en: Let us not allow this topic to fade from us...

radioText.cn: 正如刚才所言——
radioText.en: As with what has been said—

radioText.cn: 要继续刚才的话题吗？
radioText.en: Should we continue from our last topic?

radioText.cn: 嗯……我其实是在想……
radioText.en: Well... I was actually pondering...

radioText.cn: 说回上个话题。
radioText.en: Back to the previous topic.

radioText.cn: 刚才还没讲完。
radioText.en: There's more I need to say.

radioText.cn: 刚说什么来着？
radioText.en: What were we saying again?

radioText.cn: 哦，回到刚才说的！
radioText.en: 'K, back to where we were!

radioText.cn: 这道阻碍……和先前遇见的不一样。
radioText.en: This obstacle ... it looks quite different from what we saw before.

radioText.cn: 暂时还分析不出它的能量特征，可能没法用同样的办法对付它。
radioText.en: I can't analyze its energy properties. We probably can't take it down using the same method.

radioText.cn: 我需要收集更多数据来寻找解析它的机会。管理员，继续探索吧。
radioText.en: I need more data for a chance to decipher it. Keep exploring, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 看来是没法轻松靠近“重点目标”了。
radioText.en: Getting close to the "key target" will be a real challenge.

radioText.cn: 活动个体的能量反应很强烈，小心应对。
radioText.en: Active entities are giving off strong energy reactions. Be careful.

radioText.cn: 发现高危敌人。这次是天使吗……
radioText.en: High threat hostile detected. Is it an Aggelos this time...?

radioText.cn: 不管怎样，有它在就没法工作了。交给您了，管理员。
radioText.en: Well, we can't work with it hanging around. Please take care of it, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 确认消灭活动个体，请您来帮忙果然没错。
radioText.en: Active entity eliminated. Securing your assistance is definitely the right way to go.

radioText.cn: 准备扫描第二个“重点目标”，也许它能给仪器提供更多参照数据。
radioText.en: Prepare to scan the second "key target". This might give our device more data references.

radioText.cn: 扫描完成。很好，帝江号上的入口果然又有反应了。
radioText.en: Scan complete. Excellent. The portal aboard Dijiang has reacted again.

radioText.cn: 我不能在里面有人的时候调整仪器参数，如果没有其他要做的事，就尽快撤离吧。
radioText.en: I can't adjust device parameters with someone inside the area. Evac quickly if there's nothing else to do.

radioText.cn: 发现高危个体。不过，相信您会有办法的。
radioText.en: High threat entity detected. But I believe you have what it takes.

radioText.cn: 留意紊乱值的增长情况，如果还有余地，不如趁现在解决它。
radioText.en: Watch the Derangement increase. But if you've got enough tolerance, you should take care of it now.

radioText.cn: 确认消灭活动个体，扫描对象已定位。
radioText.en: Active entity elimination confirmed. Our scan target has been located.

radioText.cn: 侵蚀现象造成了一些干扰，但还能处理……准备扫描工作吧。
radioText.en: The Blight is interfering with this, but I think we can manage it... Let's start the scanning.

radioText.cn: 扫描完成。相关数据已上传。
radioText.en: Scan complete. Relevant data has been uploaded.

radioText.cn: 我有预感，接下来还会出现更奇怪的环境……请尽快撤离吧。
radioText.en: I've got a feeling that the next environment would be even stranger... I say it's time to hit the evac.

radioText.cn: 确认捕捉到需要的能量反应，我们把剩下的“钥匙”找齐吧。
radioText.en: Target energy reaction verified. Let's go and find all the remaining "keys".

radioText.cn: 不错的开始，让我们把剩下的“钥匙”找齐吧。
radioText.en: Not bad for a start. Let's go and find the rest of the "keys".

radioText.cn: 剩余的能量反应还有三处，继续收集“钥匙”吧。
radioText.en: Three energy reaction sites remain. Keep gathering the "keys".

radioText.cn: 好，现在只差三把“钥匙”了。
radioText.en: Good. We just need three more "keys".

radioText.cn: 还剩两把“钥匙”，进展不错。
radioText.en: Two more "keys" remain. We're making good progress.

radioText.cn: 还剩两处能量反应，加快节奏吧。
radioText.en: Two more energy reactions left. Let's pick up the pace.

radioText.cn: 只差一步了，留意搜索最后的“钥匙”。
radioText.en: Almost there. Keep an eye out for the final "key".

radioText.cn: 还剩最后一把“钥匙”，马上就要成功了。
radioText.en: Just one more "key". We're really close to success.

radioText.cn: 已经得到最后一把“钥匙”，这应该就是全部了。
radioText.en: Final "key" found. This should be all of them.

radioText.cn: “钥匙”收集完毕，阻碍已解除。
radioText.en: All the "keys" have been collected. The obstacle is no more.

radioText.cn: 阻碍已解除，可以继续前进了。
radioText.en: Obstacle eliminated. We can now proceed.

radioText.cn: 紊乱值接近危险范围，谨慎行动，管理员。
radioText.en: Derangement is reaching dangerous levels. Be cautious, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 紊乱值的情况不太妙，我们必须仔细规划接下来的行动。
radioText.en: Derangement isn't looking good right now. Our next actions should be well-calculated.

radioText.cn: 已经到极限了。立刻撤离，重复，立刻撤离！
radioText.en: We've hit the limit. Evac immediately. I repeat! Evac immediately!

radioText.cn: 通信稳定性开始崩溃……中止作业，立刻返回。
radioText.en: Comm stability is starting to break down... End the operation and return at once.

radioText.cn: 检测到能量反应，附近应该能找到“钥匙”。
radioText.en: Energy reaction detected. The "key" should be nearby.

radioText.cn: 我在附近检测到了“钥匙”，留意周围，管理员。
radioText.en: I'm detecting the presence of the "key". Look around, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 搜索一下这个区域，“钥匙”应该就在附近。
radioText.en: Search this zone. The "key" should be nearby.

radioText.cn: 滑索？竟然连这种装置都会自然生成吗？
radioText.en: A zipline? Did this place manifest such a complex facility on its own?

radioText.cn: 总之不是件坏事，灵活利用它来压缩赶路的时间吧。
radioText.en: Hmm, it's not bad news. We can make clever use of it and speed up our travels.

radioText.cn: 深度变化更剧烈了，采集行为的确会对环境产生影响。
radioText.en: Depth changes are increasing in magnitude. The act of gathering does indeed affect the ambient environment.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我在监控环境的紊乱值。当它触及警戒线，您就必须撤退了。
radioText.en: Endmin, I'm monitoring the ambient Derangement. You'll have to evac once it hits the danger limit.

radioText.cn: 检测到周围出现活动个体，开始分析……
radioText.en: Active entities detected nearby. Analyzing...

radioText.cn: 果然如此。战斗行为也会提升紊乱值，请谨慎选择交战。
radioText.en: I knew it. Combat will also increase Derangement. Choose your battles carefully, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这些东西……读数很古怪。
radioText.en: These things ... are giving off strange readings.

radioText.cn: 如果有余力，请多收集一些回来。它们应该是不错的研究样本。
radioText.en: Try gathering some if you can keep going. They might serve as excellent research samples.

radioText.cn: 能量反应的信号变大了！
radioText.en: The energy reactions are giving off stronger signals!

radioText.cn: 管理员，想办法靠近那个位置，也许它能解决我们先前遇到的阻碍。
radioText.en: Endmin, try to get close to that location. It might be our solution for the obstacle we encountered.

radioText.cn: 源石是生命的支柱，联系着每一个人。
radioText.en: Originium is the pillar of life, the link that connects everyone.

radioText.cn: 必须阻止污染，这场远征不能失败。
radioText.en: This expedition must not fail.

radioText.cn: 还有呼吸，她还有救！
radioText.en: {F}She's still breathing! We can save her!{M}She's still breathing! We can save her!

radioText.cn: 再坚持一会儿，孩子。我们就在这里，哪儿都不会去的。
radioText.en: {F}Stay with me, child. We won't leave you. We're right here.{M}Stay with me, child. We won't leave you. We're right here.

radioText.cn: 还是冷吗？来，这样……是不是暖和点了？
radioText.en: {F}Feeling cold? Here, come closer... Feeling warmer now?{M}Feeling cold? Here, come closer... Feeling warmer now?

radioText.cn: 你跨过星河，跨过和寰宇深处一样冰冷的死亡，仍然心怀对生命的期望。
radioText.en: You traveled beyond the stars, through death as chill as the cosmic abyss, yet your heart kept hope alive.

radioText.cn: 为了我们，为了明天，你牺牲了自我。
radioText.en: For our sake, and for the days to come — you sacrificed yourself.

radioText.cn: 其实……我一直都希望……你能……自己去找到答案……
radioText.en: Truth be told, I've always wished ... that you would find the answer on your own...

radioText.cn: 去找到你自己……
radioText.en: And find your true self...

radioText.cn: 小心，注意躲避。
radioText.en: Careful, don't get hit.

radioText.cn: 趁现在，破坏它的手臂！
radioText.en: Now! Break its arm!

radioText.cn: 它的力量在失控……
radioText.en: Its powers are running rampant...

radioText.cn: 倾尽全力进攻吧！
radioText.en: Unleash your full attack!

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 吾曾见，统御者，遗忘自我。
radioText.en: Saw I the throne-bearer, lost unto his lore.

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 漫漫长疆，无人永治。
radioText.en: O'er boundless realms no crown endureth evermore.

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 兴起。
radioText.en: Glory lifteth thee.

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 登峰。
radioText.en: Honour enthroneth thee.

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 陨落。
radioText.en: Time seizeth thee.

radioText.cn: 征程注定充满艰险。
radioText.en: This *will* be a difficult campaign.

radioText.cn: 用<@qu.key>滑索</>跨过阻碍吧。
radioText.en: <@qu.key>Zip</> across when you're ready.

radioText.cn: 敌人就在眼前，开始战斗吧。
radioText.en: The enemy is here. Time to fight.

radioText.cn: 那声音是……必须阻止倒计时！
radioText.en: That voice... We must stop that countdown!

radioText.cn: “死亡”……快要靠岸了……
radioText.en: Death ... is nearing the shore...

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 新生，沉寂。
radioText.en: Dawn. Dusk.

radioText.cn: 名字……“佩丽卡”，怎么样？
radioText.en: {F}Name... How about ... Perlica?{M}Name... How about ... Perlica?

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 吾曾见，征服者，毙于征途。
radioText.en: Saw I the war-wielder, fall'n amid the gore.

actorName.cn: 深邃的呢喃{埃尔埃格尼斯的呢喃}

radioText.cn: 吾曾见，拒亡者，一无所有。
radioText.en: Saw I the grave-mocker, lost upon death's shore.

radioText.cn: 天使，这些遥远的生命永远不知疲倦。
radioText.en: Aggeloi, a most alien lifeform that never tires.

radioText.cn: 它们散播灾难，带来毁灭。这场对抗已经持续了百余年。
radioText.en: For over a hundred years we resisted their ruin and devastation.

radioText.cn: 天使的数量还在增加。
radioText.en: The Aggeloi grow in number.

radioText.cn: 前进吧，这些困难阻止不了我们。
radioText.en: Press on. This challenge cannot stop us.

radioText.cn: 这些花是……
radioText.en: {F}These flowers are...{M}These flowers are...

radioText.cn: 一份遗产，一座墓碑。一个孤独的灵魂不该背负如此重任。
radioText.en: A legacy. A tomb. A lonely soul never meant to bear such burdens.

radioText.cn: 而你最终……没有选择放下。
radioText.en: In the end ... you chose not to let go.

radioText.cn: 我们早已退无可退，迈进吧。
radioText.en: We can no longer retreat. Let's stride forth.

radioText.cn: 用你真正的武器，开辟生路。
radioText.en: Use your true weapon. Forge a path for the living.

radioText.cn: 生命总会反抗，这是我们的天性，也是我们的命运。
radioText.en: Life always fights back. It is our nature, and our fate.

radioText.cn: 从残骸中奋起，在灰烬里重生。
radioText.en: Rise from ruin, and be reborn in the ashes.

radioText.cn: 终点越来越近了。
radioText.en: The end draws closer.

radioText.cn: 跨过这里，你将面对最后的考验。
radioText.en: Cross this chasm to face your final trial.

radioText.cn: 你……也在帮我。
radioText.en: {F}Even you ... have decided to help me.{M}Even you ... have decided to help me.

radioText.cn: 守住阵线！一只都不要放过去！
radioText.en: Hold the line! Let none pass through our defenses!

radioText.cn: 弹药不多，人管够……他要几支小队？
radioText.en: Ammo's low, but the crew is firm... How many squads does he need?

radioText.cn: 这里还有幸存者？医疗队呢？
radioText.en: Survivors? Here? Where are the medics?

radioText.cn: 用力！石头脑袋！就这点本事吗！
radioText.en: I barely felt that, Rockbugger! Is that all you've got?

radioText.cn: 曾经，帝江号陷入过重大危机。当时，我们就是在你的带领下挽救了它。
radioText.en: There was a time when we were close to losing Dijiang. But we followed your lead and saved the ship.

radioText.cn: 自那之后，逃出生天的帝江号就一直以低功耗维护状态在近地轨道运行。
radioText.en: Dijiang survived the day. Ever since then, we've kept her at low orbit and minimum power.

radioText.cn: 我们依靠从地面送回的物资逐步修复舰船，也在这里研发新的技术。
radioText.en: We're now repairing Dijiang using ground-supplied materials. The ship is also where we develop new technologies.

radioText.cn: 抱歉……我都不记得了。
radioText.en: {F}Sorry ... I remember nothing at all.{M}Sorry ... I remember nothing at all.

radioText.cn: 不必自责，管理员，请跟我来。
radioText.en: Don't blame yourself, Endministrator. Follow me.

radioText.cn: 真是个好消息，看来管理员对通讯节点的修复十分有效。
radioText.en: The Endmin's repair work on the comms node seems very effective. This is good news.

radioText.cn: 我们赶紧去中控塔吧，帝江号能为接下来的工作提供许多帮助。
radioText.en: Let's hurry over to the Control Tower. Dijiang can also offer plenty of support for various tasks we'll be getting.

radioText.cn: 为了尽快提供更多信息支援，我们特地提高了清理会客室的优先级。
radioText.en: To facilitate the swift acquisition of clues, we have specifically prioritized the cleanup of the Reception Room.

radioText.cn: S.O.W.应该会很感激这个调整。不过，为什么帝江号的修复进度变快了？
radioText.en: The SOW will appreciate this adjustment. Operator Xaihi, may I ask what prompted the accelerated repairs of Dijiang?

radioText.cn: 最近几日，源石动力组件的运转状态大幅改善，我们因此获得了更多可分配的能源。
radioText.en: Over the past several days, the Originium drive module has exhibited significant performance enhancements, thereby increasing the amount of energy available for allocation.

radioText.cn: 佩丽卡监督，下一站是？
radioText.en: Supervisor Perlica, where should we head to next?

radioText.cn: 接下来，我们可以将帝江号的控制权限正式开放给管理员了。
radioText.en: We can now officially hand over the control authority of Dijiang to our Endministrator.

radioText.cn: 给我？可是我还……
radioText.en: {F}Me? But I'm still...{M}Me? But I'm still...

radioText.cn: 别担心。当你回到舰桥，再一次掌握它，我相信……一切都会重新契合的。
radioText.en: Don't worry. Once you return to the Bridge and re-establish control, I believe every piece will fall perfectly in place.

radioText.cn: 裂地者……难道是因为锚点造成混乱，他们来趁火打劫？
radioText.en: Those Landbreakers... Were they here to loot our base amidst the chaos?

radioText.cn: 可锚点才坠落多久？这未免也太凑巧了。
radioText.en: But showing up right after the Ankhorfall? That's too much of a coincidence.

radioText.cn: ……事情可能比我们想的还要复杂。
radioText.en: Things could be more complex than we thought.

radioText.cn: 按照原计划，我们应该在附近进行协议核心的部署并测试运行。
radioText.en: Our original plan was to deploy the Protocol Automation-Core nearby and run some tests.

radioText.cn: 但我没想到这里的受袭情况这么严重……得先恢复枢纽区基地的运作才行。
radioText.en: But with the Hub Base severely damaged, we need to get it up and running first.

radioText.cn: 管理员，请先激活<@qu.key>协议传送点</>吧，这会方便各位之后的行动。
radioText.en: Endmin, let's first activate the tele-protocol point. <@qu.key>TP points</> will let the team move around faster.

radioText.cn: 安德烈刚刚和我同步了您的情况……请务必注意自身安全。
radioText.en: And ... Andre just updated me about your condition... Please keep yourself safe out there.

radioText.cn: 必须尽快突破这里……管理员，我们采用协作战术吧。
radioText.en: We need to break through here ASAP... Time to adopt team combat tactics, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 只要把握机会追击，我们可以互相配合，发动更强的攻势。
radioText.en: Seize the chance to press the attack. Our strikes are more effective when we coordinate.

radioText.cn: 就这样把它们全解决掉吧，管理员。
radioText.en: Let's take down these enemies together, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这个天使看起来不好对付，请小心。
radioText.en: This Aggelos looks dangerous. We need to be cautious.

radioText.cn: 我们可以集中火力，击溃它的防御。
radioText.en: We can focus our attacks to bring down its defenses.

radioText.cn: 就是这样，管理员。
radioText.en: That's it, Endministrator!

radioText.cn: 用相同策略解决掉剩下的敌人吧。
radioText.en: Let's use the same tactics to take down the remaining enemies.

radioText.cn: 枢纽区基地还是接不通……
radioText.en: The Hub Base still isn't picking up our calls.

radioText.cn: 我们得赶快了。
radioText.en: We need to hurry.

radioText.cn: 这扇门受损严重，看样子是打不开了。
radioText.en: The gate looks severely damaged. I don't think we can open it.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们看看还有没有其他路能通过。
radioText.en: Endministrator, let's look for another way around this.

radioText.cn: 这条绳索很结实……也许是幸存者留下的。
radioText.en: This rope looks sturdy... Some of the survivors probably left it here.

radioText.cn: 喂，喂！根本联系不上秦主管，管不了了，我们先跑吧！
radioText.en: Hello? HELLLOOOO?! Director Qin isn't picking up the call. Forget it. Let's just get ourselves out of here.

radioText.cn: 要不，用、用这根绳子？但是，会不会太、太高？
radioText.en: Maybe ... maybe we should use this ... this rope. But ... but it's ... it's a long climb up there.

radioText.cn: 少废话！你总不想死在这里吧——赶紧！有东西过来——
radioText.en: Zip it and start climbing if you wanna live! Quickly—! Something's coming—

radioText.cn: 滋啦——滋啦——
radioText.en: AARARAAARGGH!

radioText.cn: 嗯，管理员，从这里走。
radioText.en: This should be the way. Let's continue, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 那就是锚点。
radioText.en: That is an Ankhor.

radioText.cn: 锚点能够制造天使，是塔卫二上一大威胁源头。
radioText.en: Ankhors are capable of spawning Aggeloi. They pose a major threat to Talos-II.

radioText.cn: 我们需要尽快寻找幸存者。
radioText.en: We must find the survivors, and quickly.

radioText.cn: 受损太严重了……
radioText.en: The damages are so severe...

radioText.cn: 秦工程师一向把枢纽区基地管理得井井有条。连这里都已经失控的话，情况恐怕不容乐观。
radioText.en: Director Qin has always kept the Hub Base in good order. But if she lost control of the area, things inside the base could get bad.

radioText.cn: ……但愿不要有太多人员伤亡。
radioText.en: ...I hope for the safety of our people.

radioText.cn: 看那儿！管理员，快！
radioText.en: Look there, Endmin! We must act now!

actorName.cn: 作战人员{e1m1-枢纽区战斗人员}

radioText.cn: 该死，来了个大家伙！
radioText.en: Blight this nonsense! We got a big one incoming!

actorName.cn: 作战人员{e1m1-枢纽区战斗人员}

radioText.cn: 撤回掩体，我们得重整防线！
radioText.en: Get to cover! We need to fall back and regroup!

radioText.cn: 这里先交给我们。管理员，请小心。
radioText.en: Leave them to us. Careful, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 基地的安保人员正在苦苦支撑，我们必须加快动作了。
radioText.en: Our Security Division is fighting hard to keep the threat at bay. We must hurry.

radioText.cn: 锚点的弱点在于其稳定核心，只要破坏它，就能让整个结构解体。
radioText.en: The stabilizing core of the Ankhor is its weakness. Take that out and the entire construct will disintegrate.

radioText.cn: 核心很脆弱，锚点附近群聚的天使才是拆除工作的难点。恶战不可避免。
radioText.en: The core itself is fragile, but the real challenge is the Aggeloi swarming around it. A tough fight is inevitable.

radioText.cn: 是集群的小型天使……得阻止它们。
radioText.en: A cluster of smaller Aggeloi... We must stop them.

radioText.cn: 坚持住！马上就结束了！
radioText.en: Stay strong, people! We're winning!

radioText.cn: 还剩两个！
radioText.en: Two more!

radioText.cn: 再坚持一下！
radioText.en: Stay in the fight!

radioText.cn: 天使越来越多了，迅速解决它们，然后通过这里！
radioText.en: We are facing more Aggeloi. They must be neutralized so we can push through.

radioText.cn: 裂地者？他们怎么会出现在这里？
radioText.en: Landbreakers? What are they doing here?

radioText.cn: 可算来人了……佩丽卡监督，锚点！打锚点！
radioText.en: By Talos! Supervisor Perlica! The Ankhor! Take out the Ankhor!

radioText.cn: 安德烈先生就交给陈千语吧，我们先去支援秦工程师。
radioText.en: Chen will keep Mr. Andre safe. Let's go and support Director Qin.

radioText.cn: 好嘞，接下来，只要从协议核心开始电力运输……
radioText.en: Nicely done. Our next step is to start power transmission from the PAC.

radioText.cn: 这儿！管理员！连到这里来！
radioText.en: Endmin, just plug the cable in right here!

radioText.cn: 完成集成工业系统是终末地最重要的使命之一，它是终末地应对塔卫二危机的核心方案。
radioText.en: Completing the Automated Industry Complex is a top priority for Endfield Industries. It is our core solution for dealing with the hazards of Talos-II.

radioText.cn: 终末地数年之前就完成了协议核心技术的基础验证。不过，最关键的难关却迟迟无法突破……直到最近。
radioText.en: Endfield completed basic verifications of the PAC technology several years ago. However, we encountered a crucial bottleneck that delayed our progress ... until recently.

radioText.cn: 只差一步了，管理员。
radioText.en: We're almost there, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 管理员，部署协议核心后，协议同步器的各项功能已经可以使用。
radioText.en: Endmin, now that the Automation-Core has been deployed, we can finally access various features of our Protocol Synchronizers.

radioText.cn: 我们可以快速到达协议核心和协议传送点了，协议传送技术会成为我们接下来的重要助力。
radioText.en: We can now instantly travel to the PAC as well as various TP Points. This teleportal tech will be extremely helpful for our subsequent operations.

radioText.cn: 真是好大的阵仗……这么嚣张的裂地者不多见啊。
radioText.en: Those Landbreakers are giving us a show of force... It's rare to see LBs this arrogant.

radioText.cn: 在裂地者三大氏族之中，碾骨氏族是最崇尚暴力的一支。
radioText.en: Of the three major Landbreaker clans, the Bonekrushers are the ones who actively respect violence.

radioText.cn: 根据S.O.W.的情报，近几个月，该氏族突然停止了长期的内部争斗，对其他小型组织发动了数次袭击。
radioText.en: According to intel from the SOW, this clan has suddenly stopped their extended infighting, and launched multiple raids on other minor factions.

radioText.cn: 我们暂时还没有获得更多细节。唯一能确认的是，有一位“领袖”突然出现并统一了碾骨氏族。
radioText.en: We don't have any further intel yet. The only thing we can confirm is that a "leader" has emerged and united the entire Bonekrusher Clan.

radioText.cn: 看那边！好像有人被困住了！
radioText.en: Over there! Someone's trapped!

radioText.cn: 来啊！你们这些混账东西！我今天要是怂了，我就不是个工团人！
radioText.en: Come get some, you blight-eating scabs! Workers of the U-double-U will never back down!

radioText.cn: 是工团的工人！先救人！
radioText.en: He's with the UWST! We've gotta save him first!

radioText.cn: 哈！咱们运气不错，这台设备完好无损，优先处理其他麻烦吧。
radioText.en: Hah! We got lucky! This facility is undamaged! Time to focus on other issues.

radioText.cn: 有工团成员被俘虏了，先击溃这些裂地者！
radioText.en: The raiders have taken a UWST crew mate prisoner. We must defeat them!

radioText.cn: 刚才那位大哥……扳手好像沾着点血吧……
radioText.en: Hey, about that dude just now... I think I saw some blood on his wrench...

radioText.cn: ……北方？那边确实有试图融入工团的难民聚落，但这些裂地者也是从北方来的？
radioText.en: North...? There is a refugee camp north of here trying to work for the UWST. But these raiders came from that direction too?

radioText.cn: 协议核心是解决问题的关键，先确保预定部署位置的安全吧。
radioText.en: The Protocol Automation-Core is the key to ending this crisis. We need to secure its landing zone.

actorName.cn: 慌张的裂地者{e1-慌张的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 切电线！砸开关！砸掉盒子！
radioText.en: Cut the wires! Break the switches! Then SMASH the crates!

actorName.cn: 慌张的裂地者{e1-慌张的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 别让头领，*咕哝*，等太久！你们知道下场！
radioText.en: Don't let baws *swallows* wait too long! You know what happens when baws waits too long!

radioText.cn: 猎物！自己来了！噫哈！
radioText.en: Fresh meat! We got fresh meat coming! YEEHAW!

radioText.cn: 抄家伙！全部干掉！干掉！
radioText.en: Draw steel, boys! KRUSH 'EM! KRUSH 'EM ALL!

actorName.cn: 慌张的裂地者{e1-慌张的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 我去喊人！*咕哝*撑住！
radioText.en: I'll go get help! *Swallows*. Hold them off, boys!

radioText.cn: 哈哈！你们被包围啦！
radioText.en: Hah! We're all around ya!

radioText.cn: 幸好安德烈先生让我们准备好了晶体外壳，省了不少工夫。
radioText.en: These Origocrusts really saved us some trouble. We have Mr. Andre to thank for that.

radioText.cn: 确实有些资料被带走了……可是零件在哪里？
radioText.en: Some documents have been taken away... But what about the parts?

radioText.cn: 裂地者在这里停留了很久，但没有打斗痕迹，蹲守或伏击应该都没有成功。
radioText.en: The Landbreakers lingered here for quite a while. No signs of combat — likely a failed stakeout or ambush.

radioText.cn: 连这种地方都破拆开了，他们找得很仔细。
radioText.en: They even breached this place. These Landbreakers are clearly covering every inch.

radioText.cn: 资料被人翻过……难道已经被带走了？
radioText.en: Someone has flipped through these data files... Were some of them taken away?

radioText.cn: 脚印往深处去了！
radioText.en: The footprints lead deeper into this facility!

radioText.cn: 后面应该是一条死路……我们得再快一点。
radioText.en: That would lead to a dead end... We should hurry up.

actorName.cn: 慌张的裂地者{e1-慌张的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 一定藏起来了！头领要那个箱子！*咕哝*再搜一遍！
radioText.en: It MUST be somewhere! Baws wants the crate! *Mumbles*. Search this place again!

radioText.cn: 好、好像……安静了？
radioText.en: So quiet ... m-maybe they're gone?

radioText.cn: 嘘……躲好，别出声。
radioText.en: Shhhh... Keep your head down and shush.

radioText.cn: 脚印在这个方向消失了。我们得想办法抵达上方的平台，看看周围有没有可以垫脚的箱子吧。
radioText.en: The footprints fade into that direction. We need to find a way to reach the upper platform. Let's look around. Perhaps we can find a crate to hop on.

radioText.cn: 这样安德烈先生就可以放心了吧。
radioText.en: Now that everything's settled, I guess Mr. Andre can finally breathe easy.

radioText.cn: 回头一定要让胖大鸟请客！管理员，佩丽卡，你们可不能惯着他呀！
radioText.en: Guys, you've gotta make Big Owl treat us to a mega feast! Otherwise, you're just spoiling him!

radioText.cn: 别让他们走！东西，留下！
radioText.en: You! Stop! Drop the loot!

radioText.cn: 箱子，把箱子抢回来！
radioText.en: That crate! It's ours!

radioText.cn: 管理员，协议核心同样能够成为协议传送的目标落点。
radioText.en: Endmin, the Automation-Core can also be a target destination for tele-protocol.

radioText.cn: 时间有限，我们可以通过协议传送直接返程。
radioText.en: Time is a luxury we don't really have. So, let's try using tele-protocol and get back to the Automation-Core instantly.

radioText.cn: 便携源石矿机会自动将一部分产出用于能源转化，不需要专门供电就能独立运作，很方便野外作业。
radioText.en: The Portable Originium Rig automatically sets aside some of the excavated ore to power itself. This self-sustaining auto-miner does not require an external source of electricity, making it the best mining solution in the wilderness.

radioText.cn: 就是这里了，管理员，把便携源石矿机放在这个矿点上方。
radioText.en: This is the place, Endmin. Let's deploy the Portable Originium Rig on this mining spot.

radioText.cn: 管理员，许多遗留在野外的损坏设备都可以进行简单的修复。
radioText.en: We can repair many of the damaged facilities we encounter in the wilderness, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 让它们重新运作起来，兴许会对我们有帮助。
radioText.en: Restoring their operations might be very helpful for us.

radioText.cn: 管理员，现在我们可以大批量生产晶体外壳。和先前一样，用精炼炉来加工。
radioText.en: Endmin, we can now produce Origocrusts in batches. Just like before, we'll make them by putting Originium Ore into the Refining Unit.

radioText.cn: 矿石和木材一类的资源在塔卫二野外随处可见。
radioText.en: You'll see plenty of ore formations and trees in the wilderness of Talos-II.

radioText.cn: 如果没有更好的工具，直接攻击它们就能采集。
radioText.en: Since we lack proper gathering tools, I suppose we can ... hit them with our weapons?

radioText.cn: 正好让管理员看看我新想到的剑法！
radioText.en: Nice! I guess it's time to show the Endmin my new moves!

radioText.cn: 把粉碎机部署在协议核心附近吧。
radioText.en: Try to deploy the Shredding Unit close to the PAC.

radioText.cn: 管理员，启动粉碎机的操作面板，就能查看使用方法。
radioText.en: Endmin! Activate the Shredding Unit control panel to check how it's used.

radioText.cn: 很简单吧？和精炼炉其实也大差不差！现在，用粉碎机来加工源石粉末吧。
radioText.en: Simple and intuitive, right? It shares the same basic control panel as the Refining Unit. I say it's time to shred some Originium Ore to powder!

radioText.cn: 走吧，去军械库！我离开武陵城以后再也没放过“烟花”了！
radioText.en: We got the powder! Time to head to the arsenal! I haven't had proper fireworks ever since I left Wuling.

radioText.cn: 如果我记得没错，那个军械库也是由终末地的武库工程师在管理。
radioText.en: If I'm not mistaken, the local arsenal is managed by an arsenal engineer from Endfield.

radioText.cn: “武库工程师”……我记得在终末地见过一个永远抱着武器的小姑娘，和她有关系？
radioText.en: Arsenal engineer...? I remember seeing a little girl who was always running around with weapons in her arms back in Endfield... Are they related?

radioText.cn: 终末地的武库工程师们都是在武器装备方面样样精通的好手。至于你见到过的那位，则是他们的总负责人。
radioText.en: The arsenal engineers of Endfield Industries are professionals in all forms of armaments. The little girl you saw is actually their director.

radioText.cn: 之后有空的话，也会正式介绍给管理员和陈。我想你们一定合得来。
radioText.en: I'll properly introduce our arsenal director once we find the time. I'm sure she will get along with you and our Endmin.

radioText.cn: 真的完全堵死了。我们去找终末地的干员吧。
radioText.en: Ugh. There's no way we can get through all this rubble. Let's go and find our fellow Endfielder.

radioText.cn: 好嘞，可得丢准点……
radioText.en: Alrighty. Hope I don't miss.

radioText.cn: 厉害呀，正中靶心，满分爆破！
radioText.en: Right on target! I give that explosion a ten out of ten!

radioText.cn: 陈，我记得你曾经也因为烟火的事情折腾出不小的动静，也许你有这方面的天赋……
radioText.en: Chen, I remember you making quite a scene with some fireworks. Perhaps you have a ... knack for demolition work...

radioText.cn: 嘘！别、别当这么多人的面说！都是过去的事了！
radioText.en: SHHHH!!! Not here! Not in front of so many people, Perly! That happened way, way back!

radioText.cn: 首先，部署一台精炼炉，它是最典型的生产设备。
radioText.en: Let's deploy a Refining Unit. It's a typical production facility.

radioText.cn: 管理员，不如咱们从这个洞口直接跳下去？
radioText.en: Endmin, let's just jump down this hole!

radioText.cn: 陈千语，不要怂恿管理员做这种……算了。
radioText.en: Chen, stop giving the Endmin dangerous—Ugh. Forget it.

radioText.cn: 裂地者行为背后的联系，似乎都指向了安德烈的原型机、终末地工业……甚至说，你，管理员。
radioText.en: Every action taken by the Landbreakers ... seems to be pointed at Andre's prototype, Endfield Industries, and ... even you, Endministrator.

radioText.cn: 出发吧，该去亲自揭开真相了。
radioText.en: I say it's time to go and reveal the truth.

actorName.cn: 慌张的裂地者{e1-慌张的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 继续找！我去看看，别的地方！
radioText.en: Keep looking! I'll poke around ... other places!

radioText.cn: 接下来需要部署的是供电桩，它能为附近的集成工业系统设备进行无线供电。
radioText.en: Next, deploy an Electric Pylon. It can wirelessly provide electrical power to nearby AIC facilities.

radioText.cn: 完成准备工序后，就能打开精炼炉了。
radioText.en: Construction complete. We can now activate the Refining Unit.

radioText.cn: 精炼炉启动了。只要把原材料放进去，它就会按照设置来自动加工。
radioText.en: The Refining Unit has been activated! Put some raw materials into it and processing will begin automatically!

radioText.cn: 用它把源矿加工成晶体外壳吧。
radioText.en: Add some Originium Ore to have the materials refined into Origocrust.

radioText.cn: 别人留下的共享设备只能保留一段时间。想用的话，就赶紧试试吧。
radioText.en: Shared facilities left by others are temporary. Feel free to try them out if you want!

radioText.cn: 说起来，集成工业系统并不打算只在谷地应用吧？
radioText.en: Speaking of which, the Valley won't be the only place that's getting an AIC Factory, right?

radioText.cn: 四号谷地只是集成工业系统的第一站。将来，我们还会把它推广到开拓区各处。
radioText.en: Valley IV is the first step for the AIC Factory. Our plan is to deploy the AIC in various regions along the frontiers.

radioText.cn: 再之后呢？
radioText.en: So what happens after that?

radioText.cn: 嗯？之后？
radioText.en: Uh ... after that?

radioText.cn: 进入开拓区之后。你想见到什么样的景色？城市兴起？还是想看到所有人都能安居乐业？
radioText.en: Yeah. Once we step into the frontiers, what do you want to see? Brand new cities? Or cozy homes for everybody?

radioText.cn: ……这些景象我都想见到。
radioText.en: ...I actually hope to see all those visions you listed.

radioText.cn: 不过，我还真没想过这个问题。也许……我只是想看见长久以来的愿望尘埃落定的那一刻。
radioText.en: But truth be told, I never thought about the question you asked. Perhaps ... I only hope to witness the fulfillment of a long-held wish.

radioText.cn: 佩丽卡的愿望，一定又正经又善良吧。
radioText.en: Oh, a wish from Perly... I bet it's something noble and compassionate.

radioText.cn: 不，不是我的心愿。是……别人的愿望。别人给我的愿望。
radioText.en: Uhm, no, it's not a wish from me. It came from someone else ... someone who shared it with me.

radioText.cn: 哇！这看着可比照片里的严重多了！
radioText.en: Woah... This looks way worse than the photo.

radioText.cn: 不过，很奇怪。大门竟然是在关闭状态被破坏了电路……更像是里面的敌人为了阻碍别人进去似的。
radioText.en: Something's not right. They smashed the circuitry when the gate was closed... Those inside probably want to keep everyone out.

radioText.cn: 没有反应……这个开关好像缺了一些部件。
radioText.en: {F}No response... This switch seems to be missing a few parts.{M}No response... This switch seems to be missing a few parts.

actorName.cn: 裂地者头目{e1m4-残忍的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 哼，废物。让我来！
radioText.en: Useless trash! Watch and learn how to really kill!

radioText.cn: 没完没了！
radioText.en: Ugh, more LBs?

radioText.cn: 佩丽卡，这些人可不是一般的裂地者！
radioText.en: Careful, Perlica! These mobs are something else!

actorName.cn: 裂地者头目{e1m4-残忍的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 头领……不会……放过你……
radioText.en: The baws ... will ... hunt you down...

radioText.cn: 管理员，线缆的长度不够啊，要想延伸到桥头，咱们得多部署几个中继器。
radioText.en: The cable is too short, Endmin. We must deploy more Relay Towers to relay the electricity to the bridge.

radioText.cn: 要我说，咱们该开发点加长线缆了！
radioText.en: If it were up to me, I'd tell the Engineering Division to make longer cables!

radioText.cn: 搞定！不过一个中继器肯定不够，继续部署吧。
radioText.en: Done! But one Relay Tower won't be enough. We gotta plop down a few more.

radioText.cn: 接下来，只要把电连到供电终端，桥梁开关就能启动。
radioText.en: Next, we'll connect the cable to the Electric Nexus and activate the bridge switch.

radioText.cn: 狼卫，有个问题不知当不当问——
radioText.en: Wulfgard, got a question for you but it might sound inappropriate—

radioText.cn: 不知当不当问，那你就别问了。
radioText.en: If it's inappropriate, keep it to yourself.

radioText.cn: 嗐！我听说咱们的“裂地者专家”以前就是裂地者氏族出身，你……？
radioText.en: Aiyo! C'mon, I just heard we have a Landbreaker specialist — and that he's from a Landbreaker clan. Are you...?

radioText.cn: ……我的氏族叫作“狼群”。和碾骨氏族不一样，我的族人有纪律，知道应当在什么时候使用暴力。
radioText.en: My clan is called the Pack. Unlike the Bonekrushers, we are disciplined. We know when to dispense violence.

radioText.cn: 所以……就是说，他们是土匪，你们是大侠咯？
radioText.en: So that means ... the Bonekrushers are bandit raiders while the Pack are the heroic wildland rangers?

radioText.cn: 基地的工人们为我们提前准备了一些中继器，我们把电力接到桥头吧。
radioText.en: Hi folks. The Hub Base crew has prepared several Relay Towers for us. Let's use them to connect the bridge to the grid.

radioText.cn: ……你们有没有闻到什么东西被烧焦的味道？
radioText.en: *Sniff* ...Do you smell something burning?

radioText.cn: 是碾骨的小伎俩。
radioText.en: Smells like a Bonekrusher trick.

radioText.cn: 小心！我们最好先避开这些烟雾。
radioText.en: Careful! We should avoid this haze for now.

radioText.cn: ……只有这条小路，先前进吧。
radioText.en: This seems like the only trail. Let's take it.

radioText.cn: 迷雾重重，工团那边也没有消息，我很担心裂地者会做些什么。
radioText.en: The haze is spreading, and we've had no updates from the UWST. I'm concerned the Landbreakers are planning something.

radioText.cn: 菲奥娜不是说附近有居民生活么，怎么连影子都没见着？
radioText.en: Hey, Fiona mentioned there may be people living in this area, but we haven't seen anyone...

radioText.cn: 确实有点蹊跷。
radioText.en: It certainly is suspicious.

radioText.cn: 嘘！前面有动静！
radioText.en: Shh! I hear something.

radioText.cn: 喂！停下！这家伙怎么跑得那么快！
radioText.en: Hey! Stop! Geez, how's he running so fast?

radioText.cn: 对弱者而言，保持恐惧并远离陌生人，是最合适的生存策略。
radioText.en: The weak survive best by fearing and fleeing.

radioText.cn: 这里的道路还挺曲折的。
radioText.en: The trails here can be difficult to track.

radioText.cn: 嗯，去山洞的路很隐蔽，所以裂地者一直找不到这里。
radioText.en: Yeah. The path to the cave is very well hidden. The breaker scum haven't found out about our place yet.

radioText.cn: 我出来的时候，他们还没到附近。没想到已经靠得这么近了……
radioText.en: They weren't here when I first came out. I don't know when and how they got so close...

radioText.cn: 已经有了足够的晶体外壳，可以去次级核心制造铳械塔了。
radioText.en: We now have enough Origocrusts to construct a Gun Tower at the Sub-PAC.

radioText.cn: 放置铳械塔需要选一个优势地形。
radioText.en: We need to find a good, advantageous site for deploying the Gun Tower.

radioText.cn: 这里就挺不错嘛。
radioText.en: This place looks pretty neat.

radioText.cn: 漂亮！有了这些，是不是就可以暴打那些裂地者了？
radioText.en: Nicely done! We're gonna give those Landbreakers a world of hurt!

radioText.cn: 没错，接下来就是让居民们熟悉它们。
radioText.en: That's right. But we also need to teach Soth's people how to use them.

actorName.cn: 裂地者斥候{e1m6-裂地者斥候}

radioText.cn: 报仇！夺回来！全都抢回来！
radioText.en: REVENGE! Take back what is ours! ALL OF IT!

actorName.cn: 裂地者斥候{e1m6-裂地者斥候}

radioText.cn: *咕哝*一个都别放过！
radioText.en: *Mumble*. No prisoners!

radioText.cn: 糟、糟了，那些家伙又来了！
radioText.en: Talos save us! They're coming again!

radioText.cn: 别慌，交给作战设备。
radioText.en: Keep it together. Let our combat facilities handle them.

radioText.cn: 管理员？你们刚才去了哪里？我突然检测不到你们的信号了。
radioText.en: Endmin? Where did you all go just now? I lost all your signals out of the blue.

radioText.cn: 协议空间又出现了？唔，可能和管理员的苏醒有关……我还侦测到不少类似的反应，记得调查一下！
radioText.en: You were in the Protocol Space? Hmm. This might be related to your awakening, Endmin... I've detected similar reactions across the region. Investigate them if you can.

radioText.cn: 千万别出事啊……要是他们真被裂地者抓了，我们还能把人救出来吗？
radioText.en: I hope Mark and his crew are alright... But what if the LBs really did get them?

radioText.cn: 裂地者对“绑架”或是“赎金”缺乏概念——
radioText.en: Landbreakers don't do hostages or ransom.

radioText.cn: 咳咳！可以的，他们一定还活蹦乱跳的！
radioText.en: Ahem! Okay! I believe they are still alive and well!

radioText.cn: 这里被落石挡住了。
radioText.en: We got rocks blocking the path.

radioText.cn: 那些是能够引爆的简制炸弹……威力足够把落石炸开。
radioText.en: Those simple explosives there should be able to blast apart the rocks.

radioText.cn: 这破坏力，真不错！
radioText.en: They sure pack a punch!

radioText.cn: 侵蚀废料被刮削过，有人从这上面收集了碎屑。
radioText.en: I see marks of scraping on this Blighted waste. Someone's been collecting the shavings.

radioText.cn: 没有外伤和挣扎痕迹，呼吸道里有残渣。还有，他在手上刻了印记。
radioText.en: No sign of external injuries or struggle. There's residue in the respiratory tract, and glyphs etched onto his hands.

radioText.cn: “拥抱深渊，获得新生”——应该是这个意思。
radioText.en: "Embrace the Abyss. Gain new life" — I believe that's what it means.

radioText.cn: 似乎还有些信息可以收集，我们再调查一下吧。
radioText.en: I think there is more information we can use. Let's investigate this place and find out.

radioText.cn: 上前来，碾骨氏族。
radioText.en: Come forth, Bonekrushers.

radioText.cn: 你们被遗弃在边陲，被灾荒和饥饿统治。你们被当作叛徒、恶人、疯子和劫匪。
radioText.en: You were abandoned here to suffer and starve. They treat you as traitors, evil doers, lunatics, and bandits.

radioText.cn: 但他们称呼你们为……“裂地者”。一群他们口中的乌合之众，却保留了这样一个有力的名字。
radioText.en: They call you Landbreakers... You are treated as disorganized rabble, yet your name carries great force.

radioText.cn: 名字……意味着过往，这个名字是你们反抗的烙印，反抗暴君的烙印。
radioText.en: This name ... harkens back to your past. It is the burning brand of your resistance, of your fight against tyranny.

radioText.cn: 靠近之后，这座“巨塔”的压迫感更强了。
radioText.en: This huge tower looks really imposing up close.

radioText.cn: 咳……咳。烟雾好呛人，我们快些关停它。
radioText.en: *Hakk* ... *kaff*... The smoke's choking me. Let's shut it down quickly.

radioText.cn: 压迫感就是碾骨氏族想传达的信息……他们想让人恐惧。
radioText.en: This is how the Bonekrushers instill fear — by suffocating their prey.

radioText.cn: 有同伴，好对付。*咕哝*你们学着点。
radioText.en: Enemies? Pfft. Weak. *Mumbles*. You! Watch and learn.

radioText.cn: 等等，等等……是头领说过的人！
radioText.en: Wait! Hey... The baws talked about these people!

radioText.cn: 这些就是供能用的小型巢雕，按计划破坏它们。
radioText.en: These smaller denstacks supply energy to the large one. Destroy them.

radioText.cn: 这看着就是砍两刀的小事。
radioText.en: It probably can't take two hits from my blade.

radioText.cn: 这炉子能烧侵蚀废料，壳子只会比你的刀硬。
radioText.en: It's made for burning Blighted waste. Your blade won't even leave a mark.

radioText.cn: 用爆炸物攻击底座和主体结构之间的连接点，就能破坏它。
radioText.en: We should use explosives to blast away the connector between the base and the main body.

radioText.cn: 就是那个冒着火花的部分吗？给它狠狠地炸一下！
radioText.en: That glowing and sparkly part, right? Let's give it a good blast!

radioText.cn: 解决了，下一个。
radioText.en: Done. To the next one.

radioText.cn: 工人们不在这里，也没发现遗体……我们得再找找。
radioText.en: The crew mates aren't here. No bodies either... We should keep looking.

radioText.cn: 还有小型巢雕在运作……快结束了。
radioText.en: Other small denstacks are still working... But we're almost done.

radioText.cn: 你们的祖先来自同一个家园，都是伟大的开拓者、肮脏的开拓者。
radioText.en: Your ancestors hailed from the same homeland as theirs. You all descend from the pioneers who are great ... yet destitute.

radioText.cn: 但现在，你们在寒风中燃烧尸骸取暖，他们却在高楼里畅谈理想和未来。
radioText.en: But now, while you freeze in the cold and burn your dead for warmth ... they sit in their high towers, talking about dreams and the future.

radioText.cn: 他们重建的“社会”只是又一个屠场。屠夫杀死牲口，他们的餐桌就更加丰盛。
radioText.en: The society they rebuilt is just another slaughterhouse. Their butchers sacrifice the herd to prepare feasts for their table.

radioText.cn: 那么，你们想躺上砧板，还是成为屠夫？
radioText.en: So, do you want to be meat on the chopping block, or a butcher wielding the blade?

radioText.cn: 聂菲斯在煽动部下，接下来恐怕还会有大动作。
radioText.en: Nefarith is whipping her underlings into a frenzy. Stay alert.

radioText.cn: 救命！救命！看这里，这里有人！
radioText.en: Help! HELP! Over here! There's someone here!

radioText.cn: 刚才好像有人在呼救吧？我们得把她先救出来才行。
radioText.en: Was that someone calling for help? Let's get her out first.

radioText.cn: 烟散了，我们走！
radioText.en: The smoke has cleared. Let's go!

radioText.cn: 《环带公约》是他们捏造的谎言，而你们就是谎言的铁证。
radioText.en: The Band Accord is a lie. You are living proof of their falsehoods.

radioText.cn: 我将展示给你们一把崭新的屠刀。拥抱超域吧，现在，它已经臣服于我。
radioText.en: I shall give onto you a brand new weapon for butchery. Embrace the Æther. Its powers are already mine to command.

radioText.cn: 源石建立的旧世界抛弃了你们，既然如此，那就彻底颠覆它。
radioText.en: The old world of Originium has abandoned you. Now, it deserves to be utterly destroyed.

radioText.cn: 拥抱超域？可是……这不可能……
radioText.en: Embrace the Æther? But ... that's impossible...

radioText.cn: 我们得尽快阻止她。
radioText.en: We must stop her. Quickly.

radioText.cn: 我们依然要踏上那条狂暴之路，没有退路，没有妥协，没有终点。
radioText.en: We must step onto the path of rage and frenzy. No turning back. No compromises. And no end to our pursuit.

radioText.cn: 我们倒下，然后，我们存在。
radioText.en: We will fall. And then ... we will exist.

radioText.cn: 记得自己还有一个名字，“裂地者”。
radioText.en: Remember you still have a name. Landbreakers.

radioText.cn: 现在，人与人的战争开始了。
radioText.en: Now, let loose the war of humanity upon itself.

radioText.cn: 又一头狼，狼太多了。
radioText.en: Another wolf. Too many mongrels.

radioText.cn: 没关系，都得死。
radioText.en: No matter. I'll kill you all.

radioText.cn: ……你的话也太多了。
radioText.en: ...You talk too much.

radioText.cn: 他那些管子好像要把我们吸进去了……
radioText.en: His pipes are sucking us in!

radioText.cn: 他似乎能改变周围气体的密度，当心低气压漩涡。
radioText.en: He can change air density nearby. Don't get caught in his vortex!

radioText.cn: 这个体型……怎么还能这么灵活啊！
radioText.en: How does he move so fast with all that bulk?

radioText.cn: 他在干什么？
radioText.en: What's he doing?

radioText.cn: 小心，不要靠近那些红光。
radioText.en: Careful. Stay away from the glowing lights!

radioText.cn: 那个人不见了。
radioText.en: That woman is gone.

radioText.cn: 她在用手下拖延时间，别被拖慢了脚步！从那边的电梯上去！
radioText.en: She was stalling us with her lackeys. We need to move — take the elevator!

radioText.cn: 快找掩体，他的身边很危险！
radioText.en: Find cover. He's dangerous up close!

radioText.cn: 这个宝贝叫协议采录桩，是我们部署的技术验证工具。
radioText.en: That little buddy over there is the Protocol Datalogger. It helps with technical verification.

radioText.cn: 它能够收集周边环境数据，为集成工业系统提供符合本地条件的组合方案。
radioText.en: It collects ambient data, and provides our AIC Factory with solutions tailored to local conditions.
