radioText.cn: 相关数据会被量化处理成便于管理的<@qu.key>工业点数</>。来试试看吧，管理员。
radioText.en: Relevant data can then be quantified and processed into our <@qu.key>AIC Index</>. Give it a shot, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 好啦，管理员，我们先升级电驱矿机科技。
radioText.en: Alright, Endmin! Let's start with our Electric Mining Rig tech upgrade!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们需要准备好所需的源矿和紫晶矿。
radioText.en: Endmin, we need to prepare some Originium Ores and Amethyst Crystals.

radioText.cn: 走吧，去协议核心，准备开始装备制造！
radioText.en: Hey guys, time to head to the PAC and make some gear! I'll show you the ropes.

radioText.cn: 咱们还得准备一些紫晶装备原件，这是制作装备的必要材料。
radioText.en: We'll need some Amethyst Components. They're essential for gear manufacturing.

radioText.cn: 搞定了，管理员，可以交给工人了。
radioText.en: It's done. Endmin, we can now hand them out to the crew.

radioText.cn: 钻探器的核心部分需要紫晶零件，用配件机制造一些吧。
radioText.en: The core component of the drill requires Amethyst Parts. Let's make some with the Fitting Unit.

radioText.cn: 把紫晶零件交给安德烈他们，咱们等着完工就行。
radioText.en: Give the Amethyst Parts to Andre, and we'll just wait for them to finish the work.

radioText.cn: 请快来吧，各位，原型机已经准备好了。
radioText.en: Come on, everyone! The Prototype is now ready.

radioText.cn: 安德烈先生，这套方案的可行性到底有多高？
radioText.en: Mr. Andre, do we have an exact feasibility of your plan?

radioText.cn: 理论上可行，超域试验场是TA-TA原型机的技术起点，很多珍贵数据在别处根本拿不到。
radioText.en: We have theoretical feasibility. The technological basis for the TA-TA Prototype was formulated at the Æther Test Site. It was built using valuable data that cannot be acquired elsewhere.

radioText.cn: 伊冯天天跟大家争论这个。但实践机会毕竟太少……希望我们的理论是正确的。
radioText.en: Yvonne would spend all day arguing with people about the Prototype. Unfortunately, we don't have a chance to field test the thing... But I hope that our theories are correct.

radioText.cn: 尽量让原型机走平地吧……还好这条路直通供能高地。
radioText.en: Try to let the Prototype travel on level ground... This road should take you to the Power Plateau.

radioText.cn: “原型机”这个说法总感觉很别扭……
radioText.en: Hmm... Calling it "Prototype" just doesn't feel right...

radioText.cn: 原型……初号……还是TA-TA什么的！这名字太拗口了。
radioText.en: So what's its full name again? Trans-Aizzer ... Tranquil ... Automatic ... robocart? I remember it being T-A-T-A or something.

radioText.cn: 干脆直接叫塔塔好了，多可爱，还省事。
radioText.en: I'll just call it Tata. What a cute and simple name!

radioText.cn: （开心的表情）
radioText.en: *Happy emote*

radioText.cn: 看样子它还挺喜欢，那就这么定了！
radioText.en: And I think it really likes the name! Tata is now official!

radioText.cn: 安德烈说我们还有时间……
radioText.en: Andre says we could still make it...

radioText.cn: 但每次抬头看天，我都觉得这个旋涡在催促我们，得加快脚步了。
radioText.en: But every time I look up, I feel that the swirling mess in the sky is telling us to hurry up and get it done.

radioText.cn: 有人来了！请帮帮忙！
radioText.en: Someone's here! SAVE US!

radioText.cn: 快，到这边来！
radioText.en: Quick! Get over here!

radioText.cn: 太吓人了，得赶紧去避难……
radioText.en: *Wheeze*... Almost had a heart attack... *Wheeze*... Gotta find somewhere safe...

radioText.cn: 侵蚀消失了？太好了……终于有人来了！
radioText.en: What...? The Blight's ... gone! Finally, some help has arrived!

radioText.cn: 这一路上肯定还得打不少裂地者。
radioText.en: We'll probably have to fight our way through mobs of Landbreakers.

radioText.cn: 聂菲斯一定还有“惊喜”留给我们。
radioText.en: Nefarith definitely has some surprises for us.

radioText.cn: 全部搞定，终于能进到实验园区了！
radioText.en: All done! We can finally get inside the Science Park!

radioText.cn: 不要掉以轻心，里面可能会有更多的敌人和侵蚀。
radioText.en: Don't lower your guard. We might encounter more enemies and the Blight inside the place.

radioText.cn: 啊……希望伊冯干员没事。
radioText.en: Ah... Yeah. I hope Operator Yvonne is alright.

radioText.cn: 这些痕迹……裂地者为什么要破坏发电机？
radioText.en: Look at these... Why would the breakers sabotage the generators?

radioText.cn: 大门可以从内部控制，裂地者或许是想阻止工团关上这扇门。
radioText.en: The gate can be controlled from the inside. Perhaps the breakers were trying to prevent the UWST from sealing the gate.

radioText.cn: 但工团还是成功了，这下头疼的是被锁在里面的裂地者了。
radioText.en: Glad the UWST still pulled it off. The breakers trapped inside will be having a hard time.

radioText.cn: 快！管理员，我们得阻止他们。
radioText.en: Quick, Endmin! We gotta stop them.

radioText.cn: 看那边！我们的干员有危险！
radioText.en: Over there! Our operators are in danger!

radioText.cn: 哎，你们看！那边也有情况！
radioText.en: Hey! Look! Something's up ahead!

radioText.cn: 这些建筑可真结实……
radioText.en: These buildings are incredibly tough...

radioText.cn: 最显眼的那一栋就是研究所大楼了。
radioText.en: The Research Center is the most conspicuous one in there.

radioText.cn: 要从这一片混乱里重建起来，不知道得花多少时间……
radioText.en: Wonder how long it would take to clean up this mess and rebuild everything...

radioText.cn: 管理员，修复这些发电机需要使用紫晶零件，可以制作一些。
radioText.en: We need Amethyst Parts to repair these generators, Endmin. Let's make some.

radioText.cn: 看起来只能从这里跳上去了。
radioText.en: I guess we can only reach the top by jumping.

radioText.cn: 裂地者好像只破坏了这些发电机。
radioText.en: Looks like the LBs only messed with the generators.

radioText.cn: 他们的打击点很精确……动作也很迅速。
radioText.en: They've directed their attacks on key targets... And they acted quickly.

radioText.cn: 连续修复这么多设备，不会对管理员造成什么负担吧？
radioText.en: We're repairing one facility after another. I worry it might be too much for the Endmin...

radioText.cn: 这种程度的源石技艺在允许的范畴内，也可以让管理员逐渐熟悉使用源石的感觉。
radioText.en: This level of Originium Arts use is within safe tolerances. The Endmin can also gain better familiarity with the use of Originium.

radioText.cn: 里面都乱成这样了，地图肯定没用了。
radioText.en: This entire place got really messed up. I don't think the map is gonna help anymore.

radioText.cn: 我们在这里走一走，找一条路吧。
radioText.en: Let's just walk around this place. We'll find a way.

radioText.cn: 这里可以下去。
radioText.en: We can head down here.

radioText.cn: 看这面墙，这条通道完全是从石头里凿出来的欸。
radioText.en: Look at this wall. They carved this passageway right through solid rock.

radioText.cn: 前面是用于培育源石的区域。
radioText.en: The area up ahead was used for Originium cultivation.

radioText.cn: 看，机关！跟电影里一样！
radioText.en: Look! It's a trap! Just like the movies!

radioText.cn: 工团的防御不是这个风格的，它们多半也是伊冯的作品。
radioText.en: UWST defenses tend to be something else. Yvonne probably made these.

radioText.cn: 耶，搞定！平安穿过！
radioText.en: Yahey! Got through in one piece!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们再试一次，要当心。
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin. Let's try this again.

radioText.cn: 所以，这些花样都是伊冯留下的？
radioText.en: So, Yvonne's the one who left all these crazy traps around.

radioText.cn: 从结果上来说……做得还不错。
radioText.en: And from what I'm seeing ... they prove to be rather effective.

radioText.cn: 那位伊冯干员……究竟是怎样的一个人？
radioText.en: So ... what's Operator Yvonne like in real life?

radioText.cn: 是个……很有个性的人。
radioText.en: Yvonne's someone ... with quite a personality.

radioText.cn: 我绝对在什么电影里见过这个场景……啊，这次的激光会动耶。
radioText.en: I definitely saw these lasers in a movie... Wow. These lasers can move.

radioText.cn: 电梯在那边！
radioText.en: The elevator is over there!

radioText.cn: 试试连接这座信号塔吧。
radioText.en: Let's try connecting Tata to this signal tower.

radioText.cn: 破坏门口的侵蚀核心！
radioText.en: Smash the Blight Core at the door!

radioText.cn: 这里被侵蚀阻挡了。
radioText.en: The Blight has blocked this path.

radioText.cn: （难受的表情）
radioText.en: *Pained emote*

radioText.cn: 伊冯，我刚刚就想问了，无人机炸弹是你的手笔吗？
radioText.en: Yvonne, I really wanted to ask this question from the start. Did you make those drone bombers?

radioText.cn: 当然！看来你们已经见过我的小暴鸰了！
radioText.en: Of course I did! I see you've already met my Tweety-Bombs.

radioText.cn: 小暴鸰？
radioText.en: Tweety-Bombs?

radioText.cn: 他们身上……是巢雕里的烟雾留下的痕迹吗？
radioText.en: Their bodies... Are they affected by the denstack haze?

radioText.cn: 他们已经丧失心智了，要当心！
radioText.en: Stay sharp! I believe they have lost their minds!

radioText.cn: 好难缠……他们不怕疼的吗？！
radioText.en: Ugh, they just won't give up...! Don't they feel pain?

radioText.cn: 楼里还有多少这样的裂地者？
radioText.en: How many of these Landbreakers are inside the building?

radioText.cn: 塔塔的情况似乎不太妙，我们还是找找别的路吧。
radioText.en: It seems that Tata isn't doing too good. We should look for another way.

radioText.cn: 这里也不能通过，先不勉强塔塔了，应该还有其他路。
radioText.en: This path is blocked. Let's not risk overworking Tata for now. There must be some other way.

radioText.cn: 你们躲不掉的，只有死路一条！
radioText.en: You can't hide! But you can definitely die!

radioText.cn: 仔细听，听见无人机的声音了吗？
radioText.en: Hear that? The buzzing of my mighty drones!

radioText.cn: 你们是会变成烧焦的烤肉，还是会淹死在源石溶液里？猜猜看？
radioText.en: Will you end up as carbonized BBQ or drown in Originium solutions? Take a guess!

radioText.cn: 答案是——品尝爆破！砰！
radioText.en: The answer is — Double whammy of EX-PLO-SIONS!

radioText.cn: 这……该不会是那位伊冯的声音吧？怎么和印象中不太一样。
radioText.en: Okay ... is that really Yvonne's voice? It doesn't match with what I had in mind.

radioText.cn: 这些无人机……不会炸到自己人吧？
radioText.en: These drones... They won't blow us up, right?

radioText.cn: 这些裂地者……到底发生了什么？！
radioText.en: By Talos! What happened to these LBs?

radioText.cn: 狼卫说得没错，他们将带有超域能量的残留物摄入了体内。
radioText.en: Wulfgard was right. They absorbed residues of Æther-containing materials.

radioText.cn: 喜欢我的机械臂吗？原型机的组装就是靠它才完成的。
radioText.en: Like my robotic servo arm? I used it to assemble the Prototype.

radioText.cn: 哦，原型机的设计图，还挺怀念。这一版还是克劳老师的造型设计。
radioText.en: Oh, blueprints for the Prototype. Brings back old memories. That particular iteration would be Professor Crowe's work.

radioText.cn: 当心哦，它可比看起来贵得多了，大概值两百张珍藏唱片？
radioText.en: Careful! That's more expensive than it looks! It's worth something like ... two hundred collector's vinyls ... I guess?

radioText.cn: 去书桌旁的箱子里找找？那里面都是我的珍藏！
radioText.en: Hmm. Why don't you search the crate next to the table? Now that would be my special collection!

radioText.cn: 裂地者把这栋楼搞得这么乱……啊，我可不会轻易放过他们！
radioText.en: Blighted LBs, they turned this place into a dump... Ugh. I won't let them get away with this!
...WHOA!

radioText.cn: 大楼里的敌人清理得差不多了，开始修理工作吧。
radioText.en: Looks like we've cleared the building. It's time to commence repairs.

radioText.cn: 他们冲着原型机来了！
radioText.en: They're after the Prototype!

radioText.cn: 我知道——可得保护好塔塔！
radioText.en: I know! We gotta keep Tata safe!

radioText.cn: 也要保护好我这个天才啦！
radioText.en: Hey! Keep this pink-haired genius safe as well!

radioText.cn: 迷你暴鸰就位了，管理员，按你的需求使用吧。
radioText.en: Mini-Bombtail in position, Endmin. Use it as you see fit.

radioText.cn: 超级重磅暴鸰准备好了，随叫随到！
radioText.en: The Mega-Bombtail is prepped and hot. Ready for a strike!

radioText.cn: 你们还好吧？！
radioText.en: You guys okay?

radioText.cn: 被藏起来的敌人吓了一跳……还好。
radioText.en: Just got ambushed by some stupid goons... We're on it!

radioText.cn: 有响动！
radioText.en: We got movement!

radioText.cn: 管理员，当心！
radioText.en: Endmin! Watch out!

radioText.cn: 哇啊！跟恐怖电影一样！
radioText.en: Geez, this is like a horror movie!

radioText.cn: 这个房间好像是死路……倒是有好多移动平台。
radioText.en: This room seems like a dead end... But there are a lot of moving platforms.

radioText.cn: 从这个房间可以进入检修通道，顺着通道走，就到我的房间了。
radioText.en: This room connects to the maintenance corridor. Use it to reach my place.

radioText.cn: 看来咱们得从这些台子上跳着过去。
radioText.en: Looks like we'll have to jump onto these platforms to get to the corridor.

radioText.cn: 看到无人机了吗？平时我也靠它们在这个房间里搬运设备。
radioText.en: See the drones? I usually have them move stuff around this room for me.

radioText.cn: 伊冯，你一直在把这个房间当仓库用吗？
radioText.en: Yvonne, have you been using this room as a storage depot?

radioText.cn: 呃，嗯……佩丽卡监督，这应该不用补填申请表吧？
radioText.en: Oh, well, yea... But Supervisor Perlica, I don't need to submit a late application form, do I?

radioText.cn: 当心上面！
radioText.en: Watch out! Enemy above!

radioText.cn: 顺着通道就可以过来，我的实验室门口有一个操作面板，靠佩丽卡监督的权限就能进来了。
radioText.en: Just go down the corridor and you'll find my lab. There's a control panel at the doorway. Perlica's Supervisor Authority Level should grant you access.

radioText.cn: 那边就是操作面板了，和园区大门前那个一样耶。
radioText.en: That's the control panel. It's just like the one we saw at the gate of the Park.

radioText.cn: 先解决敌人。
radioText.en: Let's take care of the enemies first.

radioText.cn: 这里就是秦工程师提过的山道。
radioText.en: This is the Mountain Path that Director Qin mentioned.

radioText.cn: 看，供能高地离我们更近了……裂隙的压迫感也好强。
radioText.en: Look, there's the Power Plateau. That rift is terrifying...

radioText.cn: 佩丽卡监督，你们情况如何？
radioText.en: Supervisor Perlica, what's the situation at your place?

radioText.cn: 我们见到伊冯了，她很安全。塔塔……我是说原型机，也完成了升级。我们正带着它沿山道前往矿脉源区。
radioText.en: We've met Yvonne. She's safe. Tata ... I mean, the Prototype has been upgraded. We're taking it along the mountain path to reach the Origin Lodespring.

radioText.cn: 矿脉源区受侵蚀爆发影响严重，枢纽区到现在仍未能与那边取得联络。你们务必小心。
radioText.en: The Origin Lodespring is severely affected by the Blight eruption. The Hub has yet to establish contact with that area. Please be careful out there.

radioText.cn: 哇啊！
radioText.en: WHOAAA!

radioText.cn: 管理员，你没事吧……没事就好！
radioText.en: ENDMIN...?! Oh, thank goodness you're okay!

radioText.cn: （这种时候还是不要单独行动了……）
radioText.en: (We shouldn't act on our own at this time...)

radioText.cn: 佩丽卡监督，这里是最后一段山道了。
radioText.en: Supervisor Perlica, this is the final stretch of the mountain path...

radioText.cn: 穿过这里，就是工团家属生活的区域了。
radioText.en: Pass through this place and you'll reach the family apartments of the UWST crew.

radioText.cn: 那里的情况尚不明朗，希望他们一切平安。
radioText.en: We don't know what's happening in that place. Let's hope everyone's alright.

radioText.cn: 喂？喂喂？听得到吗？
radioText.en: Hello? HELLLOOO? Does anyone copy?

radioText.cn: 这是狼卫干的？
radioText.en: Did Wulfgard do this?

radioText.cn: 接到行动任务的狼群成员应该只有他。希望他掌握了那些异常锚点的情报。
radioText.en: He should be the only member of the Pack who received the mission. Let's hope he has some intel about those unusual Ankhors.

radioText.cn: 天上那道红光，哪怕只是远远看着，都能感到一股令人不安的气息。
radioText.en: Look at that red light in the sky... It's still far away, but just the sight of it makes me feel uneasy.

radioText.cn: 那是超域裂隙造成的，像在天空上留下的疤痕。
radioText.en: A product of an Æther rift, like scars left in the sky.

radioText.cn: 要是继续放任下去，整片大地都会变得千疮百孔。
radioText.en: The entirety of this land would be totally messed up if we let this continue.

radioText.cn: 这里也有裂地者的营地！
radioText.en: Careful! Breaker camp right ahead!

radioText.cn: 这些痕迹像是刚留下的……试试看能不能扫描出什么线索。
radioText.en: These trails look fresh... Try scanning them and see if we can find out anything else.

radioText.cn: 营地……说明他们渗透这里已经有一阵子了。
radioText.en: This campsite proves that they have been in this area for quite some time.

radioText.cn: 这些裂地者隔绝了源石研究园和矿脉源区……这就是他们的目的吗？
radioText.en: These Landbreakers are camped right between the Originium Science Park and the Origin Lodespring... Are they trying to block the way?

radioText.cn: 这台升降机居然在这种地方……
radioText.en: Someone actually built an elevator here...

radioText.cn: 看上去是公路建好前使用的旧设施，还好能正常启动。
radioText.en: Seems like an old facility they had before the freight road was completed. Lucky for us, it's still working.

radioText.cn: 看！那边！
radioText.en: Look! Over there!

radioText.cn: 沿这些脚印前进，他们还没走远，我们赶得上。
radioText.en: Let's follow these footprints. They haven't gone far. We should be able to catch up.

radioText.cn: 走吧，该见一见那位狼群的朋友了。
radioText.en: Alright, let's go meet our friend from the Pack.

radioText.cn: 这里的人看起来一点也不慌乱。
radioText.en: The people here don't look panicked at all.

radioText.cn: 有很多经验丰富的矿工退休后都定居在了这里，想必是他们稳住了局面。
radioText.en: Many experienced miners settled here after retiring. I believe they helped keep the situation under control.

radioText.cn: 那个……卡特洛有对你们提起过我吗？
radioText.en: So, uh... Did Catello ever tell you about me?

radioText.cn: 我只是好奇他是怎么描述我的！别给管理员留下什么误会了……
radioText.en: I'm ... I'm just really curious about what he said about me! I don't want him to give our Endmin some weird impressions...

radioText.cn: 别担心，和他聊天的机会可不多。
radioText.en: Don't worry. He's not a talker.

radioText.cn: 喂？佩丽卡姐姐，能听见吗？
radioText.en: Hello? Perlica? Do you copy?

radioText.cn: 源石树苗……公约三方对管理员相关的信息封存都十分谨慎。
radioText.en: The Originium sapling ... the three Accordatories have been extremely cautious and meticulous with the vaulting of information related to the Endministrator.

radioText.cn: 希望那棵源石树苗能带给我们答案。
radioText.en: I hope that Originium sapling can give us the answer we need.

radioText.cn: 矿脉源区出现了大量天使的信号！营地内有多处遭到了天使攻击！
radioText.en: We've detected signals of a large Aggeloid cluster in the Origin Lodespring! The camp is also being attacked by Aggeloi at multiple sites!

radioText.cn: 把位置发给我们，这里没有什么常备的武装力量，动作要快！
radioText.en: Send us the coordinates! This camp lacks professional armed personnel. We must act quickly!

radioText.cn: 工人们还在紧急疏散！
radioText.en: The crew mates are still evacuating!

radioText.cn: 塔塔，塔塔怎么样了？
radioText.en: Tata! What about Tata?

actorName.cn: 瘦小的男孩{e2m6-工团的男孩}

radioText.cn: 救……救我……
radioText.en: Help...! Help me...!

actorName.cn: 乖巧的女孩{e2m6-工团的女孩}

radioText.cn: 呜呜……
radioText.en: Hik, hik...

radioText.cn: （愤怒的表情）
radioText.en: *Angry emote*

radioText.cn: 让塔塔停在这里吧，探明情况之前，不要带着它冒险。
radioText.en: Let's park Tata here. Too risky to take it along right now.

radioText.cn: （失望的表情）
radioText.en: *Disappointed emote*

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心！
radioText.en: Watch out, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 哇，快躲开！
radioText.en: Whoa! Hide behind something!

radioText.cn: 这只源石虫背上插着树枝……
radioText.en: There's a branch stuck to this Originium Slug.

radioText.cn: 它要跑掉了，我们跟上去看看？
radioText.en: It's moving! Let's follow it!

radioText.cn: 看！电力恢复了，吊车控制台好像能用了。
radioText.en: Look! Power is back online. I think we can start using the control panel for the crane car.

radioText.cn: 太好了，也许能用集装箱搭出一条通路来。
radioText.en: Wonderful. Perhaps we can use the storage containers to create a path.

radioText.cn: 喂喂！是终末地的管理员吗？哈哈，电力恢复了，是你们做了什么吗？
radioText.en: Hey, hey! Are you actually the Endmin of Endfield? Power is back online! And I have a feeling that you were the ones who fixed it!

radioText.cn: 来岔路口这边吧！我用吊车为你们清除剩下的路障！
radioText.en: Meet me at the intersection! I'm using the crane car to clear out the rest of the obstacles!

radioText.cn: 路通了。管理员，我们出发吧！
radioText.en: The road is clear. Let's go, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 运输区看这样子是没法用了。车站和路面，全都要重新修吧？
radioText.en: Man, this Logistics Area seems totally unusable. They'll have to rebuild the whole place, maybe even repave the roads!

radioText.cn: 整个运输区已经完全看不出原本的模样了……太可惜了。
radioText.en: The entire Logistics Area has been devastated... What a tragic loss.

radioText.cn: 大家小心！
radioText.en: Watch out, people!

radioText.cn: 居然是条死路……早知道就选另一边了。
radioText.en: Ugh. This is a dead end... We should have taken the other way.

radioText.cn: 欸？那边好像能上去！
radioText.en: Hey! I think we can head up over there!

radioText.cn: 看来得先破坏这个锚点了。
radioText.en: We need to destroy that Ankhor first.

radioText.cn: 管理员，看，这里也有源石树枝。
radioText.en: Endmin, look! I found an Originium branch here as well.

radioText.cn: 管理员！通向旧矿区的安全门恢复工作了，可以从那里前往第二个锚点。
radioText.en: Endmin! The safety gate to the Old Mines is back online! Head through to reach the second Ankhor.

radioText.cn: 糟糕！桥断了……没有电，吊车控制台也用不了。
radioText.en: Darn it! The bridge is out! And we can't use the crane car control panel!

radioText.cn: 等一下，那边是……有人在那里！
radioText.en: Wait, what's that...? There are people over there!

radioText.cn: 他们难道就是没撤回来的探查队队员吗？
radioText.en: They could be the survey team that failed to retreat.

radioText.cn: 那些源石树枝不知道还能坚持多久……我们要尽快破坏锚点！
radioText.en: Not sure how long those Originium saplings will last... Let's hurry and take out that Ankhor!

radioText.cn: 这里的源石都生长出地面了，工团放弃这里，是不是太浪费了？
radioText.en: There's Originium all over this place! Why would UWST abandon it? It could've been their Kolossals!

radioText.cn: 有几方面考虑吧。一来，这里的源石活性很高，感染矿石病的风险也会提升……
radioText.en: They probably had their reasons. With Originium this active, the risk of Oripathy goes way up.

radioText.cn: 再者，四号谷地现在对源石的需求没有以往大，靠已有的成熟矿区就足够供应了。
radioText.en: Originium demand in Valley IV has declined. The yields of other mines are more than capable of meeting local energy needs. There's no reason to sacrifice lives for overproduction.

radioText.cn: 还好，落在枢纽区基地里的锚点没有这种震荡波。
radioText.en: Sheesh! I miss that Hub Base Ankhor. At least it didn't give off shockwaves like these.

radioText.cn: 不然，不知道会造成多大的破坏呢。
radioText.en: If it did, our entire Base could be leveled.

radioText.cn: 这些机械都有些年头了，不会有什么危险吧？
radioText.en: These machines look really old. I hope they're not dangerous.

radioText.cn: 这个锚点开始激活了！
radioText.en: This Ankhor just activated itself!

radioText.cn: 它在发光，注意了！
radioText.en: It's starting to glow! Watch out!

radioText.cn: 当心！
radioText.en: Careful!

radioText.cn: 好险，还好反应及时。
radioText.en: That was close. Thank goodness we're fast.

radioText.cn: 世代摇篮……里面真的有苏醒的天使吗？
radioText.en: Cradle of the Ages... Do we really have an awakened Aggelos in that place?

radioText.cn: 此前的一切都预示着不好的结果，聂菲斯不可能平白无故投下这些锚点的。
radioText.en: We've seen many signs and they're not exactly good news. Nefarith won't deploy those Ankhors here if she doesn't have a good reason.

radioText.cn: 不过，相信管理员吧，我们一定能渡过难关。
radioText.en: Nevertheless, I have faith in our Endmin. We'll definitely overcome this challenge.

radioText.cn: 大树留下的残骸完全是空心的，和想象的不太一样。
radioText.en: I didn't expect this. The stump of the Great Oak turned out to be a huge hollowed area.

radioText.cn: 这些源石簇很规则，有一种异样的美感……
radioText.en: These Originium formations seem incredibly ordered. There's a sense of bizarre beauty to them...

radioText.cn: 管理员，多亏了你封死它的行动……
radioText.en: Thank goodness you impaled and immobilized it, Endministrator...

radioText.cn: 这里的源石和这棵大树本身，都在回应管理员。
radioText.en: All of these Originium formations and the Great Oak itself are responding to the Endmin's command.

radioText.cn: 刚才的敌人，就是詹娜他们提到的天使吧？
radioText.en: That thing we fought... It's probably the Aggelos that Jenner and her people kept talking about, right?

radioText.cn: 嗯……好在它还是不完整的状态。
radioText.en: Yes... And we're fortunate it wasn't at its peak state.

radioText.cn: 倘若它完全苏醒，这一战的结果就不好说了……
radioText.en: If it had fully awakened, that battle might have turned out differently...

radioText.cn: 这些源石看上去都像是天然形成的。
radioText.en: These Originium formations look really natural.

radioText.cn: 应该是有过一条人工开凿的通道，然后在无人看管期间，附近的源石长成了这个样子。
radioText.en: Someone must have excavated this tunnel, but it has been neglected for years. Nearby Originium naturally grew into the empty space.

radioText.cn: 管理员，情报办公室有新的信息。
radioText.en: Endmin, our intel office has something new for you.

radioText.cn: 超域裂隙变得愈发不稳定了，说不定唤醒巨型天使也是聂菲斯拖延时间的伎俩。
radioText.en: The Æther Rift is getting less stable. Perhaps awakening the giant Aggelos was part of Nefarith's plan to delay us.

radioText.cn: 她的目标是超域试验场，但又像是针对管理员你设下的局。
radioText.en: She's aiming for the Æther Test Site. It's probably another trap she's preparing for you, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 各位，请务必小心。
radioText.en: Just be careful out there, team!

radioText.cn: 恐怕裂地者已经完全占领了这里。
radioText.en: I'm afraid the Landbreakers have taken over this entire area.

radioText.cn: 工人们不是碾骨氏族的对手，希望源石发电站里还有幸存者。
radioText.en: The UWST crew mates are no match for the Bonekrushers. I hope we can find survivors in the Originium Power Plant.

radioText.cn: 这条岔路通往哪里？
radioText.en: Where does this road lead to?

radioText.cn: 前面走不通。我们从源石发电站穿过去。
radioText.en: This way is out. We have to cut through the power plant instead.

radioText.cn: 不能把塔塔独自留在这里，我们继续前进吧。
radioText.en: We can't afford to leave Tata here on its own. Let's advance together, team.

radioText.cn: 我好像在哪里听到过<@qu.key>“克劳”</>这个名字。
radioText.en: I remember hearing the name <@qu.key>"Crowe"</> somewhere.

radioText.cn: 那对柯林斯兄妹提到过他。
radioText.en: The Collinses mentioned his name.

radioText.cn: 伊冯是不是也说过他？好像和塔塔有关？
radioText.en: Yvonne mentioned his name too. He has something to do with Tata, right?

radioText.cn: 资料上显示他在四号谷地任职了二十多年，是工团在超域技术方面的佼佼者。
radioText.en: Our data says he's worked at Valley IV for over twenty years. He is also a leading expert of Ætherside sciences for the UWST.

radioText.cn: 超域科学家？难怪和伊冯认识。
radioText.en: A scientist of the Ætherside? No wonder Yvonne knows him.

radioText.cn: 这附近有不少裂地者，像是在搜寻幸存的工团成员。
radioText.en: There are plenty of Landbreakers nearby. They seem to be looking for UWST survivors.

radioText.cn: 谁？谁进来了！
radioText.en: Uhhhh... Who? Who's there?

radioText.cn: 还有敌人！
radioText.en: Enemies!

radioText.cn: 看招——！
radioText.en: Watch this!

radioText.cn: 好大规格的传送带，是用来运送燃料的吗？
radioText.en: This transport belt is huge. Are they using it to move fuel?

radioText.cn: 妈的……就算是死，我也得多带上几个垫背的！
radioText.en: Screw this... If I'm going down, I gotta take a few of them down with me!

radioText.cn: 这传送带怎么不动？这样可没法帮我们躲过蒸汽。
radioText.en: Why won't this transport belt move? We won't be able to avoid the steam like this.

radioText.cn: 附近肯定有开关，我们找找看吧。
radioText.en: There must be a switch nearby... Let's look for it.

radioText.cn: 好了，传送带动起来了！
radioText.en: Great. The transport belt is moving!

radioText.cn: 那些箱体应该能挡住这些蒸汽。
radioText.en: Those crates should be able to block the steam.

radioText.cn: 完美修复！这下可以去实验室找人了。
radioText.en: Perfectly repaired! Now we can head to the lab and look for the missing person.

radioText.cn: 邓恩说的地点就是这儿，那位克莱维尔很可能还被困在附近。
radioText.en: This is the place that Dean talked about. Clavell might be trapped nearby.

radioText.cn: 残存的裂地者还在四处破坏！
radioText.en: The LB stragglers are ruining everything!

radioText.cn: 这里走不通了，找找别的路！
radioText.en: Road's blocked. We must find another path!

radioText.cn: 希望克莱维尔平安无事。
radioText.en: I hope Clavell is alright.

radioText.cn: 啊呀……你们是？
radioText.en: Who are you!?

radioText.cn: 实验室里的裂地者已经被我们清理掉了。
radioText.en: We've got rid of the LB in the lab.

radioText.cn: 太好了……丹尼尔斯站长不在这里，我很担心他。等一下我会自己回操作间。
radioText.en: Great... Site Director Daniels isn't here. I was really worried. Anyway, thank you. I'll just head back to the control room.

radioText.cn: 发信器应该就在这里。
radioText.en: The signal emitter should be here somewhere.

radioText.cn: 塔塔的相关研究报告……看上去有些年头了，这么说塔塔最初还真是克劳的研究项目。
radioText.en: Research papers about Tata... They look pretty old. So it's actually true. Tata used to be Crowe's project.

radioText.cn: 看起来是伊冯的东西。能让她如此信任的人可不多。
radioText.en: I believe this belongs to Yvonne. Only a few people could earn this level of her trust.

radioText.cn: 是这个吗？我还以为这么重要的装置会制作得更特殊一点。
radioText.en: Is this what we're looking for? I was expecting a device of such importance to look more ... distinctive.

radioText.cn: 某些情况下，重要的装置能被一眼看出“重要”，其实是一种失败的设计。
radioText.en: In certain scenarios, a conspicuously "important" appearance might be a design failure.

radioText.cn: 我们快回去吧，克劳先生还在等着我们。
radioText.en: We should head back quickly. Mr. Crowe is still waiting for us.

radioText.cn: 门被锁住了……从内部上的锁。
radioText.en: The door is locked ... from the inside.

radioText.cn: 会是我们要找的那位工团成员吗？
radioText.en: Could it be the UWST crew mate we're looking for?

radioText.cn: 有可能。观察下四周，看看有没有别的方法能进去。
radioText.en: It's possible. Check the surroundings. Perhaps there's another way in.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们需要把发信器带回去，再找找看吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, we must retrieve the signal emitter first. Let's take a look around.

radioText.cn: 咳咳！这些雾是怎么回事……
radioText.en: Hakk! Kaff! What's wrong with this haze...

radioText.cn: 看那边！
radioText.en: Look! Over there!

radioText.cn: 用信标进行定位，工团的支援马上就到。
radioText.en: Tag the coordinates with the beacon. UWST support will arrive shortly.

radioText.cn: 干得好，工人们会来清除剩下的残骸，我们走。
radioText.en: Good. The crew mates will clean up the wreckage. Let's go.

radioText.cn: 好像顺序不太对，我们再试一次？
radioText.en: The sequence doesn't look right. Maybe one more try?

radioText.cn: 已确认完成目标打击！剩下的交给我们！
radioText.en: Hit confirmed! Leave the rest to us!

radioText.cn: 放心吧，我们会接管这里！
radioText.en: Don't worry. We'll take it from here.

radioText.cn: 咳咳……好浓的烟雾，什么都看不见了。
radioText.en: *Hakk, kaff*... The smoke is so thick. I can't see anything.

radioText.cn: 干得漂亮！该我们上了，给他们点颜色瞧瞧！
radioText.en: Beautifully done! Now it's our turn to kick their butts!

radioText.cn: 感谢你们，接下来就是我们的工作了。
radioText.en: Thanks a lot. The rest will be our job.

radioText.cn: 裂隙在过去五分钟里的变化，比之前五个小时的都要大。
radioText.en: In just five minutes, the rift changed more than it had in the past five hours.

radioText.cn: 速战速决！
radioText.en: Let's end this quickly!

radioText.cn: 别挡道！
radioText.en: Out of our way!

radioText.cn: 工团会远程轰击信标放置的位置。
radioText.en: The UWST will fire at where you've marked.

radioText.cn: 这里就交给工人们了，我们抓紧时间。
radioText.en: Leave this to the crew mates. We should keep moving.

radioText.cn: 工团的反击顷刻即到。
radioText.en: The UWST retaliation will arrive soon.

radioText.cn: 就差一点了，继续前进！
radioText.en: Almost done. Keep advancing!

radioText.cn: 管理员，超域试验场就在眼前了！
radioText.en: Endmin, the Æther Test Site is right ahead!

radioText.cn: 管理员，供能高地附近还有许多未消除的侵蚀。回帝江号之前，我们还有不少事情要做。
radioText.en: Endmin, there's still plenty of Blight to clean up near the Power Plateau. There's a lot we can do before heading back to Dijiang.

radioText.cn: 伊冯不在这里，可能已经回源石研究园了。也许我们可以和她商量一下还能做些什么。
radioText.en: Yvonne isn't here. She might have gone back to the Originium Science Park. Perhaps we can talk to her about our next move.

radioText.cn: 好高的温度……有术师来过？
radioText.en: This place feels pretty hot... Was a caster here?

radioText.cn: 是剑痕……
radioText.en: These look like cuts left by a sword...

radioText.cn: 等等，信号……消失了？
radioText.en: Hold on. The signal... It has disappeared...?

radioText.cn: 你们把敌人干掉了？怎么频道突然安静了……
radioText.en: Did you take out the enemies? The channel got quiet all of a sudden...

radioText.cn: 数据回传成功。我的天……你们都经历了什么？
radioText.en: Data retrieval success. Oh. By. Talos... You guys really went through the wringer, didn't you?

radioText.cn: 矿脉源区的侵蚀规模很大。我们能及时赶到供能高地，和塔塔的努力是分不开的。
radioText.en: The Origin Lodespring had to deal with massive Blight formations. Tata played an instrumental role in helping us reach the Power Plateau on time.

radioText.cn: 我先开始分析，你们快来实验室找我！
radioText.en: I gotta start analyzing all this data! Come find me at the lab!

radioText.cn: 研究所下方有一台小功率的模拟装置，我们需要用它测试一下。
radioText.en: There's a low-power simulation device underneath the Research Center. We'll need it to perform our test run.

radioText.cn: 你们跟我来。
radioText.en: Follow me.

radioText.cn: 成功了，扫描出了侵蚀核心。
radioText.en: Success. The scan has revealed the Blight Core.

radioText.cn: 太好了！
radioText.en: Awesome!

radioText.cn: 我这儿收到数据了……这办法行得通。
radioText.en: I'm getting data on my end... This plan is working out great.

radioText.cn: 伊冯，等这件事结束，我们有些情况得和你交代。
radioText.en: Yvonne, we need to talk to you about a few things once this is over.

radioText.cn: 嗯？搞得这么严肃……先尽快完成定位吧。
radioText.en: Geez, what's got you so serious... Just focus on the task and complete the positioning process.

radioText.cn: 前进吧，触碰它，你还有最后一次机会。
radioText.en: Go forth and touch it. You have one last chance.

radioText.cn: 重拾属于你的历史，重新想起你的使命。
radioText.en: Reclaim the history that was yours. Remember your calling.

radioText.cn: 这是你给自己留下的，唯一一件礼物。
radioText.en: This is the only gift you left for yourself.

radioText.cn: 为了维系生命的存续，你已经付出了所有。
radioText.en: You gave everything to ensure the survival of life.

radioText.cn: 当一切不再拥有退路，你把希望埋进了“零号委托”。
radioText.en: With all retreat cut off, you placed your hope in the Zeroth Directive.

radioText.cn: 管理员……我这边有进展了！
radioText.en: Endmin... I've made some progress!

radioText.cn: 与宏科院的高密级握手已经完成，着陆程序也在准备中。
radioText.en: We completed our high confidentiality level handshake with HAS. Landing protocol is in the works.

radioText.cn: 佩丽卡监督会在帝江号等你。
radioText.en: Supervisor Perlica will be waiting for you aboard Dijiang.

radioText.cn: 你似乎乐在其中。
radioText.en: You seem to be enjoying yourself, Ardashir.

radioText.cn: 是啊，哪怕我已经走过很多地方，塔卫二还是持续给人带来惊喜。
radioText.en: I am. My journey has taken me to numerous places, but Talos-II never ceases to amaze me.

radioText.cn: 你们呢？你身上的标志……“终末地”是做什么的？
radioText.en: And what about you? You bear the logo of ... "Endfield". What is it that you do?

radioText.cn: ……终末地工业，致力于文明环带的建设和复兴。
radioText.en: We are Endfield Industries. We strive for the growth and prosperity of the Civilization Band.

radioText.cn: 那各位去武陵，是有公务在身？
radioText.en: So, are you visiting Wuling for official business?

radioText.cn: 算是吧。
radioText.en: Our visit might be considered as that.

radioText.cn: 真是了不起。
radioText.en: You have a most admirable pursuit.

radioText.cn: ……风向变了。
radioText.en: ...The wind ... is changing.

radioText.cn: 这里的天气变化无常……和北方很不一样。
radioText.en: The climate here changes on a whim... It is vastly different compared to the north.

radioText.cn: 我在旅行中见过各式各样的人，人们缺乏的，比他们意识到的还要多。
radioText.en: I have met diverse individuals during my travels. People lack things, far more than they realize.

radioText.cn: 如果你们真的帮助过很多人，是不是有人把你们当作“英雄”？
radioText.en: If you actually helped so many people, can I assume that some of them are treating you as "heroes?"

radioText.cn: 那倒也不至于啦。
radioText.en: Not quite, to be honest.

radioText.cn: 咦，小哥，你怎么停下来了？
radioText.en: Hey, why are you stopping here?
Hmm...

radioText.cn: 他停下了，去确认下发生了什么吧。
radioText.en: He's standing right there. Perhaps we should check on him to see what happened.

radioText.cn: 前面有亮光，出口应该就是这里了！
radioText.en: I see light up ahead. This must be the exit!

radioText.cn: 管理员，他已经走远了。还是跟紧点比较好。
radioText.en: Endmin, he's pretty far away. We should try to stay as a group.

radioText.cn: 唔……风好大！
radioText.en: Ugh... The wind is so strong!

radioText.cn: 看，<@qu.key>天师桩</>！看来我们回到主路了！
radioText.en: Look! A <@qu.key>Tianshi Pillar</>! I think we're back on the main road!

radioText.cn: 慢着，那里似乎有人……
radioText.en: Wait. Someone's over there...

radioText.cn: 天师桩遏制不住那些侵蚀了！
radioText.en: The Tianshi Pillar can no longer contain the Blight!

radioText.cn: 天使的形态会根据环境变化，别掉以轻心。
radioText.en: The Aggeloi adapt their forms to the environment. Do not let your guard down.

radioText.cn: 管理员，注意观察它们的攻击模式。
radioText.en: Endmin, focus on their attack maneuvers.

radioText.cn: 数量太多了，缠斗下去没有意义！
radioText.en: There are too many of them! We better pull back!

radioText.cn: 往那边走！先用竹筏离开这儿！
radioText.en: Go that way! Get on the raft and leave!

radioText.cn: 好美的景色……
radioText.en: This place is simply enchanting...

radioText.cn: 哇！
radioText.en: Whoah!

radioText.cn: 小心一些吧，我们最好别走散了。
radioText.en: Be careful. It will do us well to stay in a group.

radioText.cn: 啊！看那儿！
radioText.en: Ah! Look there!

radioText.cn: 这些小家伙是竹林的常客，要是能利用他们穿行竹林内外觅食的习性——
radioText.en: These little critters travel in and out of groves to feed. Maybe we can make use of that—

radioText.cn: ——糟了！竹子把我们分开了。喂！你还好吗？
radioText.en: — Oh no! The grove got between us. Hey! Are you alright?

radioText.cn: 没事……我这里有一条小道。我们在前方会合吧。
radioText.en: I'm alright... I can see a trail from here. Let us meet up ahead.

radioText.cn: 竹筏就在那边！……欸，还有其他人？
radioText.en: The raft is over there...! Wait. Who's that?

radioText.cn: 小心，管理员！
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 看那边！小蟠兽们都是被那根桩子吸引来的，那是天师府的设备！应该能派上用场！
radioText.en: Look! The pantails must have been attracted by that pillar. It's a Tianshi Bureau facility! Maybe we can make use of it!

radioText.cn: 呼啊——！绕了这么久，难得见到这么让人神清气爽的景色！
radioText.en: Phewie —! After spending all that time running about in the grove, am I glad to see such a refreshing sight!

radioText.cn: 确实难得，可我们还有任务在身。
radioText.en: A refreshing sight indeed. But we still have a mission to carry out.

radioText.cn: 你们听得见吗？我似乎发现了什么！
radioText.en: Can you hear me? I believe I have found something!

radioText.cn: 别急，我们还在找路呢！
radioText.en: I hear you! We're still looking for a way out!

radioText.cn: 好像又回到了我们迷路的起点……
radioText.en: I think we're back to where we started getting lost...

radioText.cn: 那座雕像应该是为了助人脱困设置的，回到那里应该能找到办法。
radioText.en: That statue seems to be designed to help people escape. We should be able to figure a way out if we head back there.

radioText.cn: 小心！这些<@qu.key>水灯虫</>会释放酸液！
radioText.en: Careful! These <@qu.key>waterlamps</> spit acid!

radioText.cn: 道路打开了——
radioText.en: The way is now open.

radioText.cn: ——唉，但已经开心不起来了呀，这条路对不对啊？
radioText.en: Um, I'm not feeling super positive about this. Are we taking the right path?

radioText.cn: 你们找到路了吗？
radioText.en: Have you found the way?

radioText.cn: 算是！先想办法会合吧！
radioText.en: I think we have! Let's figure out how to meet up!

radioText.cn: 那麻烦各位循着声音来找我了。
radioText.en: Good. Then I shall need you to seek me out by following my voice.

radioText.cn: 但务必小心，我还听到些其他声音，或许是野兽……
radioText.en: But be careful out here. I have picked up other voices, and they sound rather bestial in nature...

radioText.cn: 当心，是<@qu.key>球刺兽</>，小心它们身上的尖刺！
radioText.en: Careful! This is a <@qu.key>quillbeast</>! Be wary of the sharp spines on its body!

radioText.cn: 看上去不怎么欢迎我们呢。
radioText.en: I don't think it likes us being here.

radioText.cn: 这里！这些应该就是雕像处提到的“引导灯”。
radioText.en: There! Those must be the "guiding lights" mentioned by the statue.

radioText.cn: 我已经站稳了，启动吧。
radioText.en: I have secured a good footing. You may activate the vessel.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这是现在的你第一次来武陵，对吧？
radioText.en: Endmin, this is your first visit to Wuling, right?

radioText.cn: 是不是和四号谷地截然不同？嘿嘿，能让你吃惊的还在后面呢。
radioText.en: It's so different from Valley IV, isn't it? Heh. Just you wait. There are even more surprises in store.

radioText.cn: 嗯？什么动静？
radioText.en: Wait. What was that?

radioText.cn: 要不，干脆劈开这些竹子？虽然有点不忍心……
radioText.en: Hey, why don't we just cut down the bamboo? Not that I want to, but...

radioText.cn: 这样的景象，对居住在塔卫二的人而言，实在是可贵。
radioText.en: I understand, but such scenery and environments are rare and valuable to Talosians.

radioText.cn: 而且，竹林如此广袤，贸然刺激它们，不知道会发生什么。
radioText.en: Plus, given the size of this grove, resorting to desperate measures might be unwise. We don't know how it would react.

radioText.cn: 成功了！
radioText.en: It worked!

radioText.cn: 附近有座雕像……你们能找到一样的吗？旁边写着些什么，但我看不懂。
radioText.en: Is there a statue on your side? I have found one here, but I cannot read the writing on it.

radioText.cn: 这好像就是阿达希尔提到的雕像。
radioText.en: This looks like the statue that Ardashir mentioned.

radioText.cn: 等等，雕像上还刻着字？
radioText.en: Wait. There are words carved on the statue.

radioText.cn: “复归于此，前路自明。如遇危险请点亮引导灯，或联系武陵科学发展区紧急救助热线”？
radioText.en: "Return here to illuminate the path. For emergencies, switch on the guiding lights or call the emergency hotline of the Wuling Scientific Developmental District"...

radioText.cn: 欸，佩丽卡，“阿达希尔”这个名字……
radioText.en: Psst. Perlica, the name Ardashir...

radioText.cn: 是个古<@qu.key>萨尔贡</>人名。对于塔卫二的人来说，并不常见。
radioText.en: It's an ancient <@qu.key>Sargonian</> name. It is not commonly seen amongst the people of Talos-II.

radioText.cn: 萨尔贡啊……可真是个遥远的名字。
radioText.en: Sargonian...? Now that's a truly historical name.

radioText.cn: 可比起漫天的黄沙，眼前翠绿的景色，才更讨人喜欢。
radioText.en: These emeraldine landscapes look far more appealing, in comparison to the windswept lands of ochre dust.

radioText.cn: 无论侵蚀如何毒害大地，生命总会蓬勃生长……
radioText.en: No matter how the Blight poisons this land, life perseveres, grows, and reclaims...

radioText.cn: ……风捎来了花香，你们闻到了吗？
radioText.en: ...A flowery fragrance rides with the breeze. Is it not pleasing?

radioText.cn: 管理员，那后面就是总桩！
radioText.en: Endmin! Look! That's the main pillar!

radioText.cn: 天师桩……那里也是息壤堰的重要节点。看来我们快到武陵城了。
radioText.en: The Tianshi Pillar... An important node of the Xiranite Dam. We should be close to Wuling City.

radioText.cn: 真是群山延绵……
radioText.en: Great undulating mountains. Majestic indeed...

radioText.cn: 到了！管理员，小心脚下。
radioText.en: We've arrived! Endmin! Watch your step.

radioText.cn: 穿过这片竹林，前面就是武陵城了。
radioText.en: We'll reach Wuling City once we pass through this grove.

radioText.cn: 这些竹子……在动？
radioText.en: These bamboo trees ... can move.

radioText.cn: 啊！是<@qu.key>竹林虫</>！这就有点难办了，我记不住找路的诀窍……
radioText.en: Ah! They're <@qu.key>grovenymphs</>! Bamboo bugs! Aww, this will be tough. I forgot about the secrets of navigating through this...

radioText.cn: 竹、竹林虫？难道这些竹子全都是……
radioText.en: Grovenymphs? Does that mean these bamboo trees are just...

radioText.cn: 阿达希尔……果然还没走远。
radioText.en: Ardashir... He hasn't gone far.

radioText.cn: 这些竹林虫的运动……有什么规律吗？
radioText.en: These grovenymphs... Is there any rule that dictates their movement?

radioText.cn: 当然啦！天师们研究过，只不过，我实在记不住那些东西……
radioText.en: Of course! Those Tianshi totally researched that but ... I ... uh ... can't remember the details...

radioText.cn: 呵呵，好在它们没有什么攻击性……
radioText.en: Hehe. Fortunately, these creatures are not aggressive...

radioText.cn: 也许可以靠我们自己解开这个谜。
radioText.en: Perhaps we can solve this mystery on our own.

radioText.cn: 管理员，演技不错！
radioText.en: Endmin, that was some solid acting!

radioText.cn: 嗯？那个人影是……
radioText.en: Hm? Who's that over there?

radioText.cn: 你们取到水了？快倒进机关里！
radioText.en: Got water? Hurry and pour it in that mechanism!

radioText.cn: 大当家，怎么眉头皱这么紧？
radioText.en: Chief, why are you frowning like that?

radioText.cn: 瞎说什么呢？
radioText.en: Wha? What're you talking about?

radioText.cn: 我只是……有点担心，就一点点！
radioText.en: I'm ... I'm just a little worried. Really, just a little!

radioText.cn: 救人要紧，去寨子里吧。
radioText.en: People need help. Let's head in.

radioText.cn: 有任何需要我们配合的地方，告诉我。
radioText.en: If you need us to do anything, just say the word.

radioText.cn: 看来清波寨的日子也不好过……
radioText.en: Looks like life at Qingbo Stockade is tough too...

radioText.cn: 无论武陵的山水如何秀美，这片土地终究还是会吃人的。
radioText.en: Wuling may have stunning scenery, but that doesn't change how harsh this land really is.

radioText.cn: 加入清波寨的武陵人啊……有倒是有，不过亲眼见到还是挺稀奇的。
radioText.en: I've heard of Wuling people joining Qingbo Stockade, but it's rare to actually run into one.

radioText.cn: 人各有志，都有自己的过往，没什么奇怪的。
radioText.en: Everyone walks their own road, shaped by their own past. It is nothing unusual.

radioText.cn: 看来裂地者还没有和寨民发生大规模冲突。
radioText.en: Looks like no major clashes have happened between the residents and the Landbreakers.

radioText.cn: 不像聂菲斯的做派呀……
radioText.en: This doesn't feel like how Nefarith would do things.

radioText.cn: 看到他们了！
radioText.en: There they are!

radioText.cn: 先解决天使。
radioText.en: Take out the Aggeloi first.

radioText.cn: 这是什么手势？把闸……打开？
radioText.en: What? What are they trying to say? Open ... the sluice?

radioText.cn: 似乎得把竹筏浮起来才行。
radioText.en: Looks like we need to get the bamboo rafts floating.

radioText.cn: 咳，估计是光顾着躲“水花子”，没想过放了水会把自己也困住……
radioText.en: Uh... All that ducking probably shut their brains off. Guess they forgot they'd be trapped too...

radioText.cn: 等下，佩丽卡！这个储液罐……！？
radioText.en: Hold on, Perlica! Is this Fluid Tank...!?

radioText.cn: ……是终末地的产品。
radioText.en: ...Yes, it's a product from Endfield...

radioText.cn: 终末地和武陵有过一些贸易合作，可能是被他们……“借”来了。
radioText.en: We had some trading partnerships with Wuling, and it seems the people here may have ... "borrowed" the tank from them.

radioText.cn: 水位上来了！可以让伤员撤离了！
radioText.en: Water's risen! We can now get the injured out!

radioText.cn: 先带你们去第一个水车那儿瞧瞧。
radioText.en: I'll take you to the first waterwheelie to have a look.

radioText.cn: 喏，就是那边。
radioText.en: See? It's just over there.

radioText.cn: 黑面煞，这个吊桥你们肯定也有办法，对吧？
radioText.en: Darkmask, you got a way to fix this drawbridge, yeah?

radioText.cn: 看上去是被旁边的小水车驱动的……
radioText.en: It seems to be powered by the waterwheels next to it.

radioText.cn: 眼下还有更重要的事，还是不要到处乱跑吧。
radioText.en: Maybe we shouldn't keep running around. There's an important thing we need to take care of.

radioText.cn: 黑面煞，小青龙，脚上长点眼睛，这边路滑，危险得很。
radioText.en: Darkmask, Green Scales, watch your step. This route's real slick and risky.

radioText.cn: “黑面煞”？“小青龙”？
radioText.en: Darkmask...? Green Scales...?

radioText.cn: 你懂啥，加入清波寨的，都得有江湖绰号！
radioText.en: What? Every Stockader has a nickname! Rule's rule!

radioText.cn: 不然呢，当着巡卫和天师的面，你们要互相喊本名吗？
radioText.en: You ain't gonna holler your baby names before those Tianshi and nosy watchguards, are you?

radioText.cn: 汤汤，你现在还练铳吗？
radioText.en: Tangtang, have you been target practicing?

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿，想再和我过过招？现在你可没那么容易赢我——
radioText.en: Heh heh. Eager to spar with me, aren't ya? Winning won't come so easy for you now!

radioText.cn: 唔，这话听着好像不对劲……
radioText.en: Hmm... That didn't come out right...

radioText.cn: 这帮水花子怎么没完没了！杀不完一样！
radioText.en: These splatters just keep coming! Is there no end to them?

radioText.cn: “水花子”……形容这些天使确实挺贴切。
radioText.en: Splatters...? Sounds like a fitting name for these Aggeloi.

radioText.cn: 黑面煞，身手真不错啊。
radioText.en: Ayyy, Darkmask! You were on fire!

radioText.cn: 谁派你来的？
radioText.en: Who sent you here?

radioText.cn: 我只是在找人，无意与你们发生冲突。
radioText.en: I'm simply trying to find my friends, not looking to start any fights.

radioText.cn: 哥？
radioText.en: Ha, bro!

radioText.cn: 管理员，是佩丽卡的声音！
radioText.en: Endmin, it's Perlica!

radioText.cn: 阮一似乎很反感外人插手寨中的事。
radioText.en: Ruan Yi seems strongly opposed to outsiders interfering in their affairs.

radioText.cn: 想要调查聂菲斯的线索，我们得见机行事，避免冲突。
radioText.en: If we want to investigate Nefarith, we must proceed with caution and avoid unnecessary conflicts.

radioText.cn: 雨停了……
radioText.en: The rain has stopped...

radioText.cn: 大当家还需要亲自干活？
radioText.en: The Supreme Chief has to do grunt work?

radioText.cn: 干活咋了？干活光荣！
radioText.en: So what? Work's a badge of honor!

radioText.cn: 欸，陈千语，那个白毛黎博利和你很熟？哪儿骗来的？
radioText.en: Hey Chen, you seem close with this white-haired Liberi. Pulled some tricks on her?

radioText.cn: 什么叫“骗”！我们这是意气相投，惺惺相惜！
radioText.en: Well, excuse you! We're just two like-minded souls, alright?

radioText.cn: 啧啧，傻龙有傻福！
radioText.en: Oho, our dopey lung got lucky!

radioText.cn: 就是这里了。
radioText.en: This is the place.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这边的结构似乎可以调整。
radioText.en: Endmin, the structure on this side seems adjustable.

radioText.cn: 欸，还能这样？
radioText.en: Wha? You can actually do that?

radioText.cn: 黑面煞，你还藏着这一手呀！
radioText.en: Impressive, Darkmask. Got plenty of tricks up those sleeves of yours.

radioText.cn: 还有？！这些东西怎么没完没了？
radioText.en: MORE?! Can't these waterbugs just give up?

radioText.cn: 很安静，这才对嘛。
radioText.en: Ah, that's more like it.

radioText.cn: 黑面煞，这就是最后一个水车了。
radioText.en: Darkmask, this is the last of the waterwheelies.

radioText.cn: 炎国的人就是依靠这种方式运输水源，灌溉田地……
radioText.en: The people of Yan use these facilities to transport water and irrigate their fields...

radioText.cn: 终于动起来了！
radioText.en: It's moving! Finally!

radioText.cn: 听动静，那边的门应该是开了。
radioText.en: You hear that? That gate is opening.

radioText.cn: 我去确认一下，咱们在那边会合！
radioText.en: I'll go ahead and check things out. RON-DAY-VOO with me over there!

radioText.cn: 这些看上去……都是武陵城的东西。
radioText.en: These look like ... stuff from Wuling.

radioText.cn: 这里离武陵城近嘛。
radioText.en: 'Cos we're getting real close to town.

radioText.cn: ……进入武陵城的通信范围了。
radioText.en: ...We're within radio range of Wuling.

radioText.cn: 嗯，但愿之后可以妥善解决……
radioText.en: Mm. Let's just hope we can resolve this properly...

radioText.cn: 哇，总算快到武陵城了！
radioText.en: Alrighty. We're almost at Wuling City!

radioText.cn: 喂，那边是去内寨的路！
radioText.en: Hey! That path takes you to the bailey!

radioText.cn: 想要见识一下清波寨全貌的心情不是不能理解……但现在不合适！
radioText.en: I understand that you peeps are curious about Qingbo Stockade... But this is not yet the time!

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿，等我打点好了，包管寨子让你惊掉下巴。
radioText.en: Heheh. Wait till I get my biz in order. My Stockade will make you gawk with wonder! Guaranteed!

radioText.cn: 哼哼，你我四人，所向无敌啊！
radioText.en: Harhar. People should start calling us the Invincible Four!

radioText.cn: 说起来，要是没它，我们岂不是都没机会投奔大当家了？
radioText.en: Totally. All thanks to the big bad, it got us joining forces with the Supreme Chief!

radioText.cn: 真的？那它还真算得上功德圆满啦！
radioText.en: Really? Well, I suppose it has fulfilled its karmic duties!

radioText.cn: 没有水可用不了，巡卫随身的瓶子里应该还有些水，可以找他们取一些。
radioText.en: It won't work without water. We might have some in the watchguards' bottles. Get some from them.

radioText.cn: 瞧见那两个机关了吗？敲打它们可以把水渠转向不同的方向。
radioText.en: See those two mechanisms? Hit them to budge the canal to another direction.

radioText.cn: 只要水流能穿过水渠，流进水车里，我们就大功告成了！
radioText.en: Our job is done if we can get water flowing into the canal and the waterwheelies!

radioText.cn: 瞧见没，这俩水车连着最后的通路。跟之前一样，再来一次吧，黑面煞。
radioText.en: See that? These two waterwheelies are connected to the last stretch of the road. Go ahead and show us what you've got, Darkmask.

radioText.cn: 管理员，当心，这里气氛不对劲。
radioText.en: Stay alert, Endmin. Something doesn't feel right here.

radioText.cn: 唔，竟然还藏了只大家伙！
radioText.en: Hoho. Look what we have here — a big bad!

radioText.cn: 是破坏了我们竹筏的那只！
radioText.en: It's the same big bad that wrecked our raft!

radioText.cn: 管理员，对准那里。
radioText.en: Endmin. Aim at that location.

radioText.cn: 果然有效！
radioText.en: It worked!

radioText.cn: 沿着这个思路再试试吧。
radioText.en: Same approach. Let's do this again.

radioText.cn: 弭弗姐，那些被抓的寨民……
radioText.en: Mi Fu, about those Stockade residents you arrested...

radioText.cn: 放心，我有数。老弱病残会送回去的。
radioText.en: Don't worry. We'll send the old, weak, and sick back to the Stockade.

radioText.cn: 别的，关个五天再放……三天吧，免得便宜他们在牢里蹭饭。
radioText.en: As for the rest ... we'll keep them in the slammer for five days ... or three. Can't afford to give out too many free meals.

radioText.cn: 那汤汤？
radioText.en: What about Tangtang?

radioText.cn: 我会特别“招待”。
radioText.en: I got some house "special" for that brat.

radioText.cn: 啧，两天不打，小猫崽子又敢骑到我头上“拉屎”了。
radioText.en: Tsk. Just two days without spanking her, and that Feline brat's already acting up, rubbing her shite all over the place.

radioText.cn: 啊哈哈……看来这次也不得消停了。
radioText.en: Ah, hahah, yeah... There goes the peace, I guess.

radioText.cn: 过了河就是武陵城了。
radioText.en: We'll reach Wuling City once we cross this river.

radioText.cn: 有点紧张？
radioText.en: Nervous?

radioText.cn: 嗯……毕竟很久没回来过了。
radioText.en: A little... It's been a long time since I was last here.

radioText.cn: 快看！潘叔的店居然这么热闹——
radioText.en: Look! Uncle Pan's eatery. It's so packed!

radioText.cn: ——阿嚏！
radioText.en: ACHOO!

radioText.cn: ……还是受不了这辣味。
radioText.en: ...Still can't handle the spiciness.

radioText.cn: 前面有人吵架？
radioText.en: Are there people arguing up ahead?

radioText.cn: 学院周围嘛，不稀奇。
radioText.en: Well, we *are* around the academy.

radioText.cn: 呼……就快到了！前面就是总桩了！
radioText.en: Phew... We're almost there! The Main Pillar's right up ahead!

radioText.cn: 竹筏请尽快靠岸！然后立刻进城避难！
radioText.en: Attention raft, get to shore NOW! Evacuate into the city!

radioText.cn: 恩人！诸位恩人！
radioText.en: Hey, my saviors! My noble saviors!

radioText.cn: 武陵新潮竹沥奶茶第二杯半价！一杯独饮开怀，两杯开启幸福。
radioText.en: Try Wuling's trendy Bamboo Dew Milk Tea! Half off your second cup! One for solitary joy, two to unlock happiness!

radioText.cn: 可惜我们有三个人。
radioText.en: Too bad there's three of us.

radioText.cn: ……管理员，一会儿我们再回来逛逛吧。
radioText.en: Endmin... Let's come back later.

radioText.cn: 哎，小陈！我没看错吧！你什么时候回来的！
radioText.en: Whoa—Chen? Is that really you? Since when did you come back?

radioText.cn: 侵蚀？这么近？！
radioText.en: Blight? This close?!

radioText.cn: 呼，城内还是那么让人安心！
radioText.en: Whew, I feel so relaxed now that we're inside the city!

radioText.cn: 是啊，城外的紧张气氛似乎完全影响不到这里。
radioText.en: Hmm, the tension out there doesn't seem to have reached here at all.

radioText.cn: 管理员，别耽误太久。这一带有危险，先进城吧！
radioText.en: We need to move, Endmin. It's dangerous out here. We should get to the city!

radioText.cn: 管理员，快上竹筏！
radioText.en: Endmin, get on the raft!

radioText.cn: 管理员，庄天师还等着我们呢。先去见她吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, Tianshi Zhuang is waiting for us. We should see her first.

radioText.cn: 管理员，让庄天师等太久是不是不太好？
radioText.en: Endmin, wouldn't it be improper to keep Tianshi Zhuang waiting for too long?

radioText.cn: 先随我来。
radioText.en: Please follow me.

radioText.cn: 息壤给这座城市带来的革新，留给您亲自去发现吧。
radioText.en: I'll let you witness for yourself the innovations Xiranite has brought to this city.

radioText.cn: 管理员，请随我来。
radioText.en: Endministrator, if you'll come this way.

radioText.cn: 你们来的路上也看到了城外目前的情况……
radioText.en: You've probably seen how things are outside the city on your way here...

radioText.cn: 但想必还没见过侵蚀潮的全貌。
radioText.en: But I'm guessing you haven't seen the full extent of the Blight Tide yet.

radioText.cn: 在这儿，或许能看得更清楚些。
radioText.en: Here, you should be able to see it more clearly.

radioText.cn: 哎，记得我第一次来武陵，乘着竹筏，看到河面上船来船往，可激动了。
radioText.en: I still remember my first time coming to Wuling. Riding that bamboo raft ... I was so excited!

radioText.cn: 当时还遇到岸边的巡卫冲我打招呼呢。
radioText.en: Then a watchguard waved from the bank. Thought he was saying hi.

radioText.cn: 不过后来我才知道，人家只是示意我保持船距。
radioText.en: Only later did I realize he was signaling me to keep a safe distance from other rafts.

radioText.cn: 但今天真的好安静啊，怎么都没见到别的竹筏？
radioText.en: Weird, it's so quiet today. Where're the other rafts?

radioText.cn: 喂喂——这玩意儿咋用——
radioText.en: HELLO? How the heck does this work?

radioText.cn: 嘿！黑面煞！是我！
radioText.en: Yo! Darkmask! It's me!

radioText.cn: 那个红脸婆追得紧，我就长话短说了！
radioText.en: That mad woman's on me hard, so I'll cut it real quick!

radioText.cn: 最近武陵城那边怪事挺多，又是水花子又是侵蚀，招子放亮点！
radioText.en: Things in Wuling City have been acting up lately — splatters, that Blight crap. You stay frosty, alright?

radioText.cn: 要是有麻烦——
radioText.en: If trouble pops off...

radioText.cn: 信号中断了……也许是弭弗追上她了。
radioText.en: She got cut off... Maybe Mi Fu caught her.

radioText.cn: 心情怎么有点复杂呢……
radioText.en: Weird... My heart feels heavy and light at the same time...

radioText.cn: 什么东西漂过来了……货箱？
radioText.en: Something's drifting over... Is that a container?

radioText.cn: 这么靠近武陵城的地方，不应该呀……是出了什么事故吗？
radioText.en: This close to Wuling City? Shouldn't be... Did something happen?

radioText.cn: ……保持警惕。
radioText.en: Stay on guard, everyone.

radioText.cn: 跟上！
radioText.en: Keep moving!

radioText.cn: 前面的<@qu.key>天师桩阵列</>就能遏制侵蚀，抵御天使！进去就安全了！
radioText.en: The <@qu.key>Tianshi Pillar array</> ahead can hold off the Blight and the Aggeloi! We'll be safe inside!

radioText.cn: 天、天使！
radioText.en: A-Aggeloi!

radioText.cn: 这里交给我们！
radioText.en: We'll hold them off!

radioText.cn: 可是——
radioText.en: But...

radioText.cn: 别“可是”了！保护好其他人！
radioText.en: No buts! Just keep everyone else safe!

radioText.cn: 欸……你说天师桩这么高，爬上去是不是能发现巢雕或者别的什么？
radioText.en: Hmm, the Tianshi Pillars are really tall... Think we'd see a denstack or something from up there?

radioText.cn: 我以前就爬过！当时大半夜的，能看见好远好远的清波寨灯火呢……
radioText.en: You know, I once climbed one of these, in the dead of night — you could even see the lights of Qingbo Stockade in the far distance.

radioText.cn: 请注意！武陵新增规定，擅自攀登天师桩罚款五百金票！
radioText.en: Attention! New Wuling regulation: unauthorized climbing of the Tianshi Pillars will incur a fine of 500 T-Creds!

radioText.cn: 咳！我什么都没说！
radioText.en: Ahem! Wasn't me!

radioText.cn: 听庄天师讲了这么长一串故事……心情都不太一样了。
radioText.en: That was quite the story from Tianshi Zhuang... It really puts you in a different mood.

radioText.cn: 虽然看起来还是热热闹闹的，但实际情况已经……
radioText.en: Things may look lively on the surface, but in reality...

radioText.cn: 别想太多，陈。
radioText.en: Don't overthink it, Chen.

radioText.cn: 终末地会全力支援武陵的。
radioText.en: Endfield will give Wuling its full support.

radioText.cn: 嗯……而且，还有管理员在！
radioText.en: Right. And the Endmin's here with us!

radioText.cn: 又是负责拦门，又是城门口救人……最近巡卫特别忙吧？
radioText.en: Between gate duty and emergency rescues, the watchguards must be pretty swamped lately, huh?

radioText.cn: 嗯，纪叔昨天还在阵列那边轮值。他恐怕有七八天没见着小女儿了。
radioText.en: Yeah, Uncle Ji was still on shift at the array yesterday. He probably hasn't seen his little girl in over a week...

radioText.cn: 对了，诸位请跟紧些。前方区域侵蚀活跃。
radioText.en: Oh, right. Please stick close. The Blight's very active up ahead.

radioText.cn: 阵列内也有侵蚀？
radioText.en: There's Blight inside the array too?

radioText.cn: 远离市区中心的地方确实会有……不过都在控制之中！
radioText.en: Yes, it does occur in areas away from the city center ... but it's all under control!

radioText.cn: 给水器……放干水渠旁边吧。最好也别离水泵太远。
radioText.en: We can place the Fluid Supply Unit right by the drained canal, close to the Fluid Pump.

radioText.cn: 不是禁止通行吗？怎么还有那么多人？
radioText.en: So many people here. I thought this place was off-limits.

radioText.cn: 他们是<@qu.key>工农生产单位</>的天师和职农，天师维护监测数据和息壤设备，职农确保试验田块维持基本产量。
radioText.en: They're Tianshi and farmers from the <@qu.key>industrial and agricultural production unit</>. The Tianshi handle data monitoring and Xiranite equipment, while the farmers keep test plots productive.

radioText.cn: 他们也是武陵城能正常运转的保障。
radioText.en: Wuling wouldn't run without them.

radioText.cn: 没错，我们都清楚武陵城因何而存在。大家都是这么顶着危险，打起一万分精神过着每一天。
radioText.en: Exactly. We all know why Wuling City exists. Danger's our shadow, and we outpace it by never lowering our guard.

radioText.cn: 预留地点不在那边。诸位，跟紧我。
radioText.en: The reserved area isn't over there. Please follow me closely.

radioText.cn: 看剑！
radioText.en: Take this!

radioText.cn: 白霜，《污染区实验手册》第七十三条！
radioText.en: Bai Shuang, Section 73 of the Blighted Zone Manual!

radioText.cn: 明白，做好防护，紧急避险，剩下的交给——
radioText.en: Understood. Put on protective gear, seek immediate shelter, and leave the rest to...

radioText.cn: ——巡卫在此！非战斗人员请速速站到我身后！
radioText.en: Me! All non-combatants, move behind me immediately!

radioText.cn: 就在这儿。
radioText.en: We've arrived.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这个地块很平整，局部晴好，风速适中，可以部署协议核心。
radioText.en: Endmin, this plot meets all deployment criteria — level terrain, favorable weather, and optimal wind conditions.

radioText.cn: 我们开始吧。
radioText.en: Let us begin.

radioText.cn: 这水泵，看起来就和我们单位的一样结实。小风，你打它一拳试试？
radioText.en: Hah! This pump looks as sturdy as ours. Hey Feng, give it a punch.

radioText.cn: 要打你打……谁会用水泵练拳啊！
radioText.en: Why? Who in their right mind punches a pump?!

radioText.cn: 好了好了，我们还差个给水器呢。
radioText.en: Okay okay, back to work. We are still missing a Fluid Supply Unit.

radioText.cn: 水泵就放那个位置吧，离水渠近些。
radioText.en: Please place the Fluid Pump over there, closer to the canal.

radioText.cn: 之前帮职农干活儿时，我就老抽不上水，还会被老师骂……呜……
radioText.en: Last time I was helping the farmers, the pump never worked right! Ma'am yelled at me all the time... *weep*...

radioText.cn: 你们打算怎么连管道？
radioText.en: So... How are you planning to connect them?

radioText.cn: 哇！这看起来和我们武陵的技术真的不一样欸！
radioText.en: Wow! This looks nothing like Wuling's tech!

radioText.cn: 果然还有天使。清理掉它们之后再解决侵蚀。
radioText.en: More Aggeloi. Let's clear them first then handle the Blight.

radioText.cn: 这玩意儿和四号谷地的状态还不太一样，呃……有点恶心。
radioText.en: They are different from what we encountered in Valley IV. Ew ... they're gross!

radioText.cn: 佩丽卡，你刚才在想什么？
radioText.en: What's on your mind, Perlica?

radioText.cn: 我只是在想，庄管代真是个特别的领袖……
radioText.en: Just thinking about Viceroy Zhuang and her unique approach to leadership...

radioText.cn: 弭弗、彦宁，还有其他人，比起把她当作管代，似乎更愿意和她成为朋友。
radioText.en: Mi Fu, Yan Ning, and the others ... it seems they'd rather be her friend than treat her as their Viceroy.

radioText.cn: 她愿意为武陵牺牲，能力拔群，其他人从不担心她能不能做到，似乎只是在担心这个朋友……会不会太累。
radioText.en: For Wuling, she'd give her all. None question her peerless skill, they only fear their friend ... might be burning herself out.

radioText.cn: ……哎呀！你又开始想这些了，要我说，咱们佩丽卡监督也够优秀了！
radioText.en: Oh, Perly! Why did you start thinking about this again? Here are my two cents. I think Supervisor Perlica is extremely capable as well!

radioText.cn: 当然，管理员也是！
radioText.en: Of course, the same applies to our Endmin!

radioText.cn: 对准阵列稳定桩，保证它的能量在平衡状态，就能控制住它的温度。
radioText.en: Aim at the array stabilizing rod. Get its energy level within the range of equilibrium. That'll help control its temperature.

radioText.cn: 这台无人机……是管理员唤醒的吧，它的施术单元似乎被强化了。
radioText.en: Did you ... activate this drone, Endmin? Its Arts Unit seems to be quite enhanced.

radioText.cn: 用那边的控流节点。
radioText.en: Use the flow control node over there.

radioText.cn: 庄天师，今天怎么有空参加我们的活动了？
radioText.en: Tianshi Zhuang? You finally found the time to come jogging with us.

radioText.cn: 前面就是材料研究所。
radioText.en: The Institute of Materials Science is up ahead.

radioText.cn: 哇，几年之间，又扩建了一座实验室啊……
radioText.en: Wow! They added another lab building in just a few years...

radioText.cn: 看来，在宏科院无数种对抗侵蚀的方案中，“息壤计划”也颇受重视。
radioText.en: Out of the numerous HAS proposals for dealing with the Blight, Project Xiranite seems to be getting plenty of attention.
Good ... day ... Tianshi ... Zhuang!

radioText.cn: 有看到气球和天桩吗？
radioText.en: Endmin, have you see the balloon and sky pole?

radioText.cn: 只有一辆出事故的洒水车……
radioText.en: I only see a sprinkler truck involved in an accident...

radioText.cn: 看上去是被天桩撞到了。
radioText.en: It must have been hit by the sky pole...

radioText.cn: 庄天师，这是你新收的弟子吗？
radioText.en: Tianshi Zhuang, your new disciple?

radioText.cn: 不，这位是终末地的管理员。
radioText.en: Oh, no. This is the Endministrator of Endfield Industries.

radioText.cn: 这位就是管理员？！真的假的……
radioText.en: The Endministrator?! Seriously...?

radioText.cn: 看起来好年轻……
radioText.en: Looks really young to me...

radioText.cn: 别介意，年轻天师们大都没有见过你本人，都是道听途说。
radioText.en: Please don't mind them. Most of the young Tianshi never met you before. Hearsays and written records are all that they have.

radioText.cn: 其实他们知道你要来，好奇得不得了。
radioText.en: In fact, they've been keen to see you after hearing you were coming.

radioText.cn: 就在前面！
radioText.en: It's just up ahead!

radioText.cn: 快点！
radioText.en: Let's hurry!

radioText.cn: 嗯！
radioText.en: Yeah!

radioText.cn: 哎呀——！什么东西！
radioText.en: WOW—! What da...?!

radioText.cn: 从这里上去就是资料室。
radioText.en: The data room is upstairs from here.

radioText.cn: 所有的档案权限都已经向你开放了。
radioText.en: You should have full access to all the files.

radioText.cn: 你当年说，等到城市建成，要一口气从城东跑到城西。
radioText.en: You once said that when the city was complete, you'd sprint from the east to west in one breath.

radioText.cn: 不过现在的台阶很多……一口气，有点太累了。
radioText.en: But with all these stairs now... "In one breath" might be asking too much.

radioText.cn: 为了给枢壤仪起名字，大家还动过手。
radioText.en: We had an intense discussion to name the Xiranite Nexus. The debate actually turned physical.

radioText.cn: 幸亏老师最后打赢了，不然这台仪器就得叫……嗯，现在也很难说出口。
radioText.en: Thankfully my mentor won in the end, or we'd have to call it ... *sigh* I still can't bring myself to say it...

radioText.cn: 过了前面天师府学院的“三到钟”，就快到了。
radioText.en: Once we get past the Bell of Three Presences of the Tianshi Bureau Academy, we'll be pretty close.

radioText.cn: “三到钟”？
radioText.en: Bell of Three Presences?

radioText.cn: 学院的箴言，“眼到、心到、手到”。
radioText.en: HAS motto. "See true. Think clear. Practice plenty". Three presences, see?

radioText.cn: 不过，我以前在学院的朋友更喜欢解释成“困到爆、学到疯、考到懵”。
radioText.en: Though my HAS friends always joked it meant: "Eyes glazed. Brain fried. Hands cramped."

radioText.cn: ……说起来，是不是该去找大伙儿叙叙旧？
radioText.en: ...Speaking of which, maybe I should reach out for a gathering or something.

radioText.cn: 你当时离开得很匆忙，没有告别。
radioText.en: Your last departure was so... abrupt. Not even a proper goodbye.

radioText.cn: 武陵也许只是你漫长旅途中的一个落脚点，可依然有一群人，决心跟随你的事业。
radioText.en: This city might've just been a pause for you... but we're not letting go of what you started here.

radioText.cn: 管理员，只要重新靠近控流节点就能完成无人机充能。
radioText.en: Endmin, just re-approach the flow control if you need to charge up the drone.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你……还有其他的事情要做吗？
radioText.en: Endmin, are you ... busy with something else?

radioText.cn: 以后还有很多时间来尝试呢。
radioText.en: There'll be plenty of time for that later.

radioText.cn: 管理员，走这边。
radioText.en: Over here, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这会儿刚好撞上学生们的休息时间，外面估计挺热闹的。
radioText.en: This happens to be the students' recess. The place might get a little busy.

radioText.cn: 说起来，这次要不是有你们帮忙，我都很难抽时间出来放松一下。
radioText.en: To be honest, I wouldn't be getting this break if you never came to help us out.

radioText.cn: 管理员，跟紧天桩，别让它跑了。
radioText.en: Keep up with the sky pole, Endmin! Don't let it escape.

radioText.cn: 咦，庄天师你今天不是一个人？
radioText.en: Wow. You actually brought a friend along, Tianshi Zhuang.

radioText.cn: 庄天师好……
radioText.en: Hoo... Hi there, Tianshi Zhuang...

radioText.cn: 不好意思，麻烦大家让一下！
radioText.en: Sorry, folks. We really need to pass through this place!

radioText.cn: 阿庄，等到裂隙被我们彻底填平，这里说不定会有一座新城市。如果真有那么一天，我许愿城里有一间全天供应甜食的铺子！
radioText.en: Fangyi, once we completely fill up the Rift, maybe they'll build a brand new city there. If that day comes, I hope there's gonna be a 24/7 dessert store!

radioText.cn: 你呢？不会想要一栋新的实验大楼吧？
radioText.en: How about you? Don't tell me you're gonna ask for a brand new research building.

radioText.cn: 我们的实验室够多了。我觉得可以有一个吉祥物，还得放在最显眼的地方。我看训练场旁边那块地就很合适。
radioText.en: There are enough labs already. I think we can use a mascot. We should place it somewhere really conspicuous. That empty plot next to the training grounds looks perfect.

radioText.cn: 司岁台那帮人肯定不同意。他们还一直嫌给应龙特勤队训练的场地不够呢——
radioText.en: The people working for the Sui Regulator would never agree. In fact, they keep complaining that the Yinglung Special Task Force isn't getting the training areas it needs—

radioText.cn: 阿庄，你怎么又没关记录仪！
radioText.en: *Gasp* Fangyi! Why did you leave the recording device on again?!

radioText.cn: 完了……该不会以后每次刷脸进门都要做鬼脸吧！
radioText.en: I'm doomed… Now I'll be stuck pulling this ridiculous face every single scan-in?!

radioText.cn: 等等……孩子的哭声？
radioText.en: Wait... I think I hear a child crying.

radioText.cn: 也不能放着不管……
radioText.en: I can't just ignore this...

radioText.cn: 孩子的气球被卷跑了……
radioText.en: A child lost a balloon...

radioText.cn: 不赖啊，黑面煞！
radioText.en: Not bad, Darkmask!

radioText.cn: 你这种人才，果然还是跟我回寨子吧！
radioText.en: A true talent like you should get a permanent seat in my Stockade!

radioText.cn: 不知道弭弗那边情况怎么样……毕竟只有她一个人。
radioText.en: I wonder how Mi Fu is doing... She just ran off on her own.

radioText.cn: ……她出不了事。咱们干掉水花子就跟上。
radioText.en: ...She'll be alright. Let's ... let's just get rid of the splatters and chase up to her.

radioText.cn: 汤汤，你看着很着急嘛！
radioText.en: You look really worried, Tangtang!

radioText.cn: 呃，一千斤的肉和鳞呢！我当然……啊，忘了要盐了。
radioText.en: Nah! It's all about one thousand catties of prime cuts and fins! I gotta protect my investment... AH! I gotta ask for salt as well!

radioText.cn: 那扇门怎么打开？
radioText.en: That gate! How do we open it?!

radioText.cn: 开启的机关应该就在这片区域，我们仔细找找吧。
radioText.en: The activation switch should be nearby. Let's search this place thoroughly.

radioText.cn: 好大的水花子……
radioText.en: Gah! This splatter is huge...

radioText.cn: 管理员，观测站的核心设备虽有受损，但不严重。
radioText.en: Endmin, monitoring center core facilities have been damaged, but not severely.

radioText.cn: 幸好……
radioText.en: We got lucky...

radioText.cn: 维护过后，重启就好。
radioText.en: Some simple repairs and a reboot should do the trick.

radioText.cn: 管理员，“<@qu.key>天有洪炉</>”的制造工序现在可以查阅了。
radioText.en: Endmin, we can now view the construction process for the <@qu.key>Forge of the Sky</>.

radioText.cn: 管理员，先使用协议核心制造一台天有洪炉吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, let's use the PAC to construct a Forge of the Sky unit.

radioText.cn: 现在可以用天有洪炉生产<@qu.key>息壤</>了！
radioText.en: We can now use the Forge of the Sky to produce <@qu.key>Xiranite</>!

radioText.cn: 前面就是息壤控流节点，放入息壤就能使用。
radioText.en: The Xiranite flow control node is up ahead. Place some Xiranite in it to use the device.

radioText.cn: 就是它？
radioText.en: Is this it?

radioText.cn: 我一直以为它只是个景观点呢！
radioText.en: I thought it was just decor for a scenic vantage point!

radioText.cn: 试着激活息壤控流节点吧。
radioText.en: Try activating the Xiranite flow control node.

radioText.cn: 嚯，“冰消瓦解”！
radioText.en: Hah! Watch it melt away like ice in summer!

radioText.cn: 成功了……！
radioText.en: Success...!

radioText.cn: 管理员，当心，不要离开<@qu.key>净化范围</>。
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin. Try to stay within the <@qu.key>purification radius</>.

radioText.cn: 就在前面，她已经动上手了！
radioText.en: She's up ahead! And she's started the fight already!

radioText.cn: 那家伙怎么打赌还拼命的！
radioText.en: This is just a game! Why is she getting herself killed?

radioText.cn: 管理员，这应该就是观测站的<@qu.key>监测终端</>。回去之前，先试用一下监测系统吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, this is the <@qu.key>terminal</> of the monitoring center. Before we head back, we should use it to test the system first.

radioText.cn: 然后把我们得到的影像数据上传到终端。
radioText.en: We can then upload the image data to the terminal.

radioText.cn: 圆满成功！是不是该回去了？
radioText.en: Total success! So, is it time to head back yet?

radioText.cn: 嗯。弭弗和汤汤已经在前面等我们了，走吧。
radioText.en: Yes. Mi Fu and Tangtang are waiting for us. Let's go.

radioText.cn: 喂，红脸婆，别逞能！
radioText.en: Hey! Mad woman! This thing ain't no joke!

radioText.cn: 哈，再来！
radioText.en: Hah! Again!

radioText.cn: 汤汤，闪开！
radioText.en: Tangtang, get out of the way!

radioText.cn: 少指手画脚！
radioText.en: Shut your trap! You ain't my mom!

radioText.cn: “天有洪炉”？
radioText.en: Forge of the Sky?

radioText.cn: 这个词我听过，好像是来自大炎的什么古老传说——“天有洪炉……”
radioText.en: Oh! I heard about this thing before. I think it was mentioned in some ancient legend of Great Yan that goes like: "Harken: the forge of the sky..."

radioText.cn: “……地生五金”，或许这是天师们对新机器的期许。
radioText.en: "...Awaits five earthborn metals". Perhaps this was the Tianshi's wish for their new machine.

radioText.cn: 管理员，只要在息壤控流节点的<@qu.key>净化范围</>内，你都可以使用它！
radioText.en: Endmin, you can use the device as long as you're within the purification radius of the <@qu.key>Xiranite flow control node</>!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们还是先解决<@qu.key>侵蚀</>吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, maybe we should get rid of the <@qu.key>Blight</> first.

radioText.cn: 观测站的麻烦我也头疼，这次干脆一鼓作气，把它解决。
radioText.en: The monitoring center incident is a real hassle. I say we keep pushing and get it fixed in one go.

radioText.cn: 这些侵蚀……试试用息壤控流节点解决吧。
radioText.en: The Blight... Hmm. We can try using the Xiranite flow control node to eliminate it.

radioText.cn: 这些侵蚀和四号谷地的有所差异。
radioText.en: This Blight is different from the ones we see in Valley IV.

radioText.cn: 侵蚀核心看上去就在颜色更突出的地方。
radioText.en: The Blight Core might be somewhere with different hues.

radioText.cn: 这机关看上去用<@qu.key>射流无人机</>就能解决。
radioText.en: That switch looks like a job for our <@qu.key>jet drone</>.

radioText.cn: 管理员，那边还有<@qu.key>息壤控流节点</>！
radioText.en: Endmin, over there — a <@qu.key>Xiranite flow control node</>!

radioText.cn: 说不定能派上用场！
radioText.en: We can probably use it!

radioText.cn: 管理员，去确认一下<@qu.key>核心设备</>吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, let's take a look at the <@qu.key>core facilities</>.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我已就位，等我们会合就——
radioText.en: Endmin, I'm in position. Once we meet up, we'll —

radioText.cn: 放开我！有本事你放开我！
radioText.en: LEMME GO! DAMN YOU! COWARD!

radioText.cn: 啧，安分点。
radioText.en: Tsk. Behave.

radioText.cn: ……我是不是听见汤汤的声音了？
radioText.en: ...Did I just hear Tangtang?

radioText.cn: 水花子居然打到这儿来了……
radioText.en: Those damn splatters made it all the way here...

radioText.cn: 这边的样子……和寨子里好像……
radioText.en: This place ... reminds me of the Stockade...

radioText.cn: 侵蚀交给你们，我去确认其他人的情况。
radioText.en: Take care of the Blight. I'll check on the others.

radioText.cn: 对了，汤汤，你知道储备站的物资其实都是……
radioText.en: Oh, Tangtang, the supplies at the reserve depot are actually —

radioText.cn: 都是武陵城的资产，而这个小猫崽子总爱把爪子伸过来。
radioText.en: Properties of Wuling City. And this lil' Feline can't keep her kitty paws in check.

radioText.cn: 那是我凭本事拿的，你不服吗？！
radioText.en: I nabbed the stuff with skills. What do you have to say to that?

radioText.cn: 好、好吧……
radioText.en: Okay. Fine...

radioText.cn: 身手退步了嘛，当庄方宜的爪牙，太安逸了？
radioText.en: Oh, you got real clumsy! I guess being Zhuang Fangyi's errand girl made you soft and slow!

radioText.cn: 本事不大，废话不少。
radioText.en: More mouth than muscle.

radioText.cn: ……怎么越来越多了？红脸婆，你真往里冲哇？！
radioText.en: ...Ugh. There's no end to these buggers! Mad woman! WHA?! Don't charge straight into them!

radioText.cn: 怕了的话，你认输。
radioText.en: Scared? That means you're losing the bet.

radioText.cn: 做你的春秋大梦！
radioText.en: IN YOUR DREAMS!

radioText.cn: 好严重的<@qu.key>侵蚀潮</>……对环境影响好大……
radioText.en: This <@qu.key>Blight Tide</> looks really bad... Look at what it's doing to the environment...

radioText.cn: 这什么破烂机关！黑面煞，你快来看看！
radioText.en: Grrr. Blasted machine! Darkmask! Take care of this!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们见过类似的装置，启动原理应该差不多。
radioText.en: Endmin, we've encountered similar devices before. Maybe we can activate it in the same way.

radioText.cn: 塌方果然已经被清理了。
radioText.en: The landslide has been cleared away.

radioText.cn: 桥好像还没连通？
radioText.en: The bridge is still out, though.

radioText.cn: 哇，这下路总算通了！
radioText.en: Whew. We can finally use this road!

radioText.cn: 你本来打算用这条路做什么？
radioText.en: So, what was your plan for this road?

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿，要从武陵城“借”更多的粮食，只能走这儿。
radioText.en: Heheh. This is the only path if we need to "borrow" more food from the city.

radioText.cn: 看来寨里物资短缺的情况更严重了。
radioText.en: I fear supplies at the Stockade are dwindling...

radioText.cn: 所以这不是盼着那一千斤粮食嘛！
radioText.en: Totally. That's why I really need to get one thousand catties of food!

radioText.cn: 先回寨子再说吧！嘿，这次可以正式介绍黑面煞了！
radioText.en: Let's save this discussion for the Stockade! Heh. Time to formally introduce Darkmask!

radioText.cn: 我正好知道有片合适的地方，宽敞又僻静！
radioText.en: Come with me. I got the PURR-fect place for you! Spacious! And quiet!

radioText.cn: 你是怎么发现的？
radioText.en: How did you find this place?

radioText.cn: 当然是睡觉——不，巡逻！巡逻的时候发现的！
radioText.en: So I was just napping — WAIT! I was doing some serious SURVEYING of my turf! Found it during my patrols!

radioText.cn: 对了……管理员，你们回去的时候，不必走“小道”了。
radioText.en: Before I forget... Endmin, you don't have to take the secret trail to reach the Stockade.

radioText.cn: 天师们刚才汇报，主路的清障工作已经基本完成。
radioText.en: The Tianshi just sent me an update about their clearing work. The main road is now open.

radioText.cn: 去看看吧。
radioText.en: Go take a look.

radioText.cn: 这大家伙……是被锚点唤醒的吗？
radioText.en: Did the Ankhors wake this ... big thing?!

radioText.cn: 是由大型天使遗骸重组的复合构装体，小心应对！
radioText.en: An amalgamation of giant Aggeloid remains. Tackle it carefully!

radioText.cn: 不要再给它机会，找准时机，打断它！
radioText.en: It's making a major move! Try to interrupt it!

radioText.cn: 它在自我重组，光环的颜色也变了，当心！
radioText.en: It's reassembling itself! The color of its halo has changed too! Careful!

radioText.cn: 真是难缠的对手……
radioText.en: What a tough one...

radioText.cn: 这些碍事的天使……先扫清它们！
radioText.en: Deal with its minions first. They're a pain!

radioText.cn: 危险！快去树枝那边！
radioText.en: Quick! Get to the sapling!

radioText.cn: 震荡波的源头果然在这里，幸好有这些树枝！
radioText.en: It's blasting out shockwaves! Good thing we have the saplings here!

radioText.cn: 又来？
radioText.en: AGAIN?!

radioText.cn: 它由三部分构成，这应该就是最后的形态。不要放松警惕。
radioText.en: It has three components, so this should be its final form. Stay alert.

radioText.cn: 它消失了！这又是什么花招？
radioText.en: It disappeared! How many tricks does it have?!

radioText.cn: 空气里的那些波纹……那就是它的行动轨迹！
radioText.en: Look! Ripples in the air... It's gotta be there!

radioText.cn: 交给我吧，直接给它两招就乖乖显形了！
radioText.en: Leave it to me! Two slashes will end its stupid hide and seek!

radioText.cn: 睁眼看看，这就是令你们畏惧的“新生”。
radioText.en: Open your eyes and behold the Rebirth that haunts your souls.

radioText.cn: 这是……人形的天使？！
radioText.en: An Aggelos ... with human form?!

radioText.cn: 那些附肢在保护本体，先破坏它们！
radioText.en: Those appendages are protecting the main body! Destroy them first!

radioText.cn: 挣扎吧……我的“救世主”。
radioText.en: Struggle all you want ... my dear "Savior".

radioText.cn: 还想继续迷失多久？
radioText.en: How long is your ignorance going to last?

radioText.cn: 仰望天空吧。
radioText.en: *Chuckle*. Look to the skies.

radioText.cn: 当心空中袭击！
radioText.en: Look out, it's attacking us from above!

radioText.cn: 快跳起来，躲开冲击！
radioText.en: Don't let the shockwave hit you! JUMP!

radioText.cn: 够了，带去给维拉吧。
radioText.en: These should be enough. Let's bring them back to Vera.

radioText.cn: 维拉说的地方在山崖上面，得想个办法上去。
radioText.en: Vera said the spot's up on the cliff. You need to find a way up, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 就是这个。
radioText.en: This must be it.

radioText.cn: 我这“三大难”，一共要试“力气”“身手”和“能耐”。咱们一样一样来。
radioText.en: My Three Super Dares are trials of strength, agility, and skills. We'll face them one at a time.

radioText.cn: 书呆子，掰腕子总会吧？出来比划比划！
radioText.en: Alright, dorknerd. I suppose you know how to arm wrestle. Show me what your soft pen-pushing paws can do!

radioText.cn: 啊？我？比力气？
radioText.en: Wha? Me? Arm wrestle?

radioText.cn: 怎么，怕了？你只管使招，动半点都算我输。
radioText.en: What? You scared, dorknerd? Go on, use your flashy tricks. Consider me lost if I budged an inch.

radioText.cn: 哼……来就来，怕你不成！
radioText.en: Hmph... Arm wrestling it shall be. I'm not afraid!

radioText.cn: 这距离也太远了！以前真有人做到过吗？
radioText.en: That's hella far! I find it hard to believe that anyone pulled this off!

radioText.cn: 对了，浪头说咱们用飞的也行，管理员，有没有什么别的办法？
radioText.en: Wait. Lang Tou said we can even try flying. Endmin, maybe we can try something else.

radioText.cn: 果然还是不行吗……欸，我有个主意！
radioText.en: Ugh. We failed again... OH! WAIT! I got an idea!

radioText.cn: 反正他也没限制我们用什么办法赶路，要不……我们试试<@qu.key>滑索</>？
radioText.en: He never said we gotta run or jump. Why don't we ... <@qu.key>zipline</> our way across?

radioText.cn: 这里好多裂地者活动的痕迹，感觉不妙啊……
radioText.en: This place is looking pretty dangerous to me. It's got all the markings of an LB raiding party...

radioText.cn: 我们得加快速度了。
radioText.en: We must hurry.

radioText.cn: 救命！救命啊！！！
radioText.en: HELP! SOMEONE HELP ME!!

radioText.cn: 是索斯先生！快，救人！
radioText.en: It's Mr. Soth! Quick! We must save him!

radioText.cn: 大家的状态不太对劲……这到底是怎么了？
radioText.en: Everyone looks sick... What's going on?

radioText.cn: 这里突然多了好多人……怎么回事？
radioText.en: We suddenly have a lot more people here... What's going on?

radioText.cn: 卡贾不在这里，难道他往更深处去了？
radioText.en: Karja isn't here. Perhaps he went further into the place.

radioText.cn: 再往前可就危险了呀……
radioText.en: Geez... He really went deep into the danger zone...

radioText.cn: 裂地者还没全跑干净呢，卡贾怎么会到这里来的……
radioText.en: Not all the breakers have left this place. Why would Karja come here...?

radioText.cn: 救命！救命啊！！！
radioText.en: HELP! HELP ME!!!

radioText.cn: 是卡贾！快，救人！
radioText.en: That's Karja! Quick, save him!

radioText.cn: 啧，裂地者把这里的布置全弄乱了，本来还有几条小路可绕的。
radioText.en: Blightery. The breakers messed this place up completely. There used to be a few trails we could use.

radioText.cn: 就是就是……咦，你为什么这么清楚要塞的情况？
radioText.en: Yeah, they really caused havoc here. Waaait... How do you know the layout of this fort so well?

radioText.cn: 什么也没有……*咕哝*这家伙，没用了。
radioText.en: Nothing... *Mumbles*. We gots no more use for this dude.

radioText.cn: 嗯？什么人！
radioText.en: Huh? Who's there?

radioText.cn: 哟，管理员，你怎么来这儿啦？
radioText.en: Ah. Endmin. What brings you here?

radioText.cn: 抢，都抢走……
radioText.en: Take all! Take everything...

radioText.cn: 杀光……烧掉……一个都别想跑！
radioText.en: KILL ... BURN...! NO PRISONERS!

radioText.cn: 系统运行稳定，这样就可以自动防御一定程度的进攻了。
radioText.en: The system is running smoothly. Its automatic defenses will help fight back small-scale attacks.

radioText.cn: 保险起见，我们可以确认一下。
radioText.en: We can verify the system just to be on the safe side.

radioText.cn: 说起来，我刚才看见丹尼尔了，他好像还是心事重重的。
radioText.en: You know, I just saw Daniel and he's got this serious look on his face.

radioText.cn: 他的眉毛都要拧一块去了，我们去找他聊聊吧？
radioText.en: That frown looks like an LB just stole his bed. Maybe we should talk to him.

radioText.cn: 工程中心发来消息，总控中枢现在已经做好升级的准备了，你可以用扩容演算芯片来给它升级。去那边看看吧。
radioText.en: The Engineering Division just messaged me. The Control Nexus is now ready for an upgrade. Let's head over to the nexus and use the Algorithm Expansion Chip for the level up, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 升级总控中枢可以给帝江号的内部空间扩容，之后就可以建造各种培养舱了。
radioText.en: Upgrading the Control Nexus will open up more space aboard Dijiang. That'll let us build all sorts of Growth Chambers.

radioText.cn: 你可以在培养舱中培养菌类质料、晶植质料、矿物质料这些珍贵材料。它们可以用来提升干员的能力，或是重锻武器装备。
radioText.en: The Growth Chamber can be used to cultivate all sorts of rare materials such as fungal matter, vitrified plants, and rare minerals. These materials are required for operator skill upgrades or gear recasting.

radioText.cn: 在野外采集获得材料后，就可以到培养舱提取基核来培养各种材料了。
radioText.en: Gather the materials from the wilderness and place them in the Growth Chambers to extract the "seed". The "seed" can then be cultivated in the Growth Chambers.

radioText.cn: 管理员，以后也要记得常来看看培养情况哦。
radioText.en: And once you start cultivating, don't forget to check back every now and then. Gardening is very therapeutic in space, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这里的受灾情况很严重……
radioText.en: This place has been severely affected by the disaster...

radioText.cn: 凭借现有条件很难进行重建工作，所以我觉得可能需要前辈亲自来看看。
radioText.en: Post-disaster rebuilding will be difficult given our current resources. This is why I think you should come here and take a look, Professor.

radioText.cn: 这里的人们和我，都很需要前辈……
