radioText.en: People here, and me... We all need you, Professor...

radioText.cn: 克劳这次怎么说得不清不楚的，重建指挥部到底发生了什么？
radioText.en: Now Crowe is being cryptic. Why didn't he just tell us what exactly happened at the Reconstruction Headquarters?

radioText.cn: 不清楚，克劳先生是个做事认真果决的人，平时都会把事情说明白，但这次……
radioText.en: I don't know. Mr. Crowe is a committed and decisive leader who usually clarifies things. But this time...

radioText.cn: 管理员，以防万一，我们去一趟吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, we should head over, just in case.

radioText.cn: 看来地质探针的建造工作快要完成了。
radioText.en: The construction of the geological probe seems almost complete.

radioText.cn: 这事关乎着四号谷地的未来，管理员，我们去看看吧。
radioText.en: This project might shape the future of Valley IV. Let's go and take a look, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这里怎么这么混乱，克劳不是说地质探针就要完成了吗？
radioText.en: This place is a mess! I thought Crowe said they're almost done with the geological probe!

radioText.cn: 这里的人好像遇到了一些问题……也没有看到邓恩和克莱维尔，他们没有在主持工作吗？
radioText.en: The local crew seems to have run into some trouble... But I don't see Dean or Clavell around. Aren't they supposed to be leading the work?

radioText.cn: 我们去找克劳先生问问看情况吧。
radioText.en: Let's talk to Mr. Crowe and learn more about the situation.

radioText.cn: 又来了，我们上。
radioText.en: Another one! Time to fight!

radioText.cn: 看来工团已经从灾难中缓过来了，救援工作也在逐步展开。
radioText.en: The UWST seems to be recovering from the disaster. Search and rescue operations are now being carried out.

radioText.cn: 管理员，有空的时候去基建前站那边看看吧，或许我们能帮上些忙。
radioText.en: Endmin, we should visit the Infra-Station if we have time. Perhaps we can offer them our assistance.

actorName.cn: 疑惑的工人{f1m9-疑惑的工人}

radioText.cn: 诺夫曼没有救援经验，他带队能行吗？
radioText.en: Noffman's got no SAR experience. Not sure if he's fit to lead the team.

actorName.cn: 年长的工人{f1m9-年长的工人}

radioText.cn: 嘘！别说了，这次好像出事了。
radioText.en: Shh! Quiet. Something bad probably happened this time.

radioText.cn: 怎么回事？这边怎么聚了这么多人……
radioText.en: What's happening? Why is everyone gathered here...?

radioText.cn: 应该是各地撤来的避难者。看样子，安置工作还没真正开始，大家只能先在这儿等着了。
radioText.en: They seem like refugees from various areas. Perhaps they haven't been assigned to their refuge points. That's why everyone is waiting here.

radioText.cn: 这就是诺夫曼说的地方……到处都是侵蚀。
radioText.en: This is the place that Noffman mentioned... There's Blight everywhere.

radioText.cn: 管理员，可以试着扫描看看，说不定能发现线索。
radioText.en: Endmin, try scanning this place. We might be able to find some clues.

radioText.cn: 这个空药箱……像是不久前被仓促遗落的。
radioText.en: This empty med kit ... seems to have been dropped pretty recently, and in a rush.

radioText.cn: 再试试，看看沿着这个方向能发现什么？
radioText.en: Try scanning again. Let's see if we can find anything along this direction.

radioText.cn: 断掉的绳索？看来有人从这里翻下去过。
radioText.en: Broken rope? Maybe someone tried getting down from here.

radioText.cn: 下去看看。
radioText.en: We should check it out.

radioText.cn: 他们三个情况不妙，在这种情况下掉队，很难生存……
radioText.en: Things aren't looking good. Falling behind in a situation like this makes survival a real struggle...

radioText.cn: 哎！线索怎么在这里断掉了……
radioText.en: What?! The clues ended here...! How?

radioText.cn: 先回去找诺夫曼吧。
radioText.en: Let's head back first and talk to Noffman.

radioText.cn: 我们尽快去找诺夫曼吧。
radioText.en: Let's go and look for Noffman.

radioText.cn: 看！
radioText.en: Look!

radioText.cn: 诺夫曼他们好像在那边！
radioText.en: Noffman and his crew are over there!

actorName.cn: 年长的工人{f1m9-年长的工人}

radioText.cn: 哎哟，连着两波裂地者，可真是把我这身老骨头折腾得够呛。
radioText.en: Hnggh. Two friggin' waves of breaker scum. These raiders are going to break every bone in my body.

actorName.cn: 热心的工人{f1m9-热心的工人}

radioText.cn: 您先忍着点，我帮您处理下伤口。
radioText.en: Please hang in there. I'll patch you up as gently as I can.

actorName.cn: 年长的工人{f1m9-年长的工人}

radioText.cn: 没事，我这就是点小伤，你先去看别人吧！
radioText.en: Forget it. It's just a scratch. Go take care of someone else!

radioText.cn: 考虑到裂谷的宽度，这个位置应该不错。
radioText.en: Given the width of the chasm, this location seems pretty good.

radioText.cn: 距离刚刚好，这下伤员们有救了！
radioText.en: The distance looks just right! We can definitely zipline our injured people to safety!

radioText.cn: 事不宜迟，我们赶快去接他们吧！
radioText.en: Chop, chop, people! Let's go get the crew!

radioText.cn: 怎么会乱成这样……不是说没出大岔子吗？
radioText.en: Such a big mess... I thought they said they were doing well?

radioText.cn: 先了解下基建前站现在的状况吧。
radioText.en: Let's find out what's happening in the Infra-Station.

radioText.cn: 唉，诺夫曼这家伙……偏偏这时候找不见人了……
radioText.en: *Sigh* Noffman... Why would he go missing at a time like this...?

radioText.cn: 看来救援失败对诺夫曼打击很大。
radioText.en: The failed SAR operation seems to have affected Noffman a lot.

radioText.cn: 这些笔记……诺夫曼想在瞭望塔上加装的是这个？
radioText.en: Judging from these notes ... this seems to be the contraption that Noffman wants to install on the watch tower.

radioText.cn: 我们去找潘叔问问吧。
radioText.en: Let's go and ask Uncle Pan.

radioText.cn: 怎么会这样？！所有参数都对的啊！
radioText.en: How?! This shouldn't be happening! All the parameters are on target!

radioText.cn: 该死的……怎么会这样？！怎么会这样……全、全完了！
radioText.en: Dammit... How did this happen?! How? WHY...? Blasted blightery, I'm done for!

radioText.cn: 注意力道啊，把温度控制在合理范围内。
radioText.en: Don't overdo it! Keep the temperature within the working range.

radioText.cn: 这活儿还是需要点技巧的。
radioText.en: The work is quite technical, eh?

radioText.cn: 进入关键环节了，需要更精确的温度控制……
radioText.en: This step is crucial. We'll need more precise temperature controls...

radioText.cn: 工团什么都好，就是设备的人机交互太粗笨。多少年了，还是这样！
radioText.en: UW machines are great, but they really need easier and lighter controls! Nothing's changed over the years!

radioText.cn: 大潘先生，你的伤……
radioText.en: Mr. Da Pan, your wounds...

radioText.cn: 皮肉伤，不打紧。你专心操控机器。
radioText.en: No need to worry about this scratch. Focus on controlling the machine.

radioText.cn: 三人仍有较大<@qu.key>生还可能</>……而且就在裂地者活跃区域。
radioText.en: It's quite possible they're <@qu.key>still alive</> ... somewhere around where the Landbreakers are still active.

radioText.cn: 哎……难道说最危险的地方，真的是最安全的地方？
radioText.en: Wait... Is the most dangerous place ... actually the safest place?

radioText.cn: 最好尽快将这个消息告知诺夫曼。
radioText.en: We should quickly inform Noffman of our finding.

radioText.cn: 第一台<@qu.key>放大器</>，启动。信号接收器功率——接近超载极限百分之七十五。
radioText.en: <@qu.key>Amplifier unit</> one activated. Signal receiver power is ... approaching seventy-five percent of threshold.

actorName.cn: 热心的工人{f1m9-热心的工人}

radioText.cn: 收到，我们这里也全部就绪了！
radioText.en: Roger that. We're all set and ready!

radioText.cn: 第二台<@qu.key>放大器</>，启动。信号接收器功率——接近超载极限百分之八十。
radioText.en: <@qu.key>Amplifier unit</> two activated. Signal receiver power is ... approaching eighty percent of threshold.

actorName.cn: 年长的工人{f1m9-年长的工人}

radioText.cn: 这边的准备工作也完成了！随时可以启动！
radioText.en: Prep work is done here! We're ready to go anytime!

radioText.cn: 第三台<@qu.key>放大器</>，启动。百分之八十二……加油啊。
radioText.en: <@qu.key>Amplifier unit</> three activated. Eighty-two percent... Come on.

radioText.cn: 了解，第四台放大器也没问题了。
radioText.en: Roger. Amplifier unit four is good to go.

radioText.cn: 全部<@qu.key>放大器</>上线，大家好样的！
radioText.en: All <@qu.key>amplifiers</> are online. Good job, people!

radioText.cn: 管理员，可以启动搜索了！我们这就把他们的所在地定位出来。
radioText.en: Endmin, we can now initiate the search! Let's mark out their location.

radioText.cn: 罗马诺……怎么办……我的罗马诺……
radioText.en: Romano... Oh, what should I do... Where are you, my Romano...

radioText.cn: 谁能帮帮我……
radioText.en: Someone help me, please!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我扫描过了，这里确实有人生活的痕迹。
radioText.en: Endmin, I've completed the scan. There are clear traces of human activity here.

radioText.cn: 你这家伙！修好了没？这堆破烂*咕哝*，没一个能用！
radioText.en: Buggahsnot! Fixed it yet? None of this trash *mumbles* is usable!

radioText.cn: 你有本事！*咕哝*上面老是有动静！怎么不去看看？
radioText.en: Oh, guess who's the smart ass now! *Mumble*. Anyways, I keep hearing things up there. Why dontcha take a quick look-see?

radioText.cn: 我会找到的……别以为这样就能逃脱了。
radioText.en: Oh yes, I'll find you... There's no escaping from me.

radioText.cn: 唔，这个弹射装置好像要通了电才能用。
radioText.en: Hmm. Looks like this bounce device won't work without power.

radioText.cn: 管理员，有人逃到上面去了！
radioText.en: Endmin, someone has fled up there!

radioText.cn: 管理员，你那边传来了工团的求助信号，附近或许有人需要帮助。
radioText.en: Endmin, your device is picking up a UWST SOS signal. Perhaps someone nearby is in need of help.

radioText.cn: 怎么全都跑出去了……安东尼这人以前不是挺靠谱的吗？
radioText.en: My slugs! They're gone...! Why, Anthony?! I thought you were the dependable type!

radioText.cn: 管理员，快去源石附近捉住它！
radioText.en: Endmin! Go near the Originium formation and catch it!

radioText.cn: 它好像总是在源石附近停留！依据这个习性可以预判它的位置。
radioText.en: I think this one prefers loitering around Originium formations! We can use this to predict its location.

radioText.cn: 什么？你闻到了一股奇怪的味道？唔，或许是源石虫身上的吧。
radioText.en: Hmm? Did you smell something? I think it's the slug giving off a strange smell.
Hrnngngh...

radioText.cn: 到底哪儿去了？裂地者来的时候，我明明带上了！
radioText.en: Where did it go? I brought it with me when the LBs arrived!

radioText.cn: 别急，我陪你一起找，一定会找到的。
radioText.en: Calm down. I'll help you look for it. We'll definitely find it.

radioText.cn: 总算找到它了！
radioText.en: Finally! Found it!

radioText.cn: 这个也找到了！太好了，管理员！
radioText.en: We found this one too! Excellent job, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 终于找到了！这应该就是林奈说的那种真菌吧。
radioText.en: You finally found it! This must be the special fungus that Linnaeus mentioned.

radioText.cn: 怪物！呜啊！有怪物！
radioText.en: BUGGAH! AAAARGGGH! BLASTED BUGGAHLOIDS!

radioText.cn: 身上好烫……*咕哝*起火了！
radioText.en: I'm so hot... *mumble* ... I THINK I'M BURNING!

radioText.cn: 奇怪……这些裂地者是怎么了？
radioText.en: Okay, this is pretty weird... What's happening to these LBs?

radioText.cn: 找到了吗，管理员？对，应该就是这个！
radioText.en: Found it, Endmin? Oh! Yeah! This must be it!

radioText.cn: 这里有管道……管理员，注意观察！它不会走太远的。
radioText.en: There's a pipe here... Keep your eyes open, Endmin! It shouldn't be far.

radioText.cn: 居然还会钻管道……这长耳兽也太狡猾了。
radioText.en: It's scurrying through the pipes to escape... This long-ear is just too cunning!

radioText.cn: 管理员，它应该就在附近了。
radioText.en: It should be close, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 找的怎么又是荞花？这下麻烦了……
radioText.en: Why did it look for buckflowers again? Oh dear, this isn't working...

radioText.cn: 等等，管理员，长耳兽似乎在找别的东西！
radioText.en: Wait, Endmin! The long-ear is looking for something else!

radioText.cn: 好吃，好吃！
radioText.en: ONOMNOMNOMNOM!

radioText.cn: 这家伙*咕哝*吃着吃着睡着了？
radioText.en: This dude *mumble* dozed off halfway through the chow.

radioText.cn: 别担心，哪怕找不到，器材还在，资料还在，你没问题的。
radioText.en: It's alright. It may be gone, but you still have your tools and data, Linn. You can do it.

radioText.cn: 谢谢你……
radioText.en: Thank you...

radioText.cn: 管理员，看来这个终端是琼的。
radioText.en: This seems like Joan's handyterm.

radioText.cn: 莫非她已经来过这儿了？那为什么刚刚都没说呢……
radioText.en: Seems like she already visited this place. Why didn't she mention it...?

radioText.cn: 琼真的太好了……没有她，我该怎么办啊。
radioText.en: Joan is such a nice person... I wouldn't know what to do without her.

radioText.cn: 我以前就想过，如果有个这样一起做研究的朋友，该多好……
radioText.en: Sometimes I'd think how nice it would be to have a research partner like her...

radioText.cn: 可惜……我和她大概还算不上朋友，她平时很忙的。
radioText.en: But ... we're not really friends. She's always really busy.

radioText.cn: 我们不在同一个部门，之前也没怎么聊过天。
radioText.en: We work at different departments and hardly talked to each other before all this.

radioText.cn: 她帮我的时候都挺热情的……
radioText.en: But Joan can be very friendly when she's helping me out...

radioText.cn: 而且……最近她经常来找我。
radioText.en: And she recently made ... quite a few visits to my lab.

radioText.cn: 最开始是某次会议之后，她主动找我搭话，向我祝贺，还说要多向我请教呢！
radioText.en: She actually started a conversation with me during an academic conference. She congratulated me for getting my grant and looked forward to getting more of my advice!

radioText.cn: 说实话……我觉得她蛮可爱的。
radioText.en: Truth be told... I think Joan's a really lovely girl.

radioText.cn: 唔，这纸条上写的“很香”的“好东西”……该不会是……
radioText.en: Hmm. The note wrote about "gewwwd stoff" that "smells delish"... Can it be...?

radioText.cn: 有种不妙的预感……管理员，去上面提到的“路断掉了”的地方看看吧。
radioText.en: I don't have a good feeling about this... Endmin, let's head to the place "where the road is out".

radioText.cn: 欸？怎么是荞花？这回难道要失败了？
radioText.en: Wha? Buckflowers? Are we failing this trial?

radioText.cn: 唉，这些裂地者肯定是把这药剂当调料用了……
radioText.en: Ugh. These breakers probably used the medicine as a condiment...

radioText.cn: 管理员，我这里收到了一连串的求助信号，似乎来自你附近的机器人……
radioText.en: Endmin, I'm receiving a constant stream of SOS signals. They seem to be coming from a robot near you...

radioText.cn: 它们……或许是想让你进去？
radioText.en: Maybe they want you to ... enter the place?

radioText.cn: 该死，这个门到底是怎么回事？！外面有人吗？
radioText.en: Dammit. Did something blight up the door?! Hey! ANYONE OUTSIDE?!

radioText.cn: 欸？这里面好像有人？管理员，先去看看吧。
radioText.en: Oh? I think someone's inside. Let's go in and take a look, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 它的意思好像是……上面还有需要维修的机器人？
radioText.en: Is it telling us that there are ... more robots up there that need fixing?

radioText.cn: 咦？这些是……终末地的机器人？怎么会坏了这么多？
radioText.en: Huh? Are these ... broken Endfield robots? And there are so many of them!

radioText.cn: 这些机器人……好像与你在枢纽区基地附近修理的是同一型号。
radioText.en: These robots seem like the ... same models you've repaired near the Hub Base.

radioText.cn: 库珀说过，如果再遇到，希望我们帮他修一下。
radioText.en: Copper told me to repair any units that I come across.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你看看还能不能修好？
radioText.en: Endmin, see if this one can be fixed.

radioText.cn: 这些机器人似乎都损坏得很严重……
radioText.en: These robots seem to have taken serious damage...

radioText.cn: 它们所属的型号都有些年头了……修理起来恐怕会有些麻烦。
radioText.en: These seem like pretty old models... Fixing these robots won't be easy.

radioText.cn: 呼，辛苦了，管理员！
radioText.en: Phewie! Good job, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 我都有点好奇了……这些机器人究竟是经历了什么才变成这样的？
radioText.en: This got me curious... What happened to these robots? How did they end up like this?

radioText.cn: 嗯，管理员，这些小机器人也很不容易呢。
radioText.en: Well, I guess things can get pretty rough for these little robots, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这一带好像刚刚被人清理过。
radioText.en: Endmin, I think a crew has cleaned up this area.

radioText.cn: 看样子工作人员开始陆续回来了。管理员，要不要去打个招呼，问问他们是否需要帮助？
radioText.en: Seems like the workers are gradually returning to work, Endmin. Maybe we should talk to them and ask if they need help.

radioText.cn: 幸好有提前预警，看来大家都去避难了，躲过一劫。
radioText.en: Good thing we had that early warning. Looks like everyone really did evac and dodged the worst of it...

radioText.cn: 咱们去看看总控开关的情况。
radioText.en: Let's go and check the main switch box.

radioText.cn: 就是这里了……
radioText.en: This is it...

radioText.cn: 太好了！成功了！
radioText.en: Wonderful! Success!

radioText.cn: 管理员，你是打算操作这个大家伙吗？
radioText.en: Endmin, are you trying to get this huge machinery to work?

radioText.cn: 唔，虽然我不太熟悉工团的设备，但从结构上看，应该需要把转盘转到合适的位置。
radioText.en: Hmm. I'm not great with UWST machines, but judging from its structure ... I think we need to rotate parts of the thing to the right positions.

radioText.cn: 这些机器人也太不容易了……
radioText.en: These robots really had it tough...

radioText.cn: 记下来，又搞定了一个。
radioText.en: Another unit fixed. I gotta note it down.

radioText.cn: 机器人的这个地方很容易坏，要记录一下。
radioText.en: This robotic part has a tendency to break down. I'll make a note of that.

radioText.cn: 好了！还挺难搞的……
radioText.en: Done! Finally! That was one tough repair job...

radioText.cn: 喂——喂——听得到吗？测试一下——咳咳，有人吗？
radioText.en: Hello — Anyone copy? Hello —? Testing, one, two, three — Ahem. Anyone copy?

radioText.cn: 管理员，与基特的通信已经连上了。
radioText.en: Endmin, we established a comm link with Kitt.

radioText.cn: 太好了，联系上了！管理员，离我们最近的那个便携终端，我把它的位置发给你了。就麻烦你过去看看了。
radioText.en: Oh nice! Comms are green! Endmin, I've sent you the location of the first handyterm. Head over there and take a look.

radioText.cn: 里面可能会有防御激光……那是伊冯用来防范裂地者的。但激光不分敌我，你要小心！
radioText.en: Watch out for the defensive lasers... Yvonne placed them to keep out the LBs, but they're just as dangerous to us. Be careful!

radioText.cn: 小心些，这些防御激光很危险，挨一下可了不得。
radioText.en: Watch out! Those defensive lasers are dangerous. Probably hurts like hell if they hit you.

radioText.cn: 这里大门紧闭，我们该怎么进去？
radioText.en: The gate is sealed shut. How are we supposed to get in?

radioText.cn: 先找到第一个便携终端。可以通过终端获得开门的权限，终端内还有需要管理员帮忙带回的研究资料。
radioText.en: We gotta find the first handyterm. It contains research data that must be retrieved. Try to get authorization to open the gates from the terminal.

radioText.cn: 这个便携终端竟然坏了，难道是被侵蚀影响了？
radioText.en: This handyterm is down. Did the Blight do this?

radioText.cn: 管理员，这应该就是基特要的资料？总算找到第一份了！
radioText.en: Endmin, this looks like the data that Kitt wants. We finally found the first data file!

radioText.cn: 辛苦了！获得权限后，大门应该就自动打开了。
radioText.en: Nicely done! Now that you're authorized, the gate should open automatically.

radioText.cn: 第二份资料在源石培育区，管理员，你在那边也多加小心！
radioText.en: The second data file should be in the Originium Cultivation Area. Watch yourself in that place, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 看到源石了吗，管理员？
radioText.en: See those Originium formations, Endmin?

radioText.cn: 那就是我平时工作的区域了，那些源石都是大家辛苦培育出来的……但避难的时候也没办法带走。
radioText.en: The Cultivation Area is where I usually work. We worked really hard to grow these crystals... Unfortunately, we couldn't take them with us during the evac.

radioText.cn: 万一那些源石被毁了，我的论文……哦不，成果也泡汤了。
radioText.en: If those Originium formations get destroyed, my paper... By Talos, all we have accomplished will be lost.

radioText.cn: 这走廊太乱了，管理员你小心点。
radioText.en: The corridors are such a mess. Stay frosty, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 不好意思……我们太忙了，平时都不怎么收拾。
radioText.en: Ah, sorry about that... Things can get pretty busy and we barely cleaned up our place.

radioText.cn: 资料上标记着“已废弃”……
radioText.en: The files have been labeled as "REJECTED"...

radioText.cn: 啊，那些应该是还没来得及销毁的废弃文件。是该好好收拾下了。
radioText.en: Ah, probably files and documents we haven't degaussed or shredded yet. Yeah, I guess we'll clean the place properly once this is all over.

radioText.cn: 这边怎么堆了这么多东西……
radioText.en: Why is there so much stuff here...?

radioText.cn: 啊，那都是一些废弃资料，没什么价值……
radioText.en: Ah. Yeah ... they're uh ... obsolete data. I don't think they're worth anything now...

radioText.cn: 据说最后没有成功的项目的资料，都会被堆放在那里。
radioText.en: They say the files of every failed project ends up here. Stacked into a pile.

radioText.cn: 里面会有一些物资。如果对你有用就拿去，不必客气！
radioText.en: You might also find some useful supplies. Help yourselves to them. Courtesy of the UWST!

radioText.cn: 在源石培育区有一台便携终端，麻烦你找找看，就在一个办公桌上。
radioText.en: There's a handyterm in the Originium Cultivation Area. Please look for it. It should be on an office desk.

radioText.cn: 终于又找到了一份研究资料！辛苦你了，管理员！
radioText.en: Another research data file! Awesome work, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 现在就差最后一份了……它在这片区域的最深处，位置有些隐蔽。但我相信你肯定能找到的！
radioText.en: Just one more to go... It's in the deepest section of this area. Might be a little hidden away, but I'm sure you'll find it!

radioText.cn: 管……理员，信……号……不……太好。
radioText.en: Endmin ... nal ... jammed ... probably ... clear...

radioText.cn: 管理员，终于又联络上了！资料的情况如何？
radioText.en: Endmin! Thank goodness, I can get in touch with you again! How's the data files?

radioText.cn: 草根……我的草根呢？
radioText.en: My roots... Where are my roots?

radioText.cn: 土块也行……
radioText.en: Some mud would be nice too...

radioText.cn: 一盘录音带？是这个人留下的吗？
radioText.en: A stash of recording tapes...? Did he make these recordings?

radioText.cn: 这个人被困在这里太久了，应该是饿到神志不清了。
radioText.en: He's been trapped here for too long. The hunger probably drove him a little crazy.

radioText.cn: 给他一些<@qu.key>柑实罐头</>吧！
radioText.en: Let's give him some <@qu.key>canned citromes</> to eat!

radioText.cn: 不能这样，绝对不能这样……我要想想办法……录音，对了，我在录音！
radioText.en: No... This can't be happening... Not to me...! Think! I gotta ... think of something... Recording... YES! I'm RECORDING!

radioText.cn: 听着，不知道多少天之后的我，我也不知道这录音能不能把你从那种混乱的状态里拉出来……但是你得坚持住。
radioText.en: LISTEN! I am you! Hopefully you escaped the Blight! I made this RECORDING several days before your escape. You gotta PULL your mind out of this... Just STAY with me!

radioText.cn: 听着，侵蚀很危险，已经严重威胁到了你的精神，但是……你得坚持住！
radioText.en: KEEP LISTENING! The BLIGHT is dangerous and it's EATING YOUR MIND... OUR MIND! You gotta STAY WITH ME!

radioText.cn: 你的家人还在等你，知道吗，家人还在等你！活着！活下来！
radioText.en: Your FAMILY is waiting for you! We got family... WAITING for us! LIVE! SURVIVE!

radioText.cn: 能吃的东西不多了，不太妙，再这样下去的话，我想我就必须刨一刨土，看看有没有更多草根之类的东西了。
radioText.en: I'm running out of grub... This is bad... I should start digging the mud ... find some roots or tubers or something...

radioText.cn: 草根……软土……也不是不能吃，但它们不同意啊。
radioText.en: Roots ... mud... I wonder if they agree to let me eat them...

radioText.cn: 昨天我和草根聊天，它说我挖土会让它受伤，所以它不同意。
radioText.en: I talked with a bunch of roots yesterday. My digging is hurting him and he really doesn't like that.

radioText.cn: 噢……呵呵……它不同意……等等……我在说些什么……我这是怎么了……
radioText.en: Oh... Hoho... So the roots don't agree, oh ho...! Wait... What am I saying... What's happening to me...?

radioText.cn: 这不是工团救援队的队员们吗？他们在这里做什么？
radioText.en: Isn't this the UWST Search and Rescue Crew? What are they doing here?

radioText.cn: 管理员，你跑出场地范围了！看来只能下次再跟他们比试了。
radioText.en: Endmin! You're out of bounds! I guess we'll have to restart the race.

radioText.cn: 管理员，疏散演练结束了！找机会再跟他们比一次吧。
radioText.en: The evacuation drill has ended, Endmin! If you want, we can go for another round.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你要离开了吗？没事，可以下次再来找他们比试！
radioText.en: Leaving already, Endmin? It's fine, I guess. You can always challenge them again.

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心！看来这次演练泡汤了……
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin...! Ooops. I guess the drill is over...

radioText.cn: 啊！是工团救援队的西夫卡！不知道附近的救援情况还顺利吗？
radioText.en: Oh! It's Sivka of the UWST SAR crew! I wonder if their local SAR operations are doing okay.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你跑出场地的范围了！看来只能下次再跟他们比试了。
radioText.en: You're out of bounds, Endmin! I guess we'll have to restart the race.

radioText.cn: 管理员，防灾演练结束了！找机会再跟他们比一次吧。
radioText.en: The disaster drill has ended, Endmin! If you want, we can go for another round.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你要离开了吗？没事，可以下次再来找他们比试！
radioText.en: Leaving already, Endmin? It's fine, I guess. You can always challenge them again.

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心！看来这次演练泡汤了……
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin...! Ooops. I guess the drill is over...

radioText.cn: 这不是工团救援队的西夫卡吗？他们在这里有任务？
radioText.en: Isn't this Sivka of the UWST SAR Crew? Did they get a mission here?

radioText.cn: 管理员，你跑出场地范围了！看来只能下次再跟他们比试了。
radioText.en: Endmin! You're out of bounds! I guess we'll have to restart the race.

radioText.cn: 管理员，他们都训练结束了！找机会再跟他们比一次吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, they ended the training! We can talk to them for another round if you want.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你要离开了吗？没事，可以下次再来找他们比试！
radioText.en: Leaving already, Endmin? It's fine, I guess. You can always challenge them again.

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心！看来比赛泡汤了……
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin...! Ooops. I guess the race is ... over...

radioText.cn: 这些人好像是工团救援队的？他们这是在做什么？
radioText.en: Isn't that the UWST SAR Crew? What are they doing here?

radioText.cn: 管理员，你跑出比赛场地范围了！看来只能下次再跟他们比试了。
radioText.en: Endmin! You're out of bounds! I guess we'll have to start another race with them.

radioText.cn: 管理员，比赛都结束了！找机会再跟他们比一次吧。
radioText.en: The race has ended, Endmin! If you want, we can go for another round.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你要离开了吗？没事，可以下次再来找他们比试！
radioText.en: Leaving already, Endmin? It's fine, I guess. You can always challenge them again.

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心！看来比赛泡汤了……
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin...! Ooops. I guess the race is ... over...

radioText.cn: 管理员！小心！这个区域的设施在袭击发生后还没有检查过，可能会有故障！
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin! Local facilities have yet to undergo post-disaster diagnostics. Expect a few of them to be malfunctioning!

radioText.cn: 附近好像有工团的人，可以去问问他们，他们对这里比较熟悉。
radioText.en: There should be UWST crew mates nearby who might be familiar with this area. We should talk to them.

radioText.cn: 这里有个终端机，但好像坏掉了。可以试试修一下，说不定能帮上什么。
radioText.en: I see a terminal here, but it looks damaged. We can try repairing it and see if that helps.

radioText.cn: 原来是控制吊运装置的终端，可以用它来移动货物。
radioText.en: Ah. It turns out to be a crane control terminal. We can use it to move some cargo.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这应该就是莱昂说的控制台了。
radioText.en: Endmin, this must be the control panel that Leon mentioned.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你还要再研究一下这个控制台的结构吗？唔，那看来暂时没法儿修复了……
radioText.en: Taking another look at the structure of this control panel, Endmin? Well, I don't think we can fix that right now...

radioText.cn: 已经修好了吗？太棒了！不愧是管理员！
radioText.en: You got it fixed? Incredible! That's why you're the Endmin!

radioText.cn: 管理员，升降平台已经启动了！
radioText.en: Endmin, the platform lift is now active!

radioText.cn: 完蛋了，莱昂会杀了我的……
radioText.en: Ooohh... I've made a blighted mess of things... Leon is gonna kill me...

radioText.cn: 罗克说无人机可能掉落在了高处，我们来找一下吧！注意除了机身外，还有两块电池，可不要落下了。
radioText.en: Rorke said the drone might have crashed at a pretty high place! Look for the drone itself and its two batteries. Gotta find them all.

radioText.cn: 这应该就是罗克说的那个无人机了，确实是工团的老型号……
radioText.en: This must be the drone that Rorke crash landed. And yes, it is an old UWST model...

radioText.cn: 这是无人机的电池！
radioText.en: It's a drone battery!

radioText.cn: 另一块电池！
radioText.en: Another drone battery!

radioText.cn: 现在的无人机大多是电池机身一体化的，已经很少见到这种样式的了。
radioText.en: Detachable battery is old tech. Most modern drones have built-in batteries.

radioText.cn: 这下应该收集齐了，我们去把东西交给罗克吧。
radioText.en: I think we found everything. Let's bring them to Rorke.

radioText.cn: 小心！
radioText.en: Careful!

radioText.cn: 看来附近不太安全……出什么事了？
radioText.en: This place doesn't look very safe... What happened here?

radioText.cn: 管理员，塔吊的控制终端在那个平台上面。
radioText.en: Endmin, the control terminal for the tower crane should be on that platform.

radioText.cn: 管理员，如果你打算去那边，就必须跨过这片侵蚀洪流。
radioText.en: Endmin, you must cross this patch of Blightflood if you want to reach that place.

radioText.cn: 那个位置设有一座伸缩桥，可以尝试重启它。
radioText.en: There's a collapsible bridge over there. We can try to re-activate it.

radioText.cn: 侵蚀无法从这一侧消除，得想想别的办法。
radioText.en: You can't neutralize the Blight from this side. We need to think of another approach.

radioText.cn: 这处侵蚀是个麻烦，得想想别的办法。
radioText.en: This Blight is in our way. We need to think of something.

radioText.cn: 备用元件？管理员，我帮你把这些元件的大致位置标在协议同步器上了。
radioText.en: Backup parts? Endmin, I've scanned the place and marked their potential locations on your Protosync.

radioText.cn: 但具体的位置需要你使用扫描功能定位。
radioText.en: However, you'll need to use your scanner to pinpoint their exact locations.

radioText.cn: 这个伸缩桥是失灵的，得想办法修复一下。
radioText.en: This collapsible bridge looks broken. We should repair it.

radioText.cn: 可以去问问附近工团的人。
radioText.en: We can ask the UWST crew nearby.

radioText.cn: 这个伸缩桥是失灵的，得问问赫尔曼是怎么回事。
radioText.en: This collapsible bridge looks broken. We should ask Hermann about this.

radioText.cn: 这些元件应该够用了，回去找赫尔曼问问吧。
radioText.en: These parts should be sufficient. Let's head back and talk to Hermann.

radioText.cn: 就是这个！
radioText.en: This is it!

radioText.cn: 唉……锚点和侵蚀把这里搞得一团糟，这里将来的重建工作想必困难重重。
radioText.en: Ugh... The Ankhor and the Blight turned the place into a blasted mess. Rebuilding all this will cost us an arm and a leg.

radioText.cn: 这就是那个天使。天啊……它也太大了！
radioText.en: That's the one! Oh man... It's huge!

radioText.cn: 我……判断失误了……
radioText.en: I ... hngh ... I made the wrong call...

radioText.cn: 侵蚀怪物竟然……有两只，它们就像是双胞胎一样……
radioText.en: There are two of them... Never knew Blightmorphs can have twins...

radioText.cn: 我们不可能正面应对……也没有逃出生天的可能……
radioText.en: We won't survive a direct confrontation... There's no escape for us...

radioText.cn: 万幸我被它们拖到了巢穴……
radioText.en: Fortunately, they dragged me into their lair...

radioText.cn: 我的肋骨应该断了三根……左手和右腿也废了……
radioText.en: I broke three ribs ... and I can't use my left hand and right leg anymore...

radioText.cn: 这条录音……也不知道能不能有人听到……就当作是我的遗言吧……
radioText.en: I don't know if anyone will hear this message... If you're listening, treat this as my final words...

radioText.cn: 接下来……我会用申请来的设备……和这两只怪物同归于尽……
radioText.en: I am planning ... to use the device I've applied for... I'm taking down the misbegotten twins...

radioText.cn: 怪物被解决掉的话……记录小组的三个人应该就能逃掉。
radioText.en: Once they're taken out ... the three eggheads should be able to make it.

radioText.cn: 突然失踪应该会吓到他们……但我没机会说对不起了……
radioText.en: My sudden disappearance might have scared them ... and I didn't have the chance to explain and apologize...

radioText.cn: 如果我的遗言能送回我们的基地……有任何朋友能听到的话……
radioText.en: If you're listening to my final words ... I hope you're a friend of the UWST and bring it back to Base...

radioText.cn: 请转告我的父母和队长……
radioText.en: Tell my parents and Captain that...

radioText.cn: 死亡并不能使我恐惧，请他们为我骄傲……
radioText.en: I do not fear death. Be proud of what I did here today...

radioText.cn: 请求援助！如果你收到这段信息……请立刻前来援助！
radioText.en: This is a distress call! I'm in need of immediate assistance! Go to my location at once if you receive this message!

radioText.cn: 是求援信号！这附近有人在求救，我已经定位到了信号源，去看看什么情况！
radioText.en: A distress call! Someone nearby needs help! I've triangulated the signal source! Let's go and take a look!

radioText.cn: 艾米莉，艾米莉！
radioText.en: Emily! EMILY!

radioText.cn: 是我不好，是我不好……
radioText.en: It's my fault! This is all my fault!

radioText.cn: 别……别打了！你们让我干什么都行！
radioText.en: STOP... STOP HITTING ALREADY! I'll do anything you ask!

radioText.cn: 管理员，好像有人被裂地者抓住了！先救人吧！
radioText.en: Endmin, someone's captured by the Landbreakers. Initiate rescue operations!

radioText.cn: 现场只有一个通信设备和一些奇怪的货运箱？
radioText.en: I only see a comm device and strange cargo crates at the site...

radioText.cn: 管理员，还是看看周围有没有其他线索吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, let's look around for other clues.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这应该是求救者的通信设备，不过已经无法使用了。
radioText.en: A comm device that no longer works. It probably belongs to the sender of the distress call, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 唔，附近都是这样的零件和箱子……
radioText.en: Hmm. I'm seeing the same old parts and crates in this place...

radioText.cn: 管理员，根据扫描结果，这些恐怕是机器人的零件。
radioText.en: Endmin, scans revealed that these are parts of some type of robots...

radioText.cn: 看起来，似乎是个……三脚架？
radioText.en: It looks like ... a tripod...

radioText.cn: 以这件设备目前的情况……可能已经无法进行维修了……
radioText.en: From the looks of this machine... I think it's already beyond repairs...

radioText.cn: 鲍勃……鲍勃！
radioText.en: Bob... BOB!

radioText.cn: 唉，不能放着这里不管。
radioText.en: Ugh. I can't just leave this here.

radioText.cn: 杰里米……真不让人省心。
radioText.en: You sure got yourself in a blighted mess, Jeremy.

radioText.cn: 通风井恢复运作了！
radioText.en: The ventilation shaft is back in business!

radioText.cn: 这部分的危机算是解除了。
radioText.en: We finally lifted this crisis.

radioText.cn: 我看见你已经到了通风井门口……什么？门打不开？
radioText.en: I see you've reached the gate to the ventilation shaft... What? The gate won't open?

radioText.cn: 平时都是开着的啊……糟糕！可能是反应炉异常导致那里出现了故障。
radioText.en: That gate should always be open... Curses! The reactor malfunction probably locked it shut.

radioText.cn: 让我想想……啊，有了！通风井最近在进行外墙检修。你沿着外墙找找看，也许能找到其他进入的方法。
radioText.en: Let me think... Ah, got it! A section of the ventilation shaft wall is under repairs. Look for that specific section. You might be able to get in from there.

radioText.cn: 我来看看反应炉怎么样了……
radioText.en: Let me check on the reactor...

radioText.cn: 唉，控制台还是坏的，看来修好它还得费一阵工夫。
radioText.en: Ugh. The control panel is still busted. Repairing it will take a while.

radioText.cn: 好强的破坏力！就是回头修墙的时候麻烦了……
radioText.en: What an incredible explosion! Repairing the wall will be a true hassle...

radioText.cn: 对了，可能是受供能高地那边爆炸的影响，这个工厂的安全模式现在处于开启状态，启动了各种防卫设施。
radioText.en: By the way, you'll be facing various security measures. The Power Plateau explosion probably triggered the Kohl Plant's security mode.

radioText.cn: 如果你遇到了，直接关掉就好。
radioText.en: If you get stopped by something, just try to switch it off.

radioText.cn: 我之前是这里的负责人，但已经被调走了……
radioText.en: I used to be the one in charge of this plant but they assigned me to another site...

radioText.cn: 现在这里由我的学生杰里米负责。只是自从他接手后，我总是有些放心不下。
radioText.en: My apprentice Jeremy is in charge of this plant now. But I can't stop worrying after he took over.

radioText.cn: 有点奇怪，反应炉似乎没在运转……
radioText.en: This isn't normal. The reactor isn't working at all...

radioText.cn: 这些凝胶非常不稳定，只要一处爆炸，就会引起连锁反应。
radioText.en: The gel is extremely unstable. Detonating a small patch might trigger a chain of explosions.

radioText.cn: 虽然用这种“连锁引爆”的方式清理起来很方便，但你一定要格外小心……
radioText.en: Triggering chain reactions may sound like a great clean-up solution, but try not to get too close to the explosions...

radioText.cn: 我看到通风井顶层的警报已经解除了，现在就启动通风模式！
radioText.en: Warnings for the top section of the ventilation shaft have ceased! Time to activate ventilation mode!

radioText.cn: 会有点吵，别被吓着了！
radioText.en: Don't get spooked! Things might get a little noisy!

radioText.cn: 中层也转起来了！
radioText.en: I'm activating the middle section as well!

radioText.cn: 大门打开了！宝藏，我们来了！
radioText.en: The gate's opening! Treasure, here we come!

radioText.cn: 等等我，管理员，我和你一起去。
radioText.en: Endmin, hold on. Count me in too.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这附近应该有机关！
radioText.en: Endmin, there must be a mechanism around here somewhere!

radioText.cn: 管理员，更深处似乎有东西！
radioText.en: Endmin, looks like there's something deeper inside!

radioText.cn: 找到了，激活大门机关的第一个“钥匙”！还差两个！
radioText.en: Found it! The first key to activate the gate mechanism! Just two more to go!

radioText.cn: 这个东西……似乎是某种机关的“钥匙”？
radioText.en: This thing ... looks like some kind of mechanism key?

radioText.cn: 第二个“钥匙”！还差最后一个！我们离宝藏越来越近了！
radioText.en: Second key! Just one more to go! We're getting closer to the treasure!

radioText.cn: 又是一个“钥匙”！它的用处究竟是什么？真是令人好奇。
radioText.en: Another key! What could it possibly unlock? The suspense is killing me!

radioText.cn: 最后一个“钥匙”！我们快回大门前把机关都激活吧！
radioText.en: Final key! Let's get back to the gate and activate all the mechanisms!

radioText.cn: 这是第三个“钥匙”了，我们先去最底层看一眼吧，或许就能知道它们的用处了！
radioText.en: This is the third key! Let's check the bottom level first. Maybe we'll finally figure out what these things actually do!

radioText.cn: 管理员，这个辅桩的启动顺序好像不太对？再观察一下吧。
radioText.en: Endmin, the sequence seems off. Maybe double-check it first.

radioText.cn: 这个辅桩居然在水里，想启动估计要费点工夫……
radioText.en: This auxiliary pillar is in the water? Activating it's probably going to be a real hassle...

radioText.cn: 管理员，辛苦啦！就剩三个辅桩没启动了。
radioText.en: You got this, Endmin! Only three auxiliary pillars left to go.

radioText.cn: 管理员，所有辅桩都成功启动了，赶快回去找林轲吧。
radioText.en: All auxiliary pillars are activated! Go back to Lin Ke now, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 天师桩上会显示“阴”与“阳”两种爻。
radioText.en: The Tianshi Pillar will show two divinograms: Yin and Yang.

radioText.cn: 你需要按照从下往上的顺序开启对应的辅桩，让天师桩上的指示灯亮起。
radioText.en: You'll need to activate the corresponding auxiliary pillars from bottom to top based on the trigrams shown, until the indicator lights up on the Tianshi Pillar.

radioText.cn: 只有当所有指示灯都亮起了，才能启动天师桩。
radioText.en: The Tianshi Pillar won't activate until all the trigram indicators are lit up.

radioText.cn: 对应的指示灯也亮了！管理员，继续去找其他的辅桩吧。
radioText.en: The corresponding indicator lit up! Keep going, Endmin. Time to look for the remaining auxiliary pillars.

actorName.cn: 愁眉苦脸的天师学徒{林轲}

radioText.cn: 要是拿不到这次的数据，今年的课题就……
radioText.en: If we don't get the data this time, this year's research project...

radioText.cn: 管理员，所有指令发送完毕——可以启动天师桩了！
radioText.en: All commands sent. Endministrator, you may activate the Tianshi Pillar now!

radioText.cn: 留神些，管理员！
radioText.en: Stay sharp, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 这次有两个异常桩同时弹出！
radioText.en: Two anomalous rods ejected this time!

radioText.cn: 管理员，成功了！
radioText.en: Endmin, we did it!

radioText.cn: 快过来，咱们一起重启阵列稳定桩。
radioText.en: Over here! Let's reboot these stabilizers together!

radioText.cn: 嘶……说得煞有介事，有点吓人……
radioText.en: Yikes... They sound way too sure about this...

radioText.cn: 这个装置上也没有标识，跟刚才的一样。
radioText.en: This device has no markings either, just like the last one.

radioText.cn: 说起来，好像没有在其他水渠中见到过类似的东西……
radioText.en: You know, I don't think I've seen anything like this in other canals...

radioText.cn: 哇，又是这个装置？那些异动会不会就是它造成的？
radioText.en: Whoa! This device again? Could it be causing those anomalies?

radioText.cn: 我看看……这个装置好像要安装到<@qu.key>水下</>……
radioText.en: Let's see... This device looks like it's meant to be installed <@qu.key>underwater</>...

radioText.cn: 好嘞，这就是启动了吧？咱们再把第二个装置也安上！
radioText.en: Alrighty, that should be done! Let's move onto the second device.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你们弄完了吗？我在<@qu.key>出口</>处等你们！
radioText.en: Are you done, Endmin? I'll be waiting at the <@qu.key>exit</>.

radioText.cn: 看，那儿还有一个装置！
radioText.en: Look, there's another one over there!

radioText.cn: 管理员，咱们把它带回去给<@qu.key>厉衡</>瞧瞧？
radioText.en: Endmin, let's haul this back to that know-it-all <@qu.key>Li Heng</>!

radioText.cn: 大功告成！管理员，今天多谢你们了！
radioText.en: That's a wrap! I couldn't have done this without your help, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 水渠里的脏东西天天闹，咱们怎么用水啊……
radioText.en: How do we use water with that filth causing chaos every day?

radioText.cn: 要不我去贡点儿鳞尾、羽兽肉，求它们别再来了？
radioText.en: Maybe ... some fintail and fowlbeast? To appease them?

radioText.cn: 嗯？那是什么玩意儿？
radioText.en: Huh? What's that?

radioText.cn: 我们把水位再降低一点，到<@qu.key>更深处</>看看吧。
radioText.en: Let's lower the water level further and check the <@qu.key>deeper levels</>.

radioText.cn: 水下好像真有什么东西！咱们把<@qu.key>水位</>降下去，检查一下吧。
radioText.en: Looks like there's actually something down there! Let's lower the <@qu.key>water levels</> and take a look.

radioText.cn: 唔……上面没有任何标识，看不出用途。有点像是勘测用的装置？
radioText.en: Well ... no markings on it. Can't tell what it's for. Almost looks like a survey device?

radioText.cn: 指示灯在闪红光哎，是在发出警报，还是损坏了？
radioText.en: The indicator's flashing red. Is it an alarm, or is it damaged?

radioText.cn: 你终于……又走到了这一步。跟随你的心，你将看见更广阔的景色。
radioText.en: Now ... here you are again. Let your heart lead, and new horizons will unfold.

radioText.cn: 去完成这独属于你的考验。
radioText.en: Go, complete the trial that's yours.

radioText.cn: 曾经的使命在呼唤。面对它，背负它。
radioText.en: The old mission calls anew. Stand tall. Bear on.

radioText.cn: 你已证明，你仍有资格背负未完成的使命。
radioText.en: You've shown you remain fit to carry this incomplete mission.

radioText.cn: 过去的你曾见证，在灭亡的门扉前，生命反抗的决心……
radioText.en: Before the gates of oblivion, you bore witness to life's fight at death's threshold...

radioText.cn: 如今，你再次见证，这些决心汇聚成愿景，汇聚成……名为“存续”的答案。
radioText.en: Now, you watch those fierce hearts gather as one, forging an answer called ... "survival".

radioText.cn: 废墟之上，无数灵魂竭力寻求安宁，而你，无法止步……
radioText.en: Atop these ruins, countless souls seek solace. But you, mustn't stop...

radioText.cn: 道路已在你的脚下延伸，你的探索仍未结束……
radioText.en: A path reaches forth with every step. Your journey shall continue...

radioText.cn: 在对抗灭亡的长路上，你从不是孤身一人。
radioText.en: In the struggle against oblivion, you've never been alone.

radioText.cn: 无论终点有多遥远……你都会坚持下去，直到下一次相遇。
radioText.en: No matter how far the journey's end... You'll keep going, 'til paths cross once more.

radioText.cn: 这个机器人运的东西也太多了……怪不得故障了。
radioText.en: Wow, this robot carried way too much ... no wonder it broke down.

radioText.cn: 不愧是管理员，居然这么快就把它修好了！太厉害了！
radioText.en: You really live up to your reputation, Endmin. You fixed it in no time!

radioText.cn: 真好，这下它应该能继续工作了吧？
radioText.en: Great. Now it can get back to work, right?

radioText.cn: 管理员，你说这个机器人是不是超载了？难怪动不了……
radioText.en: Endmin, you think this robot's overloaded? It's not moving...

radioText.cn: 它看起来好像快撑不住了……管理员，帮帮这个机器人吧。
radioText.en: This one looks like it's about to give out... Endmin, please help this robot!

radioText.cn: 这里居然也有故障的机器人，它们的数量也太多了吧……
radioText.en: Oh my, there are so many more broken robots here...

radioText.cn: 那是安德烈先生提到的运输机器人吧？管理员，不去看看吗？
radioText.en: Are those the logistics robots Mr. Andre mentioned? Endmin, you should go take a look!

radioText.cn: 不知道这个机器人故障前想去哪里……希望接下来它能顺利抵达。
radioText.en: I wonder where this one was trying to go ... hope it can still make it.

radioText.cn: 终于把它修好了！辛苦你啦，管理员！
radioText.en: You fixed it! Amazing job, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 管理员，你看，它是不是在感谢你把它修好呢？
radioText.en: Look, I think it's thanking you!

radioText.cn: 管理员，这就是荆芥想要的药材吧？
radioText.en: Endmin, these are the herbs that Jing Jie is looking for, right?

radioText.cn: 这个数量……肯定够荆芥用了。
radioText.en: This amount ... should be enough for Jing Jie.

radioText.cn: 没错，就是这种药材。
radioText.en: Alright. This looks like the right herb.

radioText.cn: 这些药材长势不错，管理员，多采点吧。
radioText.en: These herbs look good. We can collect a little more, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这下总算采够数量了吧？管理员，辛苦你啦！
radioText.en: I think we've gathered enough. Good job, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 这好像就是沐奚他们用来收集数据的天桩……
radioText.en: This looks like the sky pole drone used by Mu Xi's team for data gathering...

radioText.cn: 管理员，那边的天桩是不是沐奚在找的？
radioText.en: Endmin, there's a sky pole over there. It might be the thing that Mu Xi is looking for.

radioText.cn: 没想到这个天桩居然停在了这里……
radioText.en: I totally didn't expect the sky pole to hover at this place...

radioText.cn: 把天桩设在这里的人真的很有想法……
radioText.en: The one who deployed the sky pole to this position got some weird ideas...

radioText.cn: 管理员，看，那里也有一台用来收集数据的天桩！
radioText.en: Endmin, look over there! It's a data gathering sky pole!

radioText.cn: 根据扫描的结果，这附近应该有一台天桩才对……
radioText.en: According to the scanning results, there should be a sky pole nearby...

radioText.cn: 这就是卢南说的运输样本的机器人吧？管理员，去看看吗？
radioText.en: Is this a sample-transporting robot that Lu Nan mentioned? Let's take a look, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这个也是运输样本的机器人吧？怎么坏成这样了……
radioText.en: This looks like a sample-transporting robot. How did it get so damaged...?

radioText.cn: 没想到这里也有运输环境监测样本的机器人……
radioText.en: I didn't expect to find a sample-transporting robot here...

radioText.cn: 这个机器人居然会藏在这里……难道被天使追赶过？
radioText.en: How did the robot end up here...? Did the Aggelos chase it?

radioText.cn: 这个机器人看起来情况不太好……可能需要尽快修理。
radioText.en: This robot isn't looking very well... We should repair it ASAP.

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心！附近有一处快要失控的能量淤积点。
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin! There's an Energy Alluvium spilling out of control nearby.

radioText.cn: 管理员，是米格尔医生需要的药材。
radioText.en: Endmin, these are the herbs Surgeon Miguel requested.

radioText.cn: 这个数量……应该够米格尔医生用了吧？
radioText.en: This amount ... should be enough for Surgeon Miguel, right?

radioText.cn: 米格尔医生想要的药材就是这种吧？
radioText.en: Are these the herbs Surgeon Miguel requested?

radioText.cn: 这些药材长势不错，管理员，可以多采一点。
radioText.en: These herbs look good. Maybe collect a little extra, just in case.

radioText.cn: 这下就算采集完成了吧？辛苦了，管理员！
radioText.en: That should do it! Good job, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 根据协议同步器的标记，机器人应该就在这附近！
radioText.en: The Protosync indicates that there might be robots nearby.

radioText.cn: 管理员，尝试扫描看看？或许会有线索！
radioText.en: Endmin, try scanning the area to see if anything turns up!

radioText.cn: 信标已正常启动！咦？原来要回收的型号这么老旧……
radioText.en: The beacon's up and running! Huh, I didn't realize the model we're salvaging was this old...

radioText.cn: 成功放置定位信标！大功告成！
radioText.en: Positioning beacon placement complete!

radioText.cn: 这位置也太偏僻了……希望定位信标的信号不会被影响。
radioText.en: I must say, this is such a remote area... I hope the signal won't be affected.

radioText.cn: 这就是安德烈先生说的那种机器人吧？
radioText.en: Are these the robots Mr. Andre mentioned?

radioText.cn: 原来这里也有机器人？真是意想不到……
radioText.en: I didn't expect to find robots here as well...

radioText.cn: 这个机器人藏得好隐蔽……差点就漏掉了。
radioText.en: This one's hidden quite well... We almost missed it.

radioText.cn: 那边坏掉的机器人……好像是我们在找的那种？
radioText.en: That broken one over there ... think it's the kind we're after?

radioText.cn: 那个机器人似乎就是我们正在找的……
radioText.en: I think that might be the robot we're after...

radioText.cn: 管理员，这样一来定位信标就放好啦！
radioText.en: Endmin, the beacon's set!

radioText.cn: 信标放置完毕！希望安德烈先生能顺利收到信号。
radioText.en: Positioning beacon placed! Let's hope Mr. Andre can receive the signal.

radioText.cn: 什么声音？
radioText.en: What's that sound?

radioText.cn: 天上有什么……
radioText.en: There's something in the skies...

radioText.cn: 锚点！是锚点！快通知基地！
radioText.en: Ankhors! It's the Ankhors! Call the base! Hurry!

radioText.cn: 大家跟我来！从这边！快！
radioText.en: Everyone! To me! Over here! MOVE!

radioText.cn: 啊！
radioText.en: AAARGGH!

radioText.cn: 秦主管，伤员们的情况很不乐观。
radioText.en: Director Qin, the state of our injured personnel is not looking very good.

radioText.cn: 医疗资源已经捉襟见肘。
radioText.en: We're running low on medical supplies.

radioText.cn: 我知道这会让你有压力……
radioText.en: I know this will only make work more difficult for you...

radioText.cn: 但是我需要更多的药品和更多的医疗器械。
radioText.en: But I need more meds and medical equipment.

radioText.cn: 敢偷*咕哝*碾骨的东西？找死。
radioText.en: Try to steal Bonekrusher stuff, eh? *Mumble* You want death?

radioText.cn: 哼，头领给你*咕哝*机会。高地的部队，有多少，都在哪儿？说了，就放你走。
radioText.en: Hrmph. Baws wanna give a *Mumble* chance. How many of you are at the plateau? Say it and we'll let you live.

radioText.cn: 你要救人？还是，不救？
radioText.en: Wanna save lives? Or get them killed?

radioText.cn: 你……凑近点……
radioText.en: You ... come closer...

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿嘿，对啦，说吧？
radioText.en: Heheheh. That's right. Out with it!

radioText.cn: 这本来……就是工团的药！去死吧，强盗！
radioText.en: These meds ... belong to the UWST! DIE, BANDIT!

actorName.cn: 慌张的研究员{m01lv03tape-慌张的研究员A}

radioText.cn: 那东西在唱歌……
radioText.en: That thing is singing...

actorName.cn: 颤抖的研究员{m01lv03tape-慌张的研究员B}

radioText.cn: 它一定和超域有关！
radioText.en: It's definitely linked to the Æther!

actorName.cn: 惶恐的研究员{m01lv03tape-慌张的研究员C}

radioText.cn: 更下面到底有什么……
radioText.en: What is down there ... exactly...?

actorName.cn: 颤抖的研究员{m01lv03tape-慌张的研究员B}

radioText.cn: 咱们几个研究石料的怕是搞不定了，想要再挖下去……只能让寂语修会负责了吧。
radioText.en: We're just mineralogists! This is way beyond us. We can't dig any deeper... We better call the Cabal of Tranquility and let them handle it.

actorName.cn: 慌张的研究员{m01lv03tape-慌张的研究员A}

radioText.cn: 绝对不行……
radioText.en: Absolutely not...

actorName.cn: 颤抖的研究员{m01lv03tape-慌张的研究员B}

radioText.cn: 我们得想办法撤……
radioText.en: We gotta evac —

actorName.cn: 决然的工人{m01lv05tape-决然的工人}

radioText.cn: 超域爆发了，但我绝不会撤离……
radioText.en: The Æther ruptured. But I'm not evaccing...

actorName.cn: 决然的工人{m01lv05tape-决然的工人}

radioText.cn: 这么多年的研究成果，怎么能拱手让给裂地者破坏！
radioText.en: I won't let these LBs destroy years' worth of research data!

actorName.cn: 决然的工人{m01lv05tape-决然的工人}

radioText.cn: 研究所前还能架起最后一道防线。
radioText.en: The Research Center will be our final bastion of defense.

actorName.cn: 决然的工人{m01lv05tape-决然的工人}

radioText.cn: 伊冯也没有撤离，我会配合她。
radioText.en: Yvonne is also staying put. I will do whatever it takes to help.

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 必须！再去！申请！更多支持！
radioText.en: MUST! GET! MORE! FUNNDDIIIIINNNGGGG!

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 你们觉得我在开玩笑吗？
radioText.en: Do you think I'm joking?

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 我已经有一只脚踩在成功的门槛上了，我的压缩理论是可行的。
radioText.en: I'm already halfway through the Gate of Success! My compression theory is FEASIBLE!

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 只要我们将源石极致压缩，同时给它动一点点“小手术”，我们就能增强源石的活性。
radioText.en: Just apply extreme pressure to Originium and apply some "micro-surgery". That's the way to boost Originium activity.

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 明白吗？我们需要的是种子，优秀的种子。
radioText.en: Don't you understand? We need seeds. Premium quality seeds.

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 足够优秀的种子才能为我们提供足够多、足够好的源石。
radioText.en: Only the best seeds can give us Originium of sufficient quantity and quality.

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 人类储备的源石足够多吗？我很难说足够多，源石本就应该多多益善才对吧？
radioText.en: Is our Originium reserve big enough? I don't think anyone would say yes. We should always get as much as we can.

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 驱动车辆、开山凿壁、烹饪用的炉灶、孩子手上的玩具……哪里不需要源石？
radioText.en: Everything needs Originium. Tunneling and mining, powered vehicles, cooking stoves, and even children's toys...

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 更何况，我们是要开拓这颗星球的，是要走遍塔卫二的！
radioText.en: And let's not forget that our mission is to explore this planet! We're here to spread across Talos-II.

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 我们需要源石！更多的源石！
radioText.en: We need more Originium! WAY MORE!

actorName.cn: 激动的研究员{m01lv05tape-激动的研究员}

radioText.cn: 以及我要强调一下，<@nar.quote>压缩实验没有危险！我又不是在制造裂隙！</>
radioText.en: And I'd also like to emphasize that the <@nar.quote>compression tests are not dangerous! I'm not tearing open new rifts, after all!</>

radioText.cn: 《三十天学会如何战胜侵蚀》……
radioText.en: Beating the Blight in 30 Days...

radioText.cn: 不管内容如何，总之一定要有个夺人眼球的名字和封皮，这似乎是塔卫二大部分娱乐文学的通病。
radioText.en: Regardless of content, most Talosian authors of entertainment literature have a habit of using controversial or eye-catching titles and cover pages.

actorName.en: The sealing document on the crate reads:

radioText.cn: 五号谷地待建区建设用物资，严禁私自开启。
radioText.en: Valley V construction zone supplies. DO NOT OPEN WITHOUT PERMISSION.

radioText.cn: 屏幕上显示着四号谷地极端天气预测的相关数据，极端天气预测读数整体呈现出了不断升高的状态。
radioText.en: The screen is displaying extreme weather forecasts of Valley IV. Extreme Weather Probability readings have been steadily increasing.

radioText.cn: 警告！锚点密度异常，请尽快避难……
radioText.en: Warning! Ankhor density anomaly detected. Evacuate immediately...

radioText.cn: 正在将观测数据上传分析中心……
radioText.en: Uploading observation data to the analytical center...

radioText.cn: 正在同步防卫单元……
radioText.en: Synchronizing with defense units...

radioText.cn: 同步失效，请检查通信模块。
radioText.en: Synchronization failed. Please check communications module.

radioText.cn: 门内传来了极轻的，不知什么东西抓挠铁门的声音。
radioText.en: Sound of gentle scratching can be heard coming from the other side of the door.

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 碎块……二十年前……能量留存……
radioText.en: Fragments ... twenty years ago ... residual energy...

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 侵蚀的结合……我的记忆……
radioText.en: An agglomeration of Blight... My memories...

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 我要让它变成可控的！
radioText.en: I shall make it controllable!

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 我要让威胁不再是威胁！
radioText.en: I shall render the threat harmless!

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 我一定能成功。
radioText.en: I shall succeed.

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 碾碎了我所有家人，碾碎了我所有朋友的巨大天使……
radioText.en: The giant Aggelos that crushed my family ... and all my friends...

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 我要从它的尸骸里挖出一条道路，挖出一条能和天使的本质对视的道路！
radioText.en: I shall carve a path through its carcass ... a road that brings us face-to-face with the Aggeloid essence!

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 我要看到它。
radioText.en: I shall look right at it.

actorName.cn: 仇恨的书写者{m01lv06tape-仇恨的书写者}

radioText.cn: 我要俯瞰它。
radioText.en: I shall gaze upon it from up high.

radioText.cn: 羡慕洛茜的留言
radioText.en: Memo: Looking Up to Rossi

radioText.cn: 看看洛茜小妹，她才多少岁……
radioText.en: Look at little Rossi... How old is she again?

radioText.cn: 虽然能看出一点点小孩子的感觉，但这种感觉只有一点点。
radioText.en: She's got a bit of that girly vibe. But just a bit.

radioText.cn: 剩下的就是务实，可靠……嗯……领袖气质？
radioText.en: The rest of her is all about being practical and reliable... Hmm... Feels like a leader in the making.

radioText.cn: 这是怎么磨炼出来的……我都想把我家几个不成器的东西丢去荒地里练几年。
radioText.en: I don't know how she did it... In any case, I'm thinking about dumping my disappointing runts in the wildlands where they can learn a thing or two for a few years.

radioText.cn: 纸张上写着播放新蓝卡坞最新影片的计划。
radioText.en: A piece of paper describing the plans for screening the latest New Wrankwood movies.

radioText.cn: 当然，所谓的“最新”，应该也是上映有段时间的电影了。
radioText.en: Of course, the "latest" movies also include those that have been in the theaters for quite a while.

radioText.cn: 这里是最后一道防线，绝不能再退，再退试验场就丢了。
radioText.en: No more retreating! This is our final line of defense! If we lose this, they'll take the Test Site.

radioText.cn: 二队，守住集装箱防线。
radioText.en: Team two, hold the line at the container yard.

radioText.cn: 是！
radioText.en: Sir, yes, sir!

radioText.cn: 三队，想办法找到“烙铁”。
radioText.en: Team three, do whatever you can and find that Utjug.

radioText.cn: 是！
radioText.en: Sir, yes, sir!

radioText.cn: 小虫，五分钟之内向我汇报道路状况。
radioText.en: Buggy, need an update on road conditions in five minutes.

radioText.cn: 收到收到！
radioText.en: Gotcha loud and clear! On it!

radioText.cn: 能不能干掉那个女人，就看这辆装甲车了。
radioText.en: Counting on that armored vehicle to blast that woman to oblivion.

radioText.cn: 奇怪……？这些烟雾里有异常的超域能量读数。直接穿过太危险了，得先让它停下来。
radioText.en: Strange... I've picked up abnormal Æther energy readings in the haze. We can't risk this, team. Our only solution is to stop the denstacks first.

radioText.cn: 这座巣雕比我想象的还要巨大，不祥和危险的气息也加重了……需要尽快让它停下。
radioText.en: This denstack is far larger than I thought. The structure has a dangerous look about it... We must disable it ASAP.

radioText.cn: 啊哈,小车修好啦！
radioText.en: Aha! My baby bot is fixed!

radioText.cn: 根据计算，全灭敌人的概率，99%？
radioText.en: According to estimates, the chance of us obliterating all enemies is 99%?

radioText.cn: 站稳啦！可能有点危险！
radioText.en: Steady now! This might be dangerous!

radioText.cn: 虽然有点危险…..但是结果还是很符合计算的嘛！全灭！
radioText.en: It's a little dangerous at first, but the results are within my calculations! TOTAL OBLITERATION!

radioText.cn: 严重错误？？塔-塔我来救你了，我暂时腾不出手来，迷你暴鸰操作劝就交给你了，管理员~
radioText.en: Serious error?? Tata! Mommy's here to save you! Endmin, I really need a pair of extra hands. Here. Take the Mini-Bombtail controller. Puh-lease do this for me, Endmin?

radioText.cn: 好了好了，最后的自检过程了。不能让裂地者这么嚣张，我要用点猛的了！
radioText.en: Alright. Final validation process. Can't let the LBs have their way. Time for something serious!

radioText.cn: 这个裂地者为啥带个烟囱，好奇怪！不对不对，我要先修理小车！
radioText.en: Why is this LB carrying a chimney around? That's so weird! WAIT! Mommy's distracted. Gotta focus on fixing my baby bot!

radioText.cn: 你说你叫塔塔，虽然不知道是谁起的名字，但是还不错~
radioText.en: Your name is Tata? I don't know who gave you this name, but I think I like it!

radioText.cn: 塔塔一路上你受苦啦，让我好好给你恢复下
radioText.en: You've suffered so much, Tata. Let Mommy take a look at you.

radioText.cn: 过载导致的是么…那这样，那样一下就好了
radioText.en: Huh. Caused by an overload... Well then, I guess this won't take too long.

radioText.cn: 唔,好想来杯咖啡，啊不对不对，修车要紧
radioText.en: Ugh. I really need some coffee. HNGH! NO! Don't get distracted, Yvonne! Focus on repairing the baby bot!

radioText.cn: 坚持住，最后准备阶段了，充能快好了！
radioText.en: Keep it together! This is the final prep phase. Energy charging is almost complete!

radioText.cn: 这样下去会伤害到我的塔-塔！我要一次性解决他们，我来准备个超级大的！
radioText.en: This will hurt my Tata! I gotta finish them off at one go! Time for a gigaton of pain!

radioText.cn: 前面这块侵蚀的核心恐怕在另一侧，等我们穿过大楼后再处理吧。
radioText.en: The Blight Core of this patch is probably on the other side. We must reach the other side of the building to take it out.

radioText.cn: 找到了！
radioText.en: Found it!

radioText.cn: 太好了！真有意思！
radioText.en: Awesome! This is so fun!

radioText.cn: 别只顾着玩，我们有任务在身。
radioText.en: Let's focus on the mission, team.

radioText.cn: 哈哈。
radioText.en: Haha.

radioText.cn: 怎么还是荞花？怎么办啊，管理员！
radioText.en: Buckflowers? Again? What should we do, Endmin?

radioText.cn: 等等，长耳兽似乎在找别的东西！
radioText.en: Wait. The long-ear seems to be looking for something else!

radioText.cn: 这地貌……看起来是发生过沉降。
radioText.en: The local terrain... This place probably experienced a depression.

radioText.cn: 这有地下管道……注意观察！它不会走太远的。
radioText.en: There's an underground tunnel here... Keep your eyes open! It shouldn't be far.

radioText.cn: 一定要抓到！
radioText.en: We must catch it!

radioText.cn: 你没问题的，管理员。
radioText.en: You will, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 可算是追到了。
radioText.en: Finally caught up to it.

radioText.cn: 所以接下来，我们要和长耳兽赛跑吗？
radioText.en: So are we gonna race the long-ear?

radioText.cn: 好狡猾！居然还会钻管道。
radioText.en: What a cunning little thing! It uses the secret tunnel to escape!

radioText.cn: 应该就在附近了。
radioText.en: It should be close.

radioText.cn: 哈哈，比速度我可一点都不怕。
radioText.en: Haha. I'm always ready for a race.

radioText.cn: 陈千语！任务要紧！
radioText.en: Operator Chen! Focus on the mission!

radioText.cn: 跟丢了……回到起点重新找找好了。
radioText.en: We lost it... Let's head back to the starting point and look for it again.

radioText.cn: （滴滴答答的雨声）
radioText.en: (Drip drop; the sound of rain)

radioText.cn: 喂，这就是寨民，对吧……
radioText.en: Hey, that's a Stockader, right...?

radioText.cn: 上次来没见到啊……欸，你说她会不会直接拿刀过来，让咱们挑个死法，然后把咱们切碎了扔水里？
radioText.en: Didn't see any last time... You think she might just come at us with knives, tell us to pick how we die, then chop us up and toss us in the water?

radioText.cn: ……你不要听那些一口一个“沧贼”的人胡说。
radioText.en: ...Don't listen to those folks who keep shouting "Cangzei pirates". They're full of nonsense.

radioText.cn: 寨民们最多就是抢点物资，你看着只是个穷酸画家，不会有什么危险的。
radioText.en: The Stockaders might swipe some supplies at most. But you just look like a struggling artist so you'll be fine.

radioText.cn: 更何况，现在大家是在亭中避雨，野兽们喝水时都不会相互攻击，人难道还不如野兽吗？
radioText.en: Besides, everyone's just sheltering from the rain in this pavilion. Even beasts wouldn't attack each other while drinking water. Would people really be worse than beasts?

radioText.cn: 喂，你们两个，嘀咕什么呢？
radioText.en: HEY! What are you two mumbling about?

radioText.cn: 这位小姐，我看您英气……欸……
radioText.en: Miss, I can tell you have a heroic vibe ... um...

radioText.cn: 她怎么走了？
radioText.en: Why did she leave?

radioText.cn: ……因为雨停了。
radioText.en: Because the rain has stopped...

radioText.cn: 哟，这不是中奖哥吗，还不走？
radioText.en: Hey, if it isn't the lucky winner! Why are you still here?

radioText.cn: 不走，当然不走，绝对不走……
radioText.en: I'm not going anywhere. No way I'm leaving here...

radioText.cn: 我每次下班都过来看看，早晚一定还能捡到一张没兑换的中奖卡，相信我。
radioText.en: I come by every day after work. Sooner or later, I'll snag another unclaimed jackpot ticket.

radioText.cn: 这……这种事不是次次都会发生的……
radioText.en: Uh, I doubt things like that happen very often...

radioText.cn: 欸，这你就有所不知啦，人总要靠着一点点期待，才能活得更开心。
radioText.en: Hmph, then you're wrong. People need a little hope to make life happier.

radioText.cn: 但是现在天色已晚，我就先走了……明天见……
radioText.en: But it's getting late now... I'll head off. See you tomorrow...

radioText.cn: 姐，要……要不直接告诉他，那张卡片是你故意给他扔的生日惊喜？
radioText.en: Sis... Should we just tell him that you threw that ticket to him on purpose as a birthday surprise?

radioText.cn: 事到如今怎么说出口啊……
radioText.en: *Sigh* I honestly don't know how to tell him that...

radioText.cn: 不用收拾东西了，命才是最优先的，这一次登陆的天使小不了……
radioText.en: Stop packing your stuff! The Aggelos attacking this time is huge!

radioText.cn: 喂！还不走？你想被它碾成肉饼吗？
radioText.en: Let's go already! You wanna get flattened into paste?

radioText.cn: 一定是破潮之像，一定是它，终于……我终于能……
radioText.en: It has to be the Tidalklast ... it must be. Finally ... after all this time...

radioText.cn: 你想干什么！
radioText.en: What are you trying to do?!

radioText.cn: 五年了，老师的仇，监测站其他人的仇，我必须……
radioText.en: It's been five years. I can finally avenge my mentor and everyone from the station...

radioText.cn: 走走走，捆在椅子上直接推着走就是了。
radioText.en: Gosh! Just tie him to the chair and push him out!

radioText.cn: 你打他做什么……
radioText.en: Did you just knock him out...?

radioText.cn: 不把他打晕了，难道看着他跟破潮之像拼命？
radioText.en: Oh, c'mon! What else could I do? Watch him fight the Tidalklast and die?

radioText.cn: 所有人！快快快！加快速度，快撤！
radioText.en: Everyone! Pick up the pace! We need to evacuate now!

radioText.cn: 这就是电机外廊的入口。但好像被堵住了，过不去。
radioText.en: This is the entrance of the generator gangway, but it's blocked. We can't get through.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们得另外找一条进去的路。
radioText.en: Endmin, we need to look for another way in.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这里这里，可以从这几个箱子上跳进去。
radioText.en: This is the place, Endmin. You can jump on these boxes to go inside.

radioText.cn: 根据发送给秦主管的求援信息，自从锚点落下之后，枢纽区集成工业研究所的分管负责人希茜就失联了。
radioText.en: According to Director Qin's distress call, Cynthia, the Hub Base AIC Research Deputy Manager, has gone missing after the Ankhorfall.

radioText.cn: 与希茜最后的联络显示她在电机外廊附近，去那里看看吧。
radioText.en: Cynthia last made contact near the generator gangway. Let's go there and take a look.

radioText.cn: 想不到，基地里还有没被清理掉的天使……
radioText.en: Whoa... Didn't expect to find Aggeloi still running around in the base...

radioText.cn: 外面怎么这么多天使……也没办法联系救援。唉……
radioText.en: Why are there so many Aggeloi outside...? I can't even call for help. *Sigh*...

radioText.cn: 管理员，快去看看，里面有人！
radioText.en: Endmin, hear that? I think someone's inside!

radioText.cn: 天使的数量可真不少……
radioText.en: So many Aggeloi here...

radioText.cn: 到现在为止，情况确实有些异常。希望这里真的能找到线索吧。
radioText.en: The situation does seem abnormal. I hope we can find some actual clues here.

radioText.cn: 干得漂亮，管理员！
radioText.en: Nicely done, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 我联系上了附近的一些人员，问过之后，都说希茜去了停车场。
radioText.en: I've contacted nearby personnel and asked them about Cynthia. Everyone said she went to the car park.

radioText.cn: 救……救命！我在这里！
radioText.en: Help ... HELP! I'm here!

radioText.cn: 管理员！新的敌人！
radioText.en: Endmin! We got company!

radioText.cn: 难道说……不对……那也对不上啊……
radioText.en: Let's try this... No... It doesn't work either...

radioText.cn: 管理员，那边应该都是工团的人，可以找他们问问，说不定有什么线索？
radioText.en: Endmin, the people over there look like UWST crew mates. Maybe we can talk to them and get more clues.

radioText.cn: 啊……这零件掉得也太多了吧？
radioText.en: Oh... They really dropped a lot of parts.

radioText.cn: 不过这可能确实是个好线索？
radioText.en: But this does look like a decent clue.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们可以顺着掉落的零件往前走，说不准能找到裂地者的营地呢。
radioText.en: Endmin, we can follow this trail of parts. It might even lead us to the breakers' camp.

actorName.cn: 播报音{多功能语音播报器}

radioText.cn: 施工中注意：一、出入现场需完成安全检查；二、如遇紧急情况及时撤离；三、保管好工作日志，离开前检查机器情况……
radioText.en: Safety Reminders: 1. Do safety checks before entering or leaving the site; 2. Evacuate the site ASAP during emergencies; 3. Update work logs and check the machines at end of shift.

radioText.cn: 什么人？！
radioText.en: Who's there?!

radioText.cn: 管理员，辛苦了！他们估计就是袭击源石副产物中心的那批裂地者……
radioText.en: Good job, Endmin! This must be the same LB mob that attacked the Originium BPPC...

radioText.cn: 看来，我们很快就能找到那些被抢走的物资了！
radioText.en: We should be pretty close to the looted supplies!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们要不要往更深处看看？
radioText.en: Endmin, should we head deeper into the cave and look around?

radioText.cn: 说不定……裂地者还在里面藏了别的什么东西？
radioText.en: I'm thinking the LBs might've stashed other things here.

radioText.cn: 难道这是那些裂地者藏的什么宝贝？管理员，要打开看看吗？
radioText.en: This looks like the Landbreakers' loot, Endmin. Should we open it?

radioText.cn: 这里居然藏了这么多东西？有些好像还是工团的……我这就通知萨特，让他派人来看看吧！
radioText.en: This stash is huge! Some of this stuff looks like it came from the UWST. I'll give Satyr a call and tell him to get his crew over here.

radioText.cn: 这下事情总算告一段落了。管理员，可以回去啦！
radioText.en: I believe this is a successful conclusion to this incident. We can head back now, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 伴随巢雕雾气对视觉的影响，眼前再次出现了那些<@qu.key>图案</>……
radioText.en: The denstack haze interferes with your vision. Once again you see those strange <@qu.key>glyphs</>...

radioText.cn: 咦？你是说这边也有<@qu.key>裂地者的涂鸦</>？
radioText.en: Huh? You saw <@qu.key>Landbreaker graffiti</> there as well?

radioText.cn: 管理员，我感觉如果一直沿着你说的这些涂鸦走，估计要走到山下了……
radioText.en: Endmin, if we keep following these graffiti, we might end up at the foot of the hills...

radioText.cn: 这里居然还藏了一个裂地者的营地？离枢纽区基地也太近了……
radioText.en: A hidden Landbreaker camp? Geez, this is way too close to the Hub Base...

radioText.cn: 他们聚在这里干什么？唔，先不考虑这些了，还是赶紧解决掉这些危险的家伙比较好。
radioText.en: Why are they gathering here? Hmm... Endmin, we'd better take care of these threats quickly.

radioText.cn: 总算能松口气了……等等，管理员，那边好像有个门？
radioText.en: That'll give us some breathing space... Wait. Endmin, I think I just saw a gate over there.

radioText.cn: 不愧是管理员，这么快就解出答案了！
radioText.en: Awesome as always, Endmin! You found the answer so quickly!

radioText.cn: 什么反应都没有……看来不是这个顺序……
radioText.en: Nothing's happening... Maybe this isn't the right sequence...

radioText.cn: 欸？管理员你是怎么解开的？难道只靠猜就……那也太厉害了！
radioText.en: Wow?! How did you solve this, Endmin? Did you just ... guess? That's super impressive!

radioText.cn: 我简单扫描了一下，前面那些好像是裂地者抢来的物资，感觉量还挺多的……
radioText.en: I did a quick scan. The Landbreakers' loot should be inside. Looks like quite a stash...

radioText.cn: 管理员你先去看看？说不定有工团的东西呢？
radioText.en: Go take a look, Endmin. Maybe we'll find UWST property.

radioText.cn: 管理员？！你也找到这里了？太好了！这下我们一定能粉碎裂地者的惊天大阴谋！
radioText.en: Endmin?! You found this place too! Awesome! With you around, we'll foil the Landbreakers' evil conspiracy in no time!

radioText.cn: 居然能这样，像忽然从口袋里掏出来一样——凭空建造？！要是我们也能拿到这个技术……
radioText.en: Wha... HOW?! It's like pulling something out of your pocket and letting it — build itself out of thin air!! Imagine if we had this tech in the Band...

radioText.cn: 管理员，安装完毕了吗？我把滑索展示的起终点都给你标注在地图上了。
radioText.en: Done with the installation, Endmin? I've marked more zipline deployment positions on your map.

radioText.cn: 记得起终点之间每隔80米都需要有一根滑索哦！客户已经先出发前往山顶了。
radioText.en: Remember, place a zipline pylon every 80 meters! Our client is waiting for you at the hilltop of the starting location.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这声音是……客户已经体验上了？
radioText.en: Endmin, what was that sound...? Oh. I guess the client got to try it out.

radioText.cn: 管理员，请把现场信息扫描下来，我尽快找技术部门来分析。
radioText.en: Endmin, we should scan the site. I'll get people from the tech divisions to analyze it.

radioText.cn: 这需要一些时间，我会尽量提升队列优先级，请继续调查吧。
radioText.en: This will take a while. I'll try to prioritize this job ticket. Feel free to continue with your investigation.

radioText.cn: 是密钥！就是这玩意儿，找到了！
radioText.en: It's the key! This is the stuff! Found it!

radioText.cn: 怎么抠着不放？手也想打断是吧？滚远点！
radioText.en: Fingers off that thing or I'll break your hand! Get out of my sight!

radioText.cn: 这、这消息是不是不太妙？
radioText.en: Gosh, this doesn't look like good news.

radioText.cn: 我去调取附近信号基站的链接记录，确认他联络时的位置！
radioText.en: I'll access connection logs from nearby base stations. This will let me verify where he sent his last message!

radioText.cn: 管理员，来这里，我们商量一下。
radioText.en: Come here, Endmin. We should discuss.

radioText.cn: 保险起见，我们再去上次和他交易的现场，找找有没有漏掉的线索吧。
radioText.en: Just to be safe, we should return to the site of our previous negotiations, and look around for any clues we might have missed.

radioText.cn: 有<@qu.key>脚印</>，是新鲜的。扫描看看它通向哪里。
radioText.en: <@qu.key>Footprints</>. Fresh. Scan and see where they lead.

radioText.cn: 撞得好惨……
radioText.en: This accident looks really bad...

radioText.cn: 周围的<@qu.key>脚步</>很凌乱，想必他昨天是来这里翻找什么吧。
radioText.en: The nearby <@qu.key>footprints</> are a mess. Perhaps he came back here yesterday to look for something.

radioText.cn: 这应该就是亚历山大的车。行车记录仪没有损坏，我们可以看看里面有什么线索。
radioText.en: This should be Aleksandr's vehicle. The dashcam looks undamaged. Let's see if it contains any useful clues.

radioText.cn: 我的判断没错，哈特曼遇袭时的那根<@qu.key>弩箭</>，不是来自裂地者的。
radioText.en: My guesses are right. The Landbreakers did not fire the <@qu.key>crossbow bolt</> used in the attack on Hartmann.

radioText.cn: 虽然裂地者和我们有过节，但这口黑锅倒是不能扣在他们头上——是这个意思吗？
radioText.en: We might not like the Landbreakers very much, but they probably didn't do this — Is that what you're trying to say?

radioText.cn: 嗯，是有人特意冒充的裂地者。去弩箭发射的地点找找，没准就能知道幕后主使是谁了。
radioText.en: Yes. Someone specifically disguised themselves as Landbreakers. We should search the sniper's firing position. Perhaps we'll figure out who's pulling the strings.

radioText.cn: 不管是谁干的，可别让我陈千语抓着了！我最看不惯别人欺负弱小啦！
radioText.en: Whoever did this, they better start praying that I don't get my hands on them! Because I hate people who bully the weak!

radioText.cn: 从定位上来看，你们已经到了弩箭发射的地点了，管理员，扫描一下附近吧。
radioText.en: Map data shows that you've arrived at the sniper's firing position. Try activating your scanner, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 发现踪迹了。
radioText.en: Found something.

radioText.cn: 旧工厂区是基地里受损最严重的区域，还好，有管理员和佩丽卡监督迅速处理了锚点。
radioText.en: The Hub Base Old Factory suffered the worst damage, Endmin. Fortunately, you and Supervisor Perlica quickly neutralized the Ankhor that fell there.

radioText.cn: 这里有好多伤员……
radioText.en: There are so many injured people here...

radioText.cn: 这里是临时改造的安置点，他们会及时得到救治的。
radioText.en: We turned this place into a temporary ward. Everyone's getting treatment in a timely manner.

radioText.cn: 那里有人！
radioText.en: Someone's over there!

radioText.cn: 我们不能扔下伤员不管，去查看一下他们的情况吧！
radioText.en: We can't just leave the wounded. Let's go check on them!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们得先关停精炼炉。
radioText.en: Endmin, we need to shut down the refining unit first.

actorName.cn: 疲惫的声音{sm1l1m9-疲惫的工人A}

radioText.cn: 这……得花多少时间才能清理干净，又需要多少时间来重建街区？
radioText.en: Blight my eyes... This is gonna take forever to clean up. Rebuilding the entire avenue will take ages!

actorName.cn: 疲惫的声音{sm1l1m9-疲惫的工人B}

radioText.cn: 会好起来的……都会好起来的。
radioText.en: Things will get better... They always do.

radioText.cn: 物流机器人已经开始运输了，回去告诉埃里克注意接收就行了。
radioText.en: The logistics robot is now transporting the supplies. Let's head back and tell Eric so that he's ready to receive the goods.

radioText.cn: 这是……面包？这不会就是威尔伯说的物资吧。
radioText.en: Is this ... bread? Can this be part of the supplies that Wilbur mentioned?

radioText.cn: 这是终末地的物流箱！果然是运输过程中出了问题……
radioText.en: An Endfield logistics crate! I knew it! Something did happen during the transportation...

radioText.cn: 物资散落得到处都是……顺着这条路找找看，说不定能发现什么线索。
radioText.en: The supplies have been scattered all over the place... Let's go down this path and start looking. Perhaps we'll find a clue.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这里有个山洞，但是被堵上了。
radioText.en: Endmin, there's a cave over there, but the entrance is blocked.

radioText.cn: 像是个藏东西的地方，可以炸开看看！
radioText.en: This looks like a good place for hiding things. Blast it apart and see what's inside!

radioText.cn: 物资果然在这里，应该是被裂地者藏起来的。我们要通知埃里克！
radioText.en: These are our supplies! The Landbreakers probably hid them here. We should inform Eric!

radioText.cn: 等一下，管理员！这里有一个坏掉的物流机器人，如果能修好的话，或许可以直接用它运送物资。
radioText.en: Wait, Endmin! I see a broken logistics robot. Maybe we can repair it and use it to transport the goods.

radioText.cn: 我记得之前在这里实习的时候，大家就经常拿这个唱片机放歌。老式的机器，但音质很好！就是不知道现在还能不能用。
radioText.en: I remember interning at this place. The crew used to play vinyl records on the old phonograph. But the sound quality was impressive! I'm just unsure if the thing still works.

radioText.cn: 这里也有米娅画过的！我在废料场里见过这种小机器人……可能米娅也有类似的玩具？
radioText.en: This must be Mia's drawing! I saw these bots in the Junkyard... Does Mia have toys that look like this?

radioText.cn: 这个眼睛是碾骨氏族的放哨标识，这附近被他们探查过。
radioText.en: The eye is the mark made by Bonekrusher scouts. They probably spied on this area.

radioText.cn: 涂鸦被改成了房屋的样子。
radioText.en: Mia's drawing turned the graffiti into a home.

radioText.cn: 我猜喔，米娅……是真的很想和她的家人们，一起住进能遮风避雨的房子里。
radioText.en: Awww. Let me guess. Mia ... really wants to live in a proper house with her family.

radioText.cn: 原本的图样看着像是一对交叉的匕首……碾骨氏族用这个标识来记录新头目的出现。
radioText.en: The original graffiti looks like a pair of crossed daggers... The Bonekrushers use it to mark the appearance of a new chief.

radioText.cn: 打斗的声音！里面肯定有敌人！
radioText.en: I hear sounds of fighting! We definitely have enemies in there!

radioText.cn: 很神奇的能力……要是有机会，该让师者们也看看。
radioText.en: A wondrous ability... I hope our Aldertones can witness your powers.

radioText.cn: 哥哥姐姐在上面！
radioText.en: Up there!

radioText.cn: 我感觉，牢房起到了保护的作用，里面反而更安全了……不管了，先给他们解围吧。
radioText.en: I feel like it's actually safer inside the prison cells... Ugh, whatever. Let's free them first.

radioText.cn: 这里面，有几个熟面孔……
radioText.en: I see a few familiar faces amongst them...

radioText.cn: 找到了！这些天使就这么堆在这儿……
radioText.en: Found it! They just dumped all the dead Aggeloi here...

radioText.cn: 还好，他们并没有对附近的居民这样做……
radioText.en: I'm just glad they didn't do the same thing to the local residents...

radioText.cn: 是终末地的人……太好了，还以为死定了！
radioText.en: Endfielders...?! Oh thank Talos ... I thought we were gonna die!

radioText.cn: 钥匙倒是有，但扭成这样，肯定是没法用了。
radioText.en: There is a key, but it's ... super twisted. Pretty sure it's busted.

radioText.cn: 先回去找弧光吧，她说不定有办法。
radioText.en: Let's talk to Arclight. Maybe she can figure something out.

radioText.cn: 什么怪物敢拦着我们？回到地底去吧！
radioText.en: How dare you stand in our way? Crawl back to where you belong!

radioText.cn: 你们看！那边是不是有个人？
radioText.en: Look! Someone's over there.

radioText.cn: 摆在那边的东西，就是瓦茨说的行李吗？
radioText.en: Is that the luggage Waitz mentioned?

radioText.cn: 这些家伙真是一点儿好事不干啊。
radioText.en: These breakers are a real menace.

radioText.cn: 看起来就是这个箱子没错了！咱们快给他送回去，希望他还撑得住。
radioText.en: This looks like the missing crate! Let's bring it back to Waitz. Hope he's okay.

radioText.cn: 看来，有些裂地者把货物搬回营地了。
radioText.en: Some breakers carried the cargo back to their camp.

radioText.cn: 瓦茨这么不管不顾地跑来找东西，那箱子里头得是什么宝贝啊？
radioText.en: Waitz rushed into this place for these crates. I wonder what's inside!

radioText.cn: 他看起来倒像是一个正直的人，就是……有点怪。
radioText.en: He seems like a good person. Just a little ... strange.

radioText.cn: 说，把货藏到哪里去了？
radioText.en: Speak plainly, villain! Where did you hide my cargo?

actorName.cn: 骨折的裂地者{sm1|2m3-骨折的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 藏到……藏到老窝去！嘻嘻，藏到肚皮里……藏到你找不到的地方了！
radioText.en: We's... we's hid 'em in our old hideout! Hahaha! Hid 'em in our bellies... Hid 'em in places that you'll never find!

radioText.cn: 嗯？不说是吧？
radioText.en: Hmm. A stubborn one.

actorName.cn: 骨折的裂地者{sm1|2m3-骨折的裂地者}

radioText.cn: 救、救命！里面！里面！
radioText.en: AAARGH! DON'T KILL ME! DON'T KILL ME! THEY'RE INSIDE! INSIIIIIDE!

radioText.cn: 有发现了——这些小小的脚印是什么动物留下的？
radioText.en: Found something —— Tiny paw prints. What animal is this?

radioText.cn: 看样子它们的体型不会太大，也许是长耳兽。
radioText.en: The prints suggest that they're not very big creatures. They might be long-ears.

radioText.cn: 看！果然是长耳兽，它们可喜欢藏东西了！
radioText.en: Look! It really was the long-ears after all! They really like to hide things around!

radioText.cn: 果然和那个<@qu.key>山洞</>很像……管理员，靠那边的<@qu.key>巢雕</>说不定能找到什么开门的线索？
radioText.en: It's really similar to that <@qu.key>cave</>... Endmin, the <@qu.key>denstack</> there might give us clues for opening the gate.

radioText.cn: 地上也有那种奇怪图案？可以仔细调查一下！说不定有开门的线索。
radioText.en: The ground has those strange glyphs too? Maybe they hold clues for opening the gate.

radioText.cn: 欸？管理员你已经解开了？这就是解谜高手的天赋吗？
radioText.en: Huh? Did you just figure it out, Endmin? You are one gifted puzzle solver!

actorName.cn: 裂地者守卫{sm1l2m4-裂地者守卫}

radioText.cn: 什么人？！
radioText.en: Who's there?!

radioText.cn: 没想到宝物没找到，先找到裂地者了……还好管理员你反应快。
radioText.en: Gosh, no goodies, only Landbreakers... Good thing you were quick on the draw, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 欸？地面上好像有掩埋的痕迹……管理员，你说这会不会就是裂地者的“<@qu.key>宝藏</>”？
radioText.en: Wait, there are signs of a burial here... Endmin, perhaps this is the Landbreakers' "<@qu.key>treasure trove</>".

radioText.cn: 伴随巢雕雾气对视觉的影响，你的眼前再次出现了那些图案……
radioText.en: The denstack haze changes your vision. Once again you see those strange glyphs...

radioText.cn: 管理员！这边！这边！
radioText.en: Endmin! Over here! I'm over here!

radioText.cn: 这附近……是不是有点安静过头了？管理员，感觉有点不妙啊……
radioText.en: This place is too quiet for my liking... Endmin, something really doesn't feel right here...

actorName.cn: 拘谨的采石场行政人员{拉蒙}

radioText.cn: M31135请求援助！M31135请求援助！区域受灾害影响，道路阻断严重，需要工程技术人员支援！
radioText.en: M31135 requesting support! M31135 requesting support! Sector has been hit by a disaster. The roads are out. We need engineering and technical support!

radioText.cn: 这门好像从里面反锁了？可惜是工团的设备，不好用剑解决。稍微有点麻烦……
radioText.en: This gate seems locked from the inside. Since it's UWST property, I probably shouldn't hack it to pieces. Oh bummer...

radioText.cn: 这个位置好像也可以跳下去？不过没刚刚那个高台省事就是了……
radioText.en: We can probably jump down from here! Now that I think of it, the platform just then was a bit easier, I think...

radioText.cn: 管理员，要试试吗？
radioText.en: How about a leap of faith, Endmin?

radioText.cn: 管理员小心！这里也有天使！
radioText.en: Watch out, Endmin! There are Aggeloi here!

radioText.cn: 你先待在我身后！让我来会会它们！
radioText.en: Stay behind me! I'll see what they're made of!

radioText.cn: 这边受灾的情况有点严重啊……
radioText.en: The disaster really wrecked this place...

radioText.cn: 塌方的程度都快赶上外头那些侵蚀遍地的地区了……
radioText.en: The landslide reminds me of those super Blighted areas outside...

radioText.cn: 那边好像有人！管理员，过去看看吧！
radioText.en: There are people over there! Endmin, let's go talk to them!

radioText.cn: 门好像锁住了？唔，我就不拿剑劈了，免得回头又要赔……
radioText.en: The gate seems locked. Hngh. Fine. I'll refrain from bashing it open so they won't charge me with vandalism...

radioText.cn: 总之，还是先去看看周围的其他地方吧！
radioText.en: Well then, I guess we'll look around.

radioText.cn: 好了！这下总算能进去了！
radioText.en: Awesome! We can now head in!

radioText.cn: 管理员，刚刚我又根据在你那边探测到的信号定向搜索了一下，发讯者的位置应该就在附近了！
radioText.en: Endmin, I just traced and triangulated the signal that you picked up. The sender should be nearby!

radioText.cn: 我马上就把具体坐标发给你们！
radioText.en: I'm sending the coordinates over to you and Chen!

radioText.cn: 离那个坐标越来越近了，管理员，对方应该就在这个台子上面！
radioText.en: We're getting real close to the coordinates, Endmin! The sender should be atop this platform!

radioText.cn: 至于具体怎么上去……要我跳上去倒是没问题啦，但加上管理员你的话，还是老老实实坐电梯吧。
radioText.en: Now, I could simply jump around a bit and reach the place... But since I have to take you around, I guess we'll ... take the elevator, just to be safe, you know.

radioText.cn: 管理员，你试试看？应该是能正常操作的……
radioText.en: Try it out, Endmin... It should be working properly ... I think...

radioText.cn: 这一堆数字也太麻烦了！管理员，你会“那招”的对吧？干脆把这几个装置炸了得了！
radioText.en: Ugh, this bunch of numbers ain't getting us anywhere! Endmin, you still got that trick of yours, right? Let's just fry their circuits!

radioText.cn: 炸、炸了？！不、不可以！破坏公共装置要罚款的……
radioText.en: Fry ... fry the circuits?! NO! Don't do that! My mentor said that ... vandalizing public property will result in a fine...!

radioText.cn: 你看！我就说这招能行嘛！
radioText.en: See! I knew blowing things up would work!

radioText.cn: 管理员，要不干脆把那几个装置炸了……
radioText.en: Endmin, why don't we just fry some circuits and blow things up...?

radioText.cn: 总算进来了！多谢啦！米菈！
radioText.en: Finally made our way in! Thanks a lot, Mila!

radioText.cn: 我、我也没帮上什么忙啦……
radioText.en: But I ... I didn't really help much...

radioText.cn: 你、你们要看的图纸，应该在那边……我、我就先去录入资料了……
radioText.en: The sche ... schematics you want should ... should be there... I ... I'm gonna upload some data...

radioText.cn: 嗯！你去忙你的，我们看我们的！
radioText.en: Okay! Do your stuff. We'll do ours!

radioText.cn: 管理员，现在你可以试试起重机的转向功能！应该能用了！
radioText.en: Endmin, you can try turning the arm of the super crane! The turntable should be working now!

radioText.cn: 哇！
radioText.en: Whoa!

radioText.cn: 这边的情况也没好到哪里去嘛……路也太难走了！
radioText.en: Ugh. This place got seriously wrecked as well... You can hardly walk on this mess!

radioText.cn: 不过我倒是没什么，管理员，你可千万多留神！
radioText.en: I mean ... it isn't hard for me, but you need to watch your step, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 怎么办，管理员？还是你来决定吧！
radioText.en: What should we do, Endmin? Hmm. I guess I'll let you decide!

radioText.cn: 好耶！这下就能过去了！
radioText.en: Alrighty! Let's get moving!

radioText.cn: 呃，这天使还怪倒霉的……
radioText.en: Well, that's one unlucky Aggelos...

actorName.cn: 漫不经心的工团老太太{佩妮}

radioText.cn: 不错不错，你们两个年轻人，还真是胆大心细，有些本事。
radioText.en: Impressive, young blood. You have courage and the skills to match.

actorName.cn: 漫不经心的工团老太太{佩妮}

radioText.cn: 老太太年纪大了，确实是看走眼了……
radioText.en: This old lady made a misjudgment... These kids went beyond my expectations...

radioText.cn: 这边！
radioText.en: Over here!

radioText.cn: 你们愣着干嘛？快上来啊！
radioText.en: Don't just stand around. Move those legs and get yourselves up here!

radioText.cn: 太厉害了吧……这速度都快赶上我师父了……
radioText.en: Incredible... She's climbing almost as fast as my mentor...!

radioText.cn: 管理员，我好像看见吊臂了！就在上面那个位置！
radioText.en: Endmin! I think I see the crane arm! We just need to reach the top!

radioText.cn: 哇哦！这高度……管理员，你可千万小心啊！
radioText.en: Whoa! It's really far down... Try not to fall off!

radioText.cn: 啧啧，哪怕是我掉下去了，估计也得吃不少苦头……
radioText.en: Phewie... Falling off would hurt real bad, even for someone like me...

radioText.cn: 管理员，那边应该就是佩妮女士说的深层管理区了！只要再调下吊臂的角度就行了！
