radioText.en: Endmin, the Deep Management Post that Penny mentioned should be over there! Now we'll just need to adjust the angle of the crane arm.

radioText.cn: 哇！没想到这上面还挺宽敞的？再上来十几个人也完全没问题嘛！
radioText.en: Wow! This is actually pretty spacious. We can probably stuff a dozen people into this!

radioText.cn: 欸？这里看起来怎么就像有人住似的？
radioText.en: Wait. Someone seems to be living at this place.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这个位置难道就是佩妮女士说的“维修通道”？
radioText.en: Endmin, is this the "maintenance shaft" that Penny mentioned?

radioText.cn: 管理员，负责救援的工友都已在吊臂顶端准备就绪，随时可以出发！接下来就麻烦你把起重机转到深层管理区的方向了！
radioText.en: Endmin, our rescue team is atop the crane. The crew is ready to roll! We'll just need you to turn the crane arm towards the Deep Management Post!

radioText.cn: 听起来他们是遇上什么麻烦了……管理员，帮人帮到底，我们快去看看吧！
radioText.en: Sounds like the team ran into trouble... Endmin, we can't just leave them like this. Let's go and take a look!

radioText.cn: 这是怎么回事？居然冒出来这么多天使？！
radioText.en: You gotta be kidding me! Where did all these Aggeloi come from?

radioText.cn: 话说回来，这附近的天使未免有点多了吧……到底是从哪里冒出来的？
radioText.en: Speaking of which, this place seems to have too many Aggeloi... Where did all these rock buggers come from?

radioText.cn: 别、别过来！走、走开！快走开！
radioText.en: Don't! Don't come any closer! SHOO! SHOOO! Bad rocky! BAD ROCKY!

radioText.cn: 喂！你们的对手在这儿呢！
radioText.en: Hey, you crag-buggers! You're fighting me!

radioText.cn: 米菈，我说你背这么大个包不累吗？我刚掂了下……可不轻啊！
radioText.en: Mila, your backpack is huge ... and it looks really heavy... Don't you ever get tired carrying it around?

radioText.cn: 嘿嘿……我、我早就习惯了！里、里面是我的“好伙伴”……就、就算要离开这里……我、我也想带着它们……
radioText.en: Heheh ... I ... I got used to the weight, you know! I got a collection of my little buddies in there... If I ... If I had to leave this place ... I ... I'm gonna take them all with me...

radioText.cn: 档、档案库就在那边……
radioText.en: Loo ... Look! That's the Arr ... Archive...!

radioText.cn: 等等……紧急安保装置……启动了？怎么会……
radioText.en: Wait...! The emergency security measures... They've been activated?! How...?

radioText.cn: 朝西往左，朝东往右……应、应该是左边……？
radioText.en: West is left, east is right... Maybe I should ... I should try going ... left?

radioText.cn: 选、选错了……朝、朝向什么的……好难……
radioText.en: Kya! I ... I made a mistake... West is what again...? Hngh ... this is so hard...

radioText.cn: 要、要是菲莉丝在……她肯定能选对……
radioText.en: If ... if Phyllis were here ... she'll definitely get it right on the first try...

radioText.cn: 别在意啦！肯定还有办法！不行就把这装置破坏了得了！
radioText.en: Don't worry about it! We'll figure something out! If hacking doesn't work, just let me smash that thing!

radioText.cn: 欸？！难、难道这边才是东？对、对不起，我、我没分清……
radioText.en: Huh?! That's east? I ... I'm so sorry... Hngh... I'm so confused right now...

radioText.cn: 没事啦！我们这也是歪打正着了嘛！
radioText.en: It's alright. We stumbled our way to success! I call that a win.

radioText.cn: 这、这个机关我有印象！只、只要按某种顺序激活装置就好！
radioText.en: I ... I think I saw this mechanism before! We just ... just need to activate the devices in the correct sequence!

radioText.cn: 啊，我以前也见过类似的！最难搞的就是这个“某种顺序”……
radioText.en: Me too! Ugh. This one is *real* tricky! I never figured out the right sequence...

radioText.cn: 别、别着急！这、这个因为有点难，我专门记过培训笔记！
radioText.en: No ... no rush! It's ... it's a little hard, so ... so I made a training cheat sheet!

radioText.cn: 找到了！“若有工友遗忘了顺序，请留意零件箱上的提示”……
radioText.en: Found it! "If a crew member forgets the sequence, refer to the secret clue on the spare parts locker"...

radioText.cn: 零件箱？是不是就是附近写了一堆数字的？
radioText.en: Spare parts locker? You mean that thing nearby with a bunch of numbers on it?

radioText.cn: 对、对了！要、要不要再看看布告板？上、上面经常会有工友写的小贴士……
radioText.en: Yeah ... that's ... that's it! Maybe ... maybe we should look at the bulletin board! The crew often ... often posts helpful notes on it...

radioText.cn: 你、你们好厉害！居、居然这么快就解开了！
radioText.en: Wha ... whoa! You're incredible! You ... you solved it so quickly!

radioText.cn: 欸？欸欸？这、这样也可以吗……
radioText.en: Wha?! WHAAAT?! You can actually do that...?

radioText.cn: 哇！干得漂亮，管理员！我刚就想着，实在不行干脆全劈了得了！
radioText.en: HAH! Now that's a beautiful explosion, Endmin! I almost thought I had to cut everything to pieces with my sword!

radioText.cn: 管理员，这地方也太安静了吧……感觉静得都有点不正常了……
radioText.en: This place is too quiet, Endmin... It feels ... really unnatural...

radioText.cn: 上面那些天使……不会都是从这地方冒出来的吧？
radioText.en: Remember the Aggeloi we saw up there? Maybe they ... dug their way out of this place...

radioText.cn: 区域……D？这是什么意思？
radioText.en: Area ... D? What does this mean?

radioText.cn: 管理员你听！是标准的求救信号！而且还在不断发送中！
radioText.en: Wait, hear that, Endmin...? It's ... a standard distress call! And it's set to repeat!

radioText.cn: 快走吧！那些失联的工友肯定在里面！
radioText.en: Let's go! The missing UWST crew mates are definitely in there!

radioText.cn: 原来这里有锚点！难怪附近这么多天使……还好它已经坏掉了，不然就麻烦了！
radioText.en: There's an Ankhor here! That explains all the Aggeloi we saw... Thank goodness it's broken or we'd be in real trouble!

radioText.cn: 原来这儿还有个大家伙！管理员，看来得把它解决了才行！
radioText.en: Wow. Didn't expect to see a supersized buggerloid at this place! Guess we'll have to take it down, Endmin!

radioText.cn: 呼！结束了！这下——
radioText.en: PHEWIE! Done and dusted! Now we can—

radioText.cn: 是求救讯号！声音好像更清楚了……看来我们应该离他们不远了！
radioText.en: It's a distress signal! And it's really clear... We should be close!

radioText.cn: 听见动静没？！它们肯定发现这里了……
radioText.en: Do you hear that?! Hngghh. The buggers found this place...

radioText.cn: 全完了！这下我们要被天使包围了……
radioText.en: It's over! The Aggeloi have completely surrounded us...!

radioText.cn: 呜呜呜我还不想死……我真的不好吃的……
radioText.en: Nuuuhhhh! I don't wanna die... I'm too bony and taste like crap... Please don't eat me...

radioText.cn: 管理员，走吧，只要把电梯修好了，我们就能带工团的大伙儿回去啦！
radioText.en: Let's go, Endmin! Once we fix the elevator, we can bring the entire UWST crew back to the surface!

radioText.cn: 大功告成！管理员，我们先上去看看吧！
radioText.en: Awesome work! Alright, Endmin. Let's take it for a test ride!

radioText.cn: 这么好的黑豆罐头才吃了一点就丢这儿了，裂地者还真是喜欢暴殄天物。
radioText.en: A fine can of black beans — half-eaten and tossed aside. These LBs really know how to waste food.

radioText.cn: 不过他们应该刚走没多久，可能只是在这儿简单休整了一下？
radioText.en: But it's proof that the LB band rested here for a while. They probably left just now.

radioText.cn: 唔，也可能是急着出发？所以连食物都顾不上收拾了？
radioText.en: Hmm. Maybe the raiders were in such a hurry, they left their food behind?

radioText.cn: 管理员，继续追踪下去吧。
radioText.en: Let's keep going and track them down, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 入侵者？！是那个俘虏引来的吗？
radioText.en: INTRUDERS?! Did that prisoner lead them here?

radioText.cn: 拦住他们！别让人过去了！
radioText.en: Stop them! Don't let anyone pass!

radioText.cn: 还真是热烈的欢迎啊……
radioText.en: What a warm reception...

radioText.cn: 我有点在意他们说的俘虏……难道是……
radioText.en: They mentioned a "prisoner"... Maybe that's...

radioText.cn: 这路障一看就是裂地者的杰作。
radioText.en: This roadblock is obviously made by LBs.

radioText.cn: 嗯？上面好像有一些破损的布料……
radioText.en: Wait. I see a piece of ripped clothing dangling from it...

radioText.cn: 这颜色和材质还真是眼熟……看来我们的记者女士很勇敢呢！
radioText.en: The color and material look familiar... Turns out our little journalist is braver than she looks!

radioText.cn: 就是缺了点逃跑的运气。
radioText.en: Seems like that poor girl tried to flee, but luck wasn't on her side.

radioText.cn: 很清晰的裂地者脚印……看来我们离目标很近了。
radioText.en: These LB footprints are as clear as day... We should be close to our journalist.

radioText.cn: 放我出去！我、我不会再逃了！真的！
radioText.en: Let me out! I won't run off again! I promise!

radioText.cn: 看来我们来得正是时候……
radioText.en: Looks like we've arrived on time...

radioText.cn: 管理员，那几个我来解决，另外几个就交给你了哦！
radioText.en: Endmin, I'll take care of that bunch, and you handle the rest of the rabble. Deal?

radioText.cn: 以前我遇到类似的情况，还得专门和委托人申请行动资格……
radioText.en: I dealt with something similar before, and I had to contact my client to get permission to act...

radioText.cn: 唉，别提多麻烦了。
radioText.en: Geez, what a hassle that was.

radioText.cn: 环塔商会什么都可能缺，就是从来不缺规矩。
radioText.en: The TGCC may lack everything, but they're never short on rules.

radioText.cn: 麻烦也就算啦，关键是有时一耽搁，情况就变复杂了。
radioText.en: I can handle hiccups and slip-ups. It's the delays that make things complicated.

radioText.cn: 要不是我应变能力不错，指不定……都要考虑转行啦。
radioText.en: Thank Talos I'm a resourceful girl, or I'd have changed careers ages ago.

radioText.cn: 嗯哼，我以前的上司可不像管理员你……
radioText.en: And ... my ex-boss is nothing like you, Endmin...

radioText.cn: 既不好说话，还只在乎业绩……给他干活很容易身心俱疲的。
radioText.en: He's a real piece of work — only cares about results. Working under someone like that wears you down.

radioText.cn: 好的回忆？也是有的哦。但更多的还是一些不那么好的回忆啦。
radioText.en: There were good memories ... but the bad ones easily overshadowed them.

radioText.cn: 毕竟在环塔商会，到处都是竞争和压力，你拼命工作的时候一定有人比你更拼命。
radioText.en: The TGCC is all about cut-throat competition. There is always someone out there working way harder than you.

radioText.cn: 所以真的说起来，我并不反感琼斯女士那样的人。
radioText.en: In all seriousness, I actually don't hate people like Miss Jones.

radioText.cn: 想在那样的地方生存下去，就总得做出取舍……
radioText.en: People have to sacrifice plenty of things just to survive in the Band...

radioText.cn: 管理员，情况有些不对……
radioText.en: Something doesn't feel right, Endmin...

radioText.cn: 琼斯女士已经快十分钟没回我消息了……
radioText.en: Miss Jones hasn't replied for nearly ten minutes...

radioText.cn: 以她之前的惊慌程度来看，这绝对不是个好信号。
radioText.en: Given how easily she panicked earlier, this is clearly a bad sign.

radioText.cn: 我们得快一点了。
radioText.en: We should quicken our pace.

radioText.cn: 啧啧，是环塔商会刚出的最新款终端呢！
radioText.en: Oh my. This is the latest handyterm from the TGCC!

radioText.cn: 它的主人会是谁呢？应该不用我说了吧，管理员？
radioText.en: Who might its owner be? I don't think you need to ask, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 这种随意的涂鸦与野蛮的破坏方式……
radioText.en: Just look at this graffiti and the destruction...

radioText.cn: 简直就是裂地者留下的“名片”嘛。
radioText.en: A classic Landbreaker "signature".

radioText.cn: 我们就先追踪这些脚印吧，管理员。
radioText.en: Let's follow these footprints, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 情况比我们预计得要严重，随着搜救工作的推进，伤员只会越来越多。
radioText.en: The situation is worse than expected. As search and rescue continues, more sick and wounded will be found.

radioText.cn: 我们必须抓紧时间了。
radioText.en: We cannot afford to dally.

radioText.cn: 菲奥娜，帮我查一下莫莉的资料。
radioText.en: Fiona, I need a background check for Molly.

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们找找看这里还有没有其他线索。
radioText.en: Endmin, let's look around for other clues.

radioText.cn: 这张纸条的笔迹，和莫莉女士落在附近工作本上的笔迹一致。她一直在调查药物的事情？裂地者……
radioText.en: The handwriting on this note... It's the same as that in the notebook Miss Molly dropped nearby. Has she been investigating the medication? The Landbreakers...

radioText.cn: 封面有莫莉女士签名的工作笔记……她每天的工作……看起来不少。
radioText.en: Working notes with Miss Molly's name written on the cover... Her daily workload ... seems pretty heavy.

radioText.cn: 我觉得莫莉女士找到的这条线索很关键。
radioText.en: That clue Miss Molly found... I believe it's crucial.

radioText.cn: 信号是从那个方向传过来的，得快点了。
radioText.en: The signal came from that direction. We must hurry.

actorName.cn: 担忧的工团成员{sm1l6m1-担忧的工团成员}
actorName.en: Worried UWST Crew Mate {sm1l6m1-Worried UWST Crew Mate}

radioText.cn: 我们的气候监测站……现在成了这个样子。
radioText.en: Look at this mess... Can't believe this used to be our meteorological station.

radioText.cn: 是工团的人，他们被裂地者袭击了。
radioText.en: UWST crew mates! They've been attacked by the Landbreakers!

radioText.cn: 管理员，求救信号应该就是他们发的。
radioText.en: Endmin, they must be the ones who sent out the distress call.

radioText.cn: 看来菲奥娜说的就是这里，我们进去吧。
radioText.en: This seems like the place that Fiona mentioned. Let's head in.

radioText.cn: （含混的声音）
radioText.en: (Muffled noises)

actorName.cn: 裂地者首领{sm1l6m2-裂地者首领}

radioText.cn: 不要小看她，这个女人不简单。
radioText.en: Don't let her looks fool you. She's got tricks.

radioText.cn: （含混的声音）
radioText.en: (Muffled noises)

actorName.cn: 裂地者首领{sm1l6m2-裂地者首领}

radioText.cn: 还会有人来的，回你的位置待着。
radioText.en: More will come. Go back to yer post.

radioText.cn: 看来……莫莉确实在这里。
radioText.en: Looks like Molly really is here...

radioText.cn: 这里应该就是后门。
radioText.en: This should be the back door.

actorName.cn: 裂地者小头目{sm1l6m2-裂地者小头目}

radioText.cn: 怎么？还有帮手？
radioText.en: Wha? More woosters?

radioText.cn: 你们是？……小心！
radioText.en: Who are you...? WATCH OUT!

radioText.cn: 我们要快一点，不然莫莉可能会有危险。
radioText.en: We need to hurry! Molly might get hurt!

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心！门外似乎有什么动静。
radioText.en: Careful, Endmin! I hear noises behind this door.

radioText.cn: 管理员，这边好像有些脚印……难道是奶奶留下的？
radioText.en: Endmin, I see a few footprints over here... Maybe Granny made them?

radioText.cn: 对，来一份黄油羽兽，配点酸黄瓜就好。
radioText.en: Yes. One butter fowl. And if you've got some gherkins, that'd be perfect.

radioText.cn: 欸？这不是管理员吗？
radioText.en: Hmm? Endmin, is that you?

radioText.cn: 管理员，你们现在在哪里？能来营地西北边的大门一趟吗？詹娜奶奶她——
radioText.en: Endmin, where are you? We ... we need you at the northwestern gate of the camp. Granny Jenner is—

radioText.cn: 不可能，我根本没收到通知，为什么不能过去？我是源石大树培育小组的组长，你们无权阻拦我。
radioText.en: Enough with your nonsense! I was not informed! Why can't I get through? I'm the lead of the Great Originium Oak Tending Crew! No one has any right to stop me!

radioText.cn: 不是，我们没有阻拦您的意思……这边真的在施工……
radioText.en: No. We aren't trying to stop you... But we need to complete this construction job...

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们快去看看吧！马特维拦不了奶奶多久的……
radioText.en: Endmin, we must head over there right now! Matvei won't be able to stall Granny Jenner...

radioText.cn: 管理员，我把奶奶送回家了，她现在已经睡下了……
radioText.en: Endmin, I've sent Granny Jenner home. She's asleep now...

radioText.cn: 今天真的辛苦你了！至于明天……明天或许有什么新转机呢……说不定等奶奶醒来了就恢复了呢。
radioText.en: Thanks for everything you did today! As for tomorrow ... maybe Granny will get better ... she might even wake up fully healed. You can't say for sure, right?

radioText.cn: 管理员，就是这里。
radioText.en: Endmin, over here.

radioText.cn: 管理员，阿丽娅，我们……找到詹娜奶奶了。
radioText.en: Endmin, Alia, we ... we found Granny Jenner.

radioText.cn: 什么？找到了？她、她现在在哪里？
radioText.en: What? You found her? Wh-where is she right now?!

radioText.cn: ……源石树苗的种植地，你们可以回来了。
radioText.en: ...The Originium sapling garden. You can head back now.

radioText.cn: 管理员，可以麻烦你来源石树苗这边一趟吗……
radioText.en: Endmin, can you come over here near the sapling...?

radioText.cn: 当面说？怎么非得搞得这么神神秘秘的……
radioText.en: Face to face? Why is he acting all mysterious...?

radioText.cn: 菲奥娜，你能帮我们申请附近监控的查看权限吗？
radioText.en: Fiona, can you apply for access to nearby monitoring facilities?

radioText.cn: 没问题，为了这次调查，克劳先生给我们共享了权限。
radioText.en: No problem. Mr. Crowe shared his authority level with us for this investigation.

radioText.cn: 查到了，这部分监控的内容存放在了本地终端，我把终端机位置发给你们了。
radioText.en: Found it. Monitoring logs for these facilities are stored at a local terminal. I've sent its location to you.

radioText.cn: 管理员，刚才我尝试连接终端机时出现了报错，推测是终端机被破坏导致的……你可以尝试用源石技艺修理一下？
radioText.en: Endmin, the terminal reported an error when I tried linking to it. I have a feeling that it has been damaged... Maybe you can try fixing it with your Originium Arts.

radioText.cn: 修复成功了！管理员，我拿到了本地的监控加密文件，这就发给S.O.W.进行分析。
radioText.en: Repair successful! Endmin, I've acquired the encrypted local monitoring log. I'm sending it to the SOW for analysis.

radioText.cn: 桥头区营地？总算让我们抓着尾巴了！
radioText.en: The Bridge Approach Camp? We finally found the trail!

radioText.cn: 这个阿尔乔姆的行动也很可疑，我们应该提醒安格鲁同样留意他。
radioText.en: The actions of this Artyom seem rather suspicious as well. We should remind Angro to keep his eyes on him.

radioText.cn: S.O.W.提到的情况已经同步给了工团，那不如我们先去桥头区营地看看！
radioText.en: We've already synced the SOW findings to the UWST. I guess we can take a look at the Bridge Approach Camp first!

radioText.cn: 这里有一些罐头，产地是……特里格拉夫，是工团丢失的物资。
radioText.en: There are a few canned provisions here. Made in ... Triglava. These would be the missing UWST supplies.

radioText.cn: 就是这辆卡车，车的编号和监控中一样。
radioText.en: This is the truck. Same numbers as we saw in the monitoring log.

actorName.cn: 热心的工人{sm1l7m1-热心的工人}

radioText.cn: 阿尔乔姆去哪里了？不是说好送完货一起去喝一杯的吗？
radioText.en: Where did Artyom go? I thought he agreed to have a drink after the delivery.

actorName.cn: 散漫的工人{sm1l7m1-散漫的工人}

radioText.cn: 他今天心神不宁的……你叫了他，他也未必会去。别管他了，咱们先出发。
radioText.en: He wasn't looking too well today... You did invite him, but I don't think he'll show up. Let's just go ahead without him.

radioText.cn: 裂地者？看来我们来的时机刚好。
radioText.en: Landbreakers? Looks like we arrived at the right time.

actorName.cn: 激动的工人{sm1l7m1-激动的工人}

radioText.cn: 你们不是说要查吗？查了半天还是一句“证据不足”？
radioText.en: I thought you were investigating. What do you mean there's a lack of evidence?

actorName.cn: 愤怒的工人{sm1l7m1-愤怒的工人}

radioText.cn: 裂地者敢来，我们就打回去！可要真是工团出了叛徒……我咽不下这口气！
radioText.en: We'll smash any breakers who dare try us! But if it's traitors in the UW … I don't know what I'll do.

radioText.cn: 通信支持部门正在加班加点解密通信内容……但似乎很不顺利。
radioText.en: Communication Support is working around the clock to decrypt the call contents... But things aren't going smoothly for them.

radioText.cn: ……好，去那里看看。
radioText.en: ...Okay. We'll take a look at what they're doing.

radioText.cn: 两个人看起来嫌疑都不小，我们该怎么开始呢？
radioText.en: Both of them look super suspicious to me. How should we begin?

radioText.cn: 尤莉娅的岗位十分敏感，格奥尔基的嫌疑比较大……
radioText.en: Yulia's post is very sensitive, but Georgi seems suspicious, too...

radioText.cn: 设备已经准备好了，管理员。
radioText.en: We got the device, Endmin.

radioText.cn: 我们的人会同步尝试还原内容。
radioText.en: Our crew mates will attempt a synchronized restoration of the call contents.

radioText.cn: 这是收购账单，上面的货物和格奥尔基丢的货能对上。
radioText.en: This is the purchase manifest. The goods listed on it basically match the supplies Georgi "lost".

radioText.cn: 看来他没撒谎，他的货确实卖给了这个中间人。
radioText.en: So he wasn't lying. He did sell these supplies to the go-between.

radioText.cn: 东西都在这儿了。
radioText.en: Here's all the stuff we have.

radioText.cn: 我、我去看看记录，你们先忙。
radioText.en: I, uh ... gotta look at the logs. Good luck.

radioText.cn: 格奥尔基这家伙，到最后嘴还是那么硬。
radioText.en: Dang it. That Georgi didn't tell us anything useful, even till the very end.

radioText.cn: 各位，我查到了阿尔乔姆的信息。他是工团在四号谷地的运输员，目前是被派往支援重建指挥部。
radioText.en: Team, I've found info on Artyom. He's a UWST trucker working at Valley IV. He's currently assigned to support the Reconstruction HQ.

radioText.cn: 说到那辆卡车，它现在就停在联盟停车场。
radioText.en: And that specific truck is now sitting in the United Parking Lot.

radioText.cn: 了解，我们这就过去。
radioText.en: Understood. We'll head over right away.

radioText.cn: 这就是那个终端机，管理员……你有办法复原数据吗？
radioText.en: This is the terminal, Endmin... Got any solutions for data restoration?

radioText.cn: 放心吧，对管理员来说，这都是小菜一碟。
radioText.en: Don't worry. This is just a walk in the park for our Endmin.

radioText.cn: 尤莉娅没有反抗，但……我们先继续调查剩下的嫌疑人吧。
radioText.en: Yulia didn't resist her arrest. Perhaps ... we should look into the other suspect first.

radioText.cn: 那个叫格奥尔基的嫌疑人是在源石发电站附近？可不能让他跑了。
radioText.en: His name is Georgi, right? He's somewhere near the Originium Power Plant. We can't let him get away.

radioText.cn: 我平时就在这里调货，每天从这里进进出出的货物有十几……几十车。
radioText.en: I usually allocate the supplies here. We've more than a dozen ... several dozen supply trucks going in and out of this place on a daily basis.

radioText.cn: 储藏点只有我一个人有权限，太忙了。所以，有时候会……呃，忙中出错。
radioText.en: I'm the only authorized crew mate in the stash location. Too much work on my hands, so I guess ... I make mistakes at times.

radioText.cn: 他在撒谎，这里可不止一个人的脚印。
radioText.en: The only authorized crew mate? He's lying. I see more than one set of footprints here.

radioText.cn: 另一个脚印很浅，轮廓也相对较小，应该是一位女性。
radioText.en: The other set of footprints seems shallower and smaller in size. I guess a lady was involved.

radioText.cn: 脚印在这里断掉了，这是……车辙？
radioText.en: The footprints ended here... And are these ... tread marks?

radioText.cn: 管理员，我跟工团的监测设备进行了同步。
radioText.en: Endmin, I've synchronized the UWST monitoring device.

radioText.cn: 你们可以直接从终端上看到标记的定位！
radioText.en: You should now see the marked locations from your terminals directly!

radioText.cn: 管理员，这个机器人的数据分析结果已经出来了，我马上同步给你。
radioText.en: Endmin, I've analyzed the data on this robot. I'll sync the results with you.

radioText.cn: 运输机器人出现了离奇故障？
radioText.en: Logistics robots are breaking down due to unknown causes?

radioText.cn: 听起来虽然不是什么严重的问题，但如果一直没能解决，后续很可能造成难以估量的影响……
radioText.en: This doesn't sound like a serious issue, but if left unchecked ... the impact and consequences might be quite severe...

radioText.cn: 管理员，事不宜迟，先前往源石发电站看看吧。
radioText.en: We shouldn't dally, Endmin. Let's go to the Originium Power Plant to take a look.

radioText.cn: 对迷踪林最有了解的，应该就数寨民了吧？问问他们去。
radioText.en: The Stockade residents know the grove best. We should ask around.

radioText.cn: 清波寨？我们一般不去那块儿，比较敏感……
radioText.en: Qingbo Stockade? We usually avoid that place. They're pretty sensitive about the badges...

radioText.cn: 没关系，你跟着我们走就行！
radioText.en: Don't worry! Just stick with us!

radioText.cn: 喷火那面瞧见没？就是需水方块的机关。
radioText.en: See those flame-spewing machines? Yeah. That's the hydrocube mechanism.

radioText.cn: 得用射流无人机熄灭那些火。笨办法，没辙儿。
radioText.en: You gotta use a jet drone to put out the fire. I know it's stupid, but it's the only way.

radioText.cn: 那简单，就像我做菜一样！
radioText.en: Easy-peasy! I always have a fire or two breaking out when making my own dinner.

radioText.cn: 你做菜，需要灭火？！
radioText.en: You always- what?!

radioText.cn: 这样就好了，还差两个！
radioText.en: That's it. Two more!

radioText.cn: 还真行！它们都乖乖跑回去了！
radioText.en: Awesome! They're all heading back!

radioText.cn: 咦，新路！管理员，我们往哪儿走？
radioText.en: Oh. A new path! Endmin, which way should we go?

radioText.cn: 找人就得往林子里去。不过，别的地方大概也藏了不少好东西。
radioText.en: We gotta head deeper in the grove to find the missing VIPs. However, we might find some decent stuff along the way.

radioText.cn: 我……我跟着你们……
radioText.en: Alright ... I'll just stay close ... real close...

radioText.cn: 怪了，这些球刺兽倒没被竹林吃掉……
radioText.en: That's odd. These quillbeasts didn't get devoured by the grove...

radioText.cn: 说不定是不好吃呢？
radioText.en: Maybe because they taste icky?

radioText.cn: 李惴，我跟这林子打了这么久的交道，我保证虫子不会吃人的。
radioText.en: Li Zhui, I've worked at this grove for years. I can assure you, grovenymphs don't eat people.

radioText.cn: 要我说就是水的原因，水带着虫子动，林子就不安分。
radioText.en: Water is the cause of this mess. The undercurrents are carrying them around. That's why the grove is upset.

radioText.cn: 嗯……你怎么保证？……你都没有亲眼见过这些虫子啊！
radioText.en: Uh... How could you be so sure? You haven't actually seen these bamboo bugs up close, have you?!

radioText.cn: 上面这个灯，上次来这儿的时候没亮着吧？
radioText.en: That light up there wasn't on the last time we came, right?

radioText.cn: 欸，地上多了张纸片儿！……是说明书？
radioText.en: Hey, look! There are pieces of paper on the ground...! They seem like ... part of an instruction manual!

radioText.cn: 这个鞋印，像是沧贼的！
radioText.en: Look at these prints! River pirates!

radioText.cn: 是寨民，别这么叫人家啦……
radioText.en: Man, stop being so offensive. Just call them Stockade residents...

radioText.cn: 跟着脚印走吧，希望可以找到洪泥。
radioText.en: Let's follow the prints. Hopefully we'll be able to find Hong Ni.

radioText.cn: 鼓起勇气……没事儿李惴，没事儿……
radioText.en: Breath deeply, dude... It's gonna be alright... You got this...

radioText.cn: 好漂亮的蝴蝶！是在给我们引路吗？
radioText.en: These butterflies are so pretty! Are they leading the way?

radioText.cn: 万一它们是竹林虫的帮手怎么办？！引诱我们……
radioText.en: W-what if they're grovenymph accomplices?! Luring us into a trap...!

radioText.cn: 没错，它们会飞到你脸上，把你的骨头也啃干净！
radioText.en: Oh yes! They'll swarm your face and pick your bones clean! Nom nom nom!

radioText.cn: 啊啊啊啊……
radioText.en: AAAAARRGHHH...

radioText.cn: 出来啦！竹林虫对我们还挺友好的嘛！
radioText.en: Made it out safely! And the grovenymphs turned out to be quite friendly to us!

radioText.cn: 又是这儿……上回我们来这儿可是栽了大跟头。大家小心点儿。
radioText.en: It's this place again... We had a really difficult fight last time. Let's be careful, people.

radioText.cn: 不过，他们应该走远了吧……
radioText.en: I think they should still be pretty far off...

radioText.cn: 管理员，小心脚下！
radioText.en: Endmin! Watch your step!

radioText.cn: 竹林虫在乱动……是不是和最近的失踪案有关？
radioText.en: Grovenymphs scrambling around... Could they be related to the recent reports of missing people?

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们先去帮李惴找人吧！
radioText.en: Endmin, let's help Li Zhui look for them!

radioText.cn: 差不多了，阿青怎么还没来……
radioText.en: Almost done. Where's Qing...?

radioText.cn: 哇，突然一下飞那么远！
radioText.en: Wow! Look at how far the thing flew!

radioText.cn: 黑面煞，你们回来啦！……怎么还有个武陵巡卫！？
radioText.en: You're back, Darkmask...! Oh. How did this badge from Wuling get in here?

radioText.cn: 材料直接交给度渡就好，他在渡口那边。
radioText.en: Just hand the materials to Dudu. He's over there at the ferry stop.

radioText.cn: 说起来，刚才那些寨民，没我想象中那么不通人情。
radioText.en: Y'know ... those Stockade residents back there weren't as unreasonable as I expected.

radioText.cn: 对嘛，有些事儿越是一知半解越吓人呢。
radioText.en: Exactly! Things are ten times scarier when you don't know enough about them.

radioText.cn: 所以竹林虫吃不吃人这事儿，肯定还有说法。
radioText.en: So, regarding grovenymphs and their man-eating habits, I bet there's another explanation.

radioText.cn: 这我不信！肯定是吃人的！
radioText.en: Bet there isn't! They eat people! I'm sure of that!

radioText.cn: 有人吗……救……
radioText.en: Help...! Anyone out there...? Hel... AAARGH!

radioText.cn: 什么动静！像是咀嚼一样的……好像还有惨叫！
radioText.en: WHAT WAS THAT! Sounds like someone getting chewed on... And- and a scream?!

radioText.cn: 唔，真、真的吗？只是竹林移动的声音吧……
radioText.en: Chewed on? You... you sure? Maybe it was just... the bamboo shifting?

radioText.cn: 挖虫笋而已，有必要跑这么远吗……
radioText.en: I thought he was here to dig some nymphsprouts... Did he have to come all the way out here?

radioText.cn: 天使！快，先救人！
radioText.en: Aggeloi! Quick! We gotta save that person!

radioText.cn: 不打扰这片土地……嗯，我们还是去修好核心吧。
radioText.en: Quit trying to change this turf... Hmm. I think we should try to get that core repaired.

radioText.cn: 好，这边的也搞定了！去处理一下核心吧！
radioText.en: This side is fixed as well! Time to deal with the core!

radioText.cn: 好像又被困住了……
radioText.en: Ugh. Trapped again...

radioText.cn: 管理员，我们得按照顺序点亮引导灯才行！
radioText.en: Endmin, I think we should activate the lights in the correct sequence!

radioText.cn: 灯灭了，是不是顺序不对……
radioText.en: The lights went out. Maybe we used the wrong sequence...

radioText.cn: 管理员，后面有几根石柱，数量是不是对应了顺序啊？
radioText.en: Endmin, there are a few stone pillars at the back. Maybe the numbers hint at the sequence.

radioText.cn: 到啦！管理员，我们再去核心那儿试试吧。希望这些小家伙不要乱飞了……
radioText.en: We're here! Endmin, let's check on the core. Hopefully these little fellas won't be flying around wildly anymore...

radioText.cn: 南山的梨花真好看，很有氛围，以前我总在这儿练剑。
radioText.en: Pear blossoms on South Hill ... so beautiful, so poetic. I used to perfect my swordmancy here all the time.

radioText.cn: 可能那个天师也沉浸在风景里了吧……
radioText.en: Perhaps the Tianshi got ... distracted by the scenery...

radioText.cn: 有这意思，像是那种高人会出没的地方。
radioText.en: Very true. This feels like a place where a true master would seek.

radioText.cn: 啥？这些不就是普普通通的树吗？
radioText.en: Pfff. These are just trees.

radioText.cn: 是……是先前失踪的语轩天师！
radioText.en: That's ... that's Tianshi Yuxuan! The one reported missing!

radioText.cn: 没想到竹林虫还有这么一段故事……
radioText.en: Hmm. Never expected to hear a story about the grovenymphs...

radioText.cn: 看来不会再有什么岔子了！咱们先回到核心那边，把它们归位吧。
radioText.en: I think that's that! Let's head back to the core and get this special system working again.

radioText.cn: 竹筏就在那边，管理员，我们去南山看看。
radioText.en: The raft is over there, Endmin! Let's head over to South Hill and search the place.

radioText.cn: 没想到，我还有跟巡卫一块儿坐船的一天……
radioText.en: Never thought I'd see the day — me, sharing a boat with some watch. Hah!

radioText.cn: 嘿，我们俩才是上了贼船了。
radioText.en: Pfft. We're the ones who boarded a literal pirate ship here!

radioText.cn: 大家都消消火，消消火……
radioText.en: Come-come on people. Let's try to get along, okay...?

radioText.cn: 咳，南山，我以前经常来这边！你们呢？
radioText.en: Ahem. South Hill. I visited the place pretty often, you know! What about you?

radioText.cn: 当然！这边经常有路人被竹林困住，一来一个准，油水多多！
radioText.en: 'Course! This place always traps passersby. One after another, like clockwork! Easy pickings, plenty of profit!

radioText.cn: 等等，你、你这样说我就得……
radioText.en: Hey, you can't just say that! Are you forcing me to do my job...?

radioText.cn: 好了好了……说点儿别的……
radioText.en: Okay, okay... Let's just ... talk about something else...

radioText.cn: 三处都处理好啦！我们回去看看总控台吧。
radioText.en: Got it! All three cores should be working properly. Time to check on the control panel.

radioText.cn: 语轩天师，这就是你说的小岛吗？好漂亮。
radioText.en: Is that the islet you mentioned, Tianshi Yuxuan? It's so pretty!

radioText.cn: 嗯，定波器应该就在这个位置。
radioText.en: Yeah. The fixed wave emitter should be over there.

radioText.cn: 咦？那里有个人。看打扮，是位天师吧。
radioText.en: Wait! Someone's over there! Hmm. Looks like a Tianshi from what she's wearing.

radioText.cn: 不过，这地方羽兽都不下蛋，怎么会站着个天师……
radioText.en: But why would there be a Tianshi...? This place is so isolated fowlbeasts don't even roost here.

radioText.cn: 看来，被歌声吸引过来的不止是我们呢。管理员，小心！
radioText.en: Uh-oh. I don't think we're the only ones lured by the singing. Endmin! Watch out!

radioText.cn: 来之前没想到一个小竹林竟然还藏着这么多秘密……
radioText.en: I certainly didn't expect this tiny grove to hide so many secrets...

radioText.cn: 嗯……我们回去理一理思路吧，管理员。
radioText.en: Hmm... Endmin, we should really head back and try to figure everything out.

radioText.cn: 管理员管理员，快看那边！笼子！
radioText.en: Endmin! ENDMIN! Look over there! A cage!

radioText.cn: 谁会把长耳兽关在这种地方啊？……不会是偷猎吧？
radioText.en: Why would anyone lock a long-ear up in this place...? Could it be poachers?

radioText.cn: 小东西，别慌，我们救你出来！
radioText.en: Don't panic, little one! We'll get you out right now!

radioText.cn: 小吴吃饱了就不喜欢动弹，它应该就在附近。
radioText.en: Woolsey doesn't like moving around when she's full. I think she should be nearby.

radioText.cn: 管理员，扫描一下，找找地上有没有脚印吧。
radioText.en: Let's scan the place, Endmin. Check the ground for paw prints.

radioText.cn: 刚才，小吴坐在清波寨里盯着我看了很久……然后，它就跑了。
radioText.en: Just then, Woolsey sat in Qingbo Stockade and stared at me for a while... And then she ran off.

radioText.cn: 不过我知道这边有个溶洞，小吴以前就喜欢往溶洞里跑。
radioText.en: I know there's a limestone cave nearby. Woolsey loved running round in these caves.

radioText.cn: 天使在攻击小蟠兽！管理员，我们快出手，别让天使把小吴一块儿吃掉了！
radioText.en: The Aggeloi are attacking the little pantails, Endmin! We must save them! Can't let them get eaten along with Woolsey!

radioText.cn: 是我眼花了吗？阿土跑起来的样子跟小吴有点相似……
radioText.en: Am I seeing things? The way Ah Tu runs really reminds me of Woolsey...

radioText.cn: 好想知道她要跟老师说什么。走，我们听听去。
radioText.en: And I'm super curious about Tu's meeting with her instructor. Let's keep up and see what's going on.

radioText.cn: 欸，你们是谁啊？我这笼子……我的笼子怎么开了……
radioText.en: Huh? Who are you? And my cage... Why is my cage open...?

radioText.cn: 管理员，这里这里，你们来一下。
radioText.en: Over here, Endmin! Come on.

radioText.cn: 这里是清波寨……好可怕。
radioText.en: Qingbo Stockade... Oh dear, it's giving me the creeps...

radioText.cn: 可是……为了小吴……
radioText.en: B-but I've got to be brave — for Woolsey!

radioText.cn: 感谢你们帮我，要是我一个人来找小吴，说不定他们把我也一起吃了。
radioText.en: Thank you for helping me out. If I came here on my own for Woolsey, they'll probably cook me along with her.

radioText.cn: 明明这附近就有很多吃的，为什么非要吃小吴呢？
radioText.en: So many edible things grow here. Why are they so obsessed with eating Woolsey?

radioText.cn: 坚韧的水、牙兽的指甲、水灯虫的灯坠，还有那边的锦草，稍作加工，都是能吃的。
radioText.en: There are resilient water, tuskbeast claws, waterlamp glowbulbs, and even some jincao growing nearby. All can be eaten after basic preparations.

radioText.cn: 这种锦草抽梢期会吸引很多球刺兽，要小心哦。
radioText.en: Jincao like this tend to attract quillbeasts, especially when they are bolting. Be careful.

radioText.cn: 食材拿到了！我们去找大桨换回小吴吧！
radioText.en: We found plenty of edible stuff! Let's take them to Da Jiang and get Woolsey back!

radioText.cn: 阿土，你好像什么都知道的样子！你是学生物的吗？
radioText.en: Ah Tu, you sound really knowledgeable about everything! Are you a biology major?

radioText.cn: 啊，我确实选过这个专业……不过，我不是这块料。
radioText.en: Ah, I majored in that for a bit... But I don't think I'll make a qualified biologist.

radioText.cn: 我妈就是宏科院的生物天师。她发的论文堆起来比我个子还高。
radioText.en: My Mom is a Tianshi of biology at HAS. If we stack all the stuff she's published, that pile will be taller than me.

radioText.cn: 我永远比不上我妈。
radioText.en: I'll never be as good as Mom.

radioText.cn: 管理员，小吴往那边去了，我们追上去。
radioText.en: Endmin, Woolsey went over there. Time to leg it.

radioText.cn: 小吴怎么会跑到这么远的地方来，它不害怕吗？
radioText.en: Why would Woolsey come this far? Wouldn't she be afraid?

radioText.cn: 也许小吴天性就属于大自然呢。
radioText.en: Perhaps Woolsey belongs to good ol' nature.

radioText.cn: 可我觉得小吴应该害怕。它从生下来就一直待在小地方，外面的世界那么大，它能躲到哪里去？
radioText.en: But I think Woolsey must be afraid. She was born and raised at a tiny place. The world outside is huge. Where could she be hiding?

radioText.cn: 唉，小吴总是往最麻烦的地方跑。又要挨学长训了……
radioText.en: Ugh. Woolsey is always running off to the worst spots. My senior is going to be pissed again...

radioText.cn: 哇，小吴的破坏力真大！
radioText.en: Woah. Woolsey sure is destructive!

radioText.cn: 小吴毕竟是我亲手养出来的超级进化长耳兽……
radioText.en: Well, I personally bred Woolsey myself. She's a hyper-evolved long-ear variant...

radioText.cn: 阿土！你刚才跑哪儿去了？
radioText.en: Ah Tu! Where were you back then?

radioText.cn: 对不起，我去帮小吴善后了……不能给大家添麻烦……
radioText.en: I'm so sorry... I was cleaning up Woolsey's mess... Can't let her disrupt people's work...

radioText.cn: 我们来帮你吧！
radioText.en: Let's help you with that!

radioText.cn: 阿土！你过来！昨天交的课题进度报告……
radioText.en: Ah Tu! Come here, please! About that project progress report you submitted yesterday...

radioText.cn: 老师，我……我得先去找小吴！
radioText.en: Mr. Lu! I ... I gotta find Woolsey!

radioText.cn: 管理员，看阿土一副很迷茫的样子……我们要怎么帮她呀？
radioText.en: Endmin, Ah Tu looks confused and lost... Is there anything we can do to help her?

radioText.cn: 我猜你也要说“各才有各用”了。说来，我也经历过这么一个阶段呢，搞不清楚自己真正想要什么。
radioText.en: You're probably gonna say, "Everyone's got a useful talent". And you're right. But even I had a major episode of not knowing what I really wanted. I totally get it.

radioText.cn: 等等，你们不会把小吴烤了吧？！阿土，你自暴自弃啦？！
radioText.en: OH! BY! TALOS! Did you roast Woolsey already?! Ah Tu, have you given up again?!

radioText.cn: 啊？阿土，你给我们抓的这只畜生是小吴？别说你这手艺还真不错，香喷喷的，肥而不腻……
radioText.en: Oh? Ah Tu, this poor fella you caught is Woolsey? Speaking of which, you're pretty good at roasting. Smells great. And just the right amount of fat.

radioText.cn: 先去小武说的地方看看吧。
radioText.en: {F}I should look around the place Little Wu mentioned.{M}I should look around the place Little Wu mentioned.

radioText.cn: 看痕迹，这家伙……怎么在学院门口绕着圈走呢？
radioText.en: Look at the prints. Why ... is he pacing around the Academy gates?

radioText.cn: 小武说的地方就是这里，在附近找找吧。
radioText.en: {F}This must be where Little Wu was talking about. Time to start searching.{M}This must be where Little Wu was talking about. Time to start searching.

radioText.cn: 原来的试验田受到的侵蚀污染过于严重，无论是哪个品种的驮兽，都无法在上面工作。
radioText.en: Blight contamination is too severe for the old experimental farm. None of the burdenbeast breeds could work there.

radioText.cn: 所幸上级给我重新划了一块地方，就在计划建成的学院内……
radioText.en: Fortunately, the higher-ups got me a new plot. They're going to set it up in the Academy itself...

radioText.cn: 希望这里能够成为新的起点，如果武陵真的要建城，它会需要我的技术。
radioText.en: I hope this is the start of something beautiful. If Wuling is going to become a city, it's going to need my technology.

radioText.cn: 它会需要我。
radioText.en: The city needs me.

radioText.cn: 最近还有件奇怪的事，小赵这几天怎么老是来找我。
radioText.en: Something weird is happening. Zhao keeps showing up at my lab.

radioText.cn: 没事就要请我吃饭，还送我礼物……这人是不是……是不是惦记……
radioText.en: Kept asking me out for lunches. Even got me a gift... Hmm. Is she ... thinking about...

radioText.cn: 我新得出的数据模型啊……
radioText.en: ...that new algorithmic model I just came up with?

radioText.cn: 小武说的地方就是这里，通过<@qu.key>扫描</>应该能看到驮兽的足迹。
radioText.en: {F}Little Wu's burdenbeast might be here. I should <@qu.key>scan</> the area and look for tracks.{M}Little Wu's burdenbeast might be here. I should <@qu.key>scan</> the area and look for tracks.

radioText.cn: 看到了！
radioText.en: He's there!

radioText.cn: 四周这么多职农，也没人打算送它回去？
radioText.en: {F}This place is packed with farmers. Why didn't anyone send him back?{M}This place is packed with farmers. Why didn't anyone send him back?

radioText.cn: 武陵城里的人都喜欢驮兽，不管它们跑到哪儿，大家也都睁一只眼闭一只眼。
radioText.en: Burdenbeasts are well-loved in Wuling. Everyone lets them roam freely.

radioText.cn: 怪不得到处都是驮兽的饲料装置。
radioText.en: {F}That explains why there are burdenbeast feed dispensers everywhere.{M}That explains why there are burdenbeast feed dispensers everywhere.

radioText.cn: 它怎么自己过来了？不是说一步路都走不动了？
radioText.en: {F}He got here on his own? And I thought he was too tired to move.{M}He got here on his own? And I thought he was too tired to move.

radioText.cn: 从记事起，老驮兽就陪着我。它的背就是我的摇篮，它的声音就是摇篮曲。
radioText.en: He's been around for as long as I can remember. His back was my cradle and his moo was my lullaby.

radioText.cn: 趴在它背上，一不留神，夏天就过去了，再一不留神，许多年就过去了。
radioText.en: Riding on his back, summer slipped by, and the seasons passed me before I even noticed.

radioText.cn: 然后，它就老了，再也走不动了……也驮不动我了。医生来了一个又一个，都只是摇摇头，然后告诉我“生死有命”。
radioText.en: Then he got too old to work ... couldn't even carry me no more. We've had plenty of vets, but they just shake their heads and say, "When your time comes, it comes."

radioText.cn: 那就……多陪陪它吧，珍惜它还在的每时每刻。
radioText.en: {F}Well... You should spend more time with him. Treasure every moment while he's still around.{M}Well... You should spend more time with him. Treasure every moment while he's still around.

radioText.cn: 当然了，我给它搭建了遮风挡雨的兽栏，让它睡柔软暖和的干草堆，吃的喝的都是最好的。但它不要，它只要它那片田。
radioText.en: That's what I'm doing. Built him a comfy pen with soft, warm hay. Fed him the best water and food, even. But he doesn't want any of that. I guess he only wants his farm.

radioText.cn: 你刚刚还给它喝生水……呜哇——！我平时给它喂的都是鲜榨的果汁！里面还加了我独特的<@qu.key>驱寒秘方</>。
radioText.en: I saw you gave him raw water... WAAAAARRGH! I always fed him fresh fruit punch! With my special <@qu.key>blend for dispelling cold</>!

radioText.cn: ……别哭别哭。
radioText.en: {F}There, there. Please don't cry...{M}There, there. Please don't cry...

radioText.cn: 呃……我看这家伙平日里趴着一动不动，还以为它早就跳不动了呢。
radioText.en: Hnnghg... That old boy would only lie around motionless back home. I thought he couldn't dance anymore.

radioText.cn: 看它跳得这么开心，我还真有点不忍心打扰。
radioText.en: Looks like he's having a good time. I don't want to interrupt.

radioText.cn: 不见了……怎么会？
radioText.en: {F}Did he just disappear...? How?{M}Did he just disappear...? How?

radioText.cn: 小武，帮我将驮兽们赶远一些。我怕一会儿打起来伤到它们。
radioText.en: {F}Little Wu, help me herd the burdenbeasts away from this area! I don't want to hurt them by accident.{M}Little Wu, help me herd the burdenbeasts away from this area! I don't want to hurt them by accident.

radioText.cn: 没问题，交给我就好。
radioText.en: No problem. Leave that to me.

radioText.cn: 田……在这里吗？
radioText.en: Is this ... the farm?

radioText.cn: 嗯，这附近是学院下属的种植地块，有些小型的试验田。
radioText.en: Yeah. A horti plot belonging to the Academy. With mini-plots for field testing too.
